English: Blessed is the man Who walks not in the counsel of the ungodly, Nor stands in the path of sinners, Nor sits in the seat of the scornful
Bahnar: Pŭn dêh kơ bơngai bu, ưh kơ kiơ̆ trong lu bơngai kơnê̆, kư̆m ưh kơ oei lăm trong lu bơngai yoch, kư̆m ưh kơ ngôi hơdai hăm lu pơjăm đe

English: But his delight is in the law of the LORD, And in His law he meditates day and night.
Bahnar: Mă-lei chơt hiôk lăm tơdrong juăt Kră Yang, păng tơchĕng tơdrong juăt ei măng năr.

English: He shall be like a tree Planted by the rivers of water, That brings forth its fruit in its season, Whose leaf also shall not wither; And whatever he does shall prosper.
Bahnar: Bơngai noh nhen thoi tơm 'long chăt cheng đak glung, Đei plei kiơ̆ kơ bơyan, Hla sư ưh kơ đei layơ jô kro, Rim tơdrong jang sư pơm jing ngăl.

English: The ungodly are not so, But are like the chaff which the wind drives away.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai kơnê̆ ưh kơ đei thoi noh; Lu sư thoi hơnong 'ba kial pơđông.

English: Therefore the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment, Nor sinners in the congregation of the righteous.
Bahnar: Yua kơ thoi noh lu bơngai kơnê̆ ưh kơ kĕ dơ̆ng ôh lăm năr sek tơlang, Lu bơngai kơnê̆ ưh kơ gơh mơ̆t lăm lu khŭl bơngai tơpăt.

English: For the LORD knows the way of the righteous, But the way of the ungodly shall perish.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Kră Yang băt trong lu bơngai tơpăt, Mă-lei trong lu bơngai kơnê̆ gô hiong răm.

English: Why do the nations rage, And the people plot a vain thing?
Bahnar: Yua kơ kiơ đei tơdrong iung blơ̆ lăm dêh char? Păng lu kon pơlei chă đon tơdrong hiong răm?

English: The kings of the earth set themselves, And the rulers take counsel together, Against the LORD and against His Anointed, saying
Bahnar: Lu pơtao lăm teh đak iung blah, Lu kră pơgơ̆r pơđâu chă đon wă blah Kră Yang, păng Tơ'ngla mă Kră Yang đei rơih tuh đak rơmă

English: “Let us break Their bonds in pieces And cast away Their cords from us.”
Bahnar: Lu sư khan: “Bĕ bơ̆n hrĕch lê̆ glang, păng pleh hŭt lê̆ ataih đơ̆ng bơ̆n”

English: He who sits in the heavens shall laugh; The Lord shall hold them in derision.
Bahnar: Kră Yang đơ̆ng plĕnh gô hiĕk, Kră Yang gô pơjăm lu sư.

English: Then He shall speak to them in His wrath, And distress them in His deep displeasure
Bahnar: Dang ei Kră Yang hil mĭl kơ lu sư. Đơ̆ng noh pơrŭng lu sư hăm tơdrong hil kơtang.

English: “Yet I have set My King On My holy hill of Zion.”
Bahnar: “Mă-lei, Inh pơjing boih Tang-dŏ Tang-dŏ pơtao Inh tơ kơpal kông Siôn rơgoh.”

English: “I will declare the decree: The LORD has said to Me, ‘You are My Son, Today I have begotten You.
Bahnar: Inh gô roi tơblang nơ̆r tơtă mă Kră Yang khan kơ inh: “Ih boih kon inh; Năr âu inh pơjing ih.

English: Ask of Me, and I will give You The nations for Your inheritance, And the ends of the earth for Your possession.
Bahnar: Apinh bĕ Inh, Inh gô ăn kơ ih lu teh đak jing teh ih jang sa. Păng jơ̆p-jang kơ teh jing tơmam ih

English: You shall break them with a rod of iron; You shall dash them to pieces like a potter’s vessel.’ ”
Bahnar: Ih gô Pơgơ̆r lu sư hăm 'long jra mam; Ih gô teh pơchah lê̆ lu sư thoi gŏ teh.”

English: Now therefore, be wise, O kings; Be instructed, you judges of the earth.
Bahnar: Thoi noh, ơ lu pơtao, tơchĕng bĕ mă hơgei; Ơ kră Pơgơ̆r lăm teh đak, athei bơtho tơ'bôh bĕ.

English: Serve the LORD with fear, And rejoice with trembling.
Bahnar: Athei bơ̆jang kơ Kră Yang hăm tơdrong hli yom, Păng chơt hiôk bĕ truh akâu pơpơ̆.

English: Kiss the Son, lest He be angry, And you perish in the way, When His wrath is kindled but a little. Blessed are all those who put their trust in Him.
Bahnar: Chŭm Sư bĕ, hli kơ Sư hil, păng hli kơ iĕm lôch hiong lăm trong tôch; Yua kơ tơdrong sư hil rai tŏk. Pŭn hiôk dêh kơ bu mă kơ'nơp lăm Sư!

English: LORD, how they have increased who trouble me! Many are they who rise up against me.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Lu ayăt kơ inh lơ dêh pă băt dôm yơ! Lu bơngai iung blah inh lơ dêh tơpă!

English: Many are they who say of me, “There is no help for him in God.” Selah
Bahnar: Lơ bơngai khan kơ bơhngol inh: “Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh kơ đei pơklaih sư ôh!” Sêla

English: But You, O LORD, are a shield for me, My glory and the One who lifts up my head.
Bahnar: Mă-lei, Ơ Kră Yang! Ih boih khêl pĕng tăp kơ inh; Ih jing tơdrong mă inh ư-ang, păng Ih ăn kơ inh gơh ngơk kơ̆l.

English: I cried to the LORD with my voice, And He heard me from His holy hill. Selah
Bahnar: Inh krao ôr Kră Yang! Đơ̆ng kông rơgoh Sư tơl nơ̆r inh. Sêla

English: I lay down and slept; I awoke, for the LORD sustained me.
Bahnar: Inh 'bĭch đơ̆ng noh tep hiôk; Inh hơđơ̆r, yua kơ Kră Yang râu tơiung inh.

English: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people Who have set themselves against me all around.
Bahnar: Inh ưh kơ hli ôh kơ lơ rơbâu bơngai, Wang tăp dăr puăn pah.

English: Arise, O LORD; Save me, O my God! For You have struck all my enemies on the cheekbone; You have broken the teeth of the ungodly.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, iung bĕ; Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, pơklaih inh bĕ! Yua kơ Kră Yang tap boih tơ'bŏk lu ayăt kơ inh, Păng gơ̆ lê̆ boih hơnĕnh lu bơngai kơnê̆.

English: Salvation belongs to the LORD. Your blessing is upon Your people. Selah
Bahnar: Tơdrong dŏng pơklaih đơ̆ng Kră Yang, Apinh Ih ăn tơdrong pŭn hiôk tih kơ kon pơlei pơla Ih. Sêla

English: Hear me when I call, O God of my righteousness! You have relieved me in my distress; Have mercy on me, and hear my prayer.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, mă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, Tơl tơwih nơ̆r inh, dah inh krao khan. Ih pơklaih inh boih, lăm năr inh oei pơmat, Apinh Ih mơnat kơ inh, păng tơl nơ̆r inh krao khan.

English: How long, O you sons of men, Will you turn my glory to shame? How long will you love worthlessness And seek falsehood? Selah
Bahnar: Ơ kon bơngai! Tơdrong ư-ang inh, iĕm wă pơjăm dĭng dang yơ? Lu iĕm 'mêm kơ tơdrong kư̆ kă 'maih chă tơdrong hơlĕnh dĭng dang yơ dơ̆ng?

English: But know that the LORD has set apart for Himself him who is godly; The LORD will hear when I call to Him.
Bahnar: Athei băt Kră Yang 'măn lê̆ boih dôm lu bơngai mă chu yom kơ Sư. Dah inh krao khan kơ Kră Yang Sư gô mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh.

English: Be angry, and do not sin. Meditate within your heart on your bed, and be still. Selah
Bahnar: Oei bĕ lăm tơdrong hli yom, 'nĕ pă pơm yoch; Tơchĕng bĕ lăm jơhngơ̆m, kơplah ih oei 'bĭch kơpal giơng păng ngăn bĕ. Sêla

English: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, And put your trust in the LORD.
Bahnar: Pơyơ̆r bĕ tơmam soi mă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, Păng lui gơnang kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: There are many who say, “Who will show us any good?” LORD, lift up the light of Your countenance upon us.
Bahnar: Đei lơ bơngai apinh: “Bu gơh tơ'bôh ăn kơ bơ̆n tơdrong pŭn hiôk” Ơ Kră Yang, pơchrang bĕ tơdrong hơdah đơ̆ng muh măt Ih, tơ lu nhôn.

English: You have put gladness in my heart, More than in the season that their grain and wine increased.
Bahnar: Kră Yang, Ih ăn boih kơ inh tơdrong chơt hiôk dêh. Hloh kơ lu sư chơt hiôk đei 'ba mi lơ, păng sik đak hơmu rơkah rơkai

English: I will both lie down in peace, and sleep; For You alone, O LORD, make me dwell in safety.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh gô 'bĭch păng tep hiôk-hian; Yua kơ lăp minh 'nu Ih đĕch ăn kơ inh oei hiôk rơnŭk.

English: Give ear to my words, O LORD, Consider my meditation.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih pơgling đon mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh, lăng bĕ dôm tơdrong inh tơtok.

English: Give heed to the voice of my cry, My King and my God, For to You I will pray.
Bahnar: Ơ Pơtao inh, Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, apinh mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh krao khan, Yua kơ inh krao apinh Ih.

English: My voice You shall hear in the morning, O LORD; In the morning I will direct it to You, And I will look up.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Pơgê hrôih Ih gô kơtơ̆ng nơ̆r inh; Pơgê hrôih inh gô roi dôm tơdrong kiơ 'bơ̆t anăp Ih păng chang gô.

English: For You are not a God who takes pleasure in wickedness, Nor shall evil dwell with You.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Ih ưh kơ trŏ kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei mă lăp đon tơdrong kơnê̆, lu bơngai kơnê̆ ưh kơ gơh ôh oei hơdai Ih.

English: The boastful shall not stand in Your sight; You hate all workers of iniquity.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơang ưh kơ kĕ dơ̆ng 'bơ̆t anăp Ih ôh; Ih areh kơ đĭ-đăng lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆.

English: You shall destroy those who speak falsehood; The LORD abhors the bloodthirsty and deceitful man.
Bahnar: Ih gô pơrăm đĭ lu bơngai pơm pơma hơlĕnh, Ih areh kơ lu bơngai pơlôch đe, Hăm lu bơngai sa pơgâm.

English: But as for me, I will come into Your house in the multitude of Your mercy; In fear of You I will worship toward Your holy temple.
Bahnar: Gah inh gơnang kơ tơdrong 'mêm tih Ih, inh gô mơ̆t tơ lăm hnam Ih. Iŏk jơhngơ̆m hli yom kơ Ih na drap kơkuh 'bơ̆t anih 'lơ̆ng rơgoh Ih.

English: Lead me, O LORD, in Your righteousness because of my enemies; Make Your way straight before my face.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, yua kơ lu ayăt kơ inh, thoi noh iŏk tơdrong tơpăt Ih dui ba inh, Pơm mă tơhnă trong Ih 'bơ̆t anăp inh.

English: For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; Their inward part is destruction; Their throat is an open tomb; They flatter with their tongue.
Bahnar: Yua kơ lăm 'bơ̆r lu sư ưh kơ đei tơdrong tơpă; Jơhngơ̆m lu sư tă kơnê̆ ngăl. Hơlŏng lu sư thoi bơsat tơpơih Hơpiĕt lu sư 'bĕnh hăm tơdrong pơdăr.

English: Pronounce them guilty, O God! Let them fall by their own counsels; Cast them out in the multitude of their transgressions, For they have rebelled against You.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, phak lu sư bĕ; Ăn kơ lu sư pơ̆k huŏng tơ lăm tơdrong lu sư pơđâu; Pơpuh bĕ lu sư yua kơ tơdrong yoch kơnê̆ lu sư lơ tơpă, Yua kơ lu sư blah Ih.

English: But let all those rejoice who put their trust in You; Let them ever shout for joy, because You defend them; Let those also who love Your name Be joyful in You.
Bahnar: Mă-lei bu gơnang kơ Ih gô oei hiôk chơt, lu sư gô hơri chơt hiôk ling-lang. Apinh Ih wei-lăng lu sư. Bơngai bu 'mêm kơ anăn Ih kư̆m gô 'nă hal lăm Ih.

English: For You, O LORD, will bless the righteous; With favor You will surround him as with a shield.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, yua kơ Ih gô ăn tơdrong pŭn hiôk kơ lu bơngai tơpăt, Iŏk đon 'mêm mơnat pĕng lu sư thoi khêl.

English: O LORD, do not rebuke me in Your anger, Nor chasten me in Your hot displeasure.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! 'Nĕ chrih kơ inh lăm năr Ih blĕk, 'Nĕ kơ bơtho pơjĭ inh lăm năr Ih hil!

English: Have mercy on me, O LORD, for I am weak; O LORD, heal me, for my bones are troubled.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih mơnat kơ inh, yua kơ inh rơdu tơrăn; Ơ Kră Yang, pơklaih inh, yua kơ kơting inh tơtơ̆.

English: My soul also is greatly troubled; But You, O LORD—how long?
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Bơhngol inh hli tơtăm dêh. Bĭ Ih, ơ Kră Yang! Wă gô dang yơ?

English: Return, O LORD, deliver me! Oh, save me for Your mercies’ sake!
Bahnar: Hơlơ̆k pơklaih, bơhngol inh bĕ, Ơ Kră Yang; Yua kơ tơdrong Ih 'mêm mơnat, apinh Ih dŏng pơklaih inh

English: For in death there is no remembrance of You; In the grave who will give You thanks?
Bahnar: Yua kơ lăm tơdrong lôch đe pă đei 'blŏk kơ Ih bơih. Lăm pơlei lôch hăm pă đei bu bơnê ư-ang kơ Ih?

English: I am weary with my groaning; All night I make my bed swim; I drench my couch with my tears.
Bahnar: Jơhngơ̆m inh đĭ boih, yua kơ inh ôr krao, Rim măng inh nhơ̆m, dĭng giơng mah hơiuh.

English: My eye wastes away because of grief; It grows old because of all my enemies.
Bahnar: Măt inh hrŏ yua kơ sơ'ngon, Sư jing rơgah yua kơ lu ayăt kơ inh.

English: Depart from me, all you workers of iniquity; For the LORD has heard the voice of my weeping.
Bahnar: Ơ lu pơm kơnê̆ noh, weh bĕ đĭ-đăng ataih đơ̆ng inh, Yua kơ Kră Yang kơtơ̆ng boih nơ̆r inh nhơ̆m ôr.

English: The LORD has heard my supplication; The LORD will receive my prayer.
Bahnar: Kră Yang mơ̆ng boih nơ̆r inh krao apinh; Ih iŏk boih tơdrong inh krao khan.

English: Let all my enemies be ashamed and greatly troubled; Let them turn back and be ashamed suddenly.
Bahnar: Đĭ-đăng lu ayăt kơ inh gô mơlâu, klaih kơ noh hli tơrơ tơpă; lu sư kơdŭn kơdâu, hăt hot yua kơ mơlâu dêh.

English: O LORD my God, in You I put my trust; Save me from all those who persecute me; And deliver me
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, inh kơ'nơp lăm Ih; Apinh Ih dŏng pơklaih inh đơ̆ng lu bơngai kơnê̆ druh

English: Lest they tear me like a lion, Rending me in pieces, while there is none to deliver.
Bahnar: Kơnh lu sư hek sa inh thoi dăm-brang, păng hek hơđah lê̆ akâu inh ưh kơ đei bu dŏng inh.a

English: O LORD my God, if I have done this: If there is iniquity in my hands
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh; dah inh pơm boih dôm tơdrong noh, Păng đei pơm kơnê̆ đơ̆ng ti inh

English: If I have repaid evil to him who was at peace with me, Or have plundered my enemy without cause
Bahnar: Dah inh tơtông iŏk đơ̆ng bơngai mă oei hiôk-hian hăm inh, păng pơm kơnê̆ boih, bu pơm kơnê̆ kơ inh tơdrong ưh kơ đei.

English: Let the enemy pursue me and overtake me; Yes, let him trample my life to the earth, And lay my honor in the dust. Selah
Bahnar: Lei ăn kơ ayăt kơ inh, druh inh tam, pơjuă lê̆ tơdrong arih inh tơ teh, păng 'bŭ lê̆ tơdrong ư-ang inh lăm 'mui teh. Sêla

English: Arise, O LORD, in Your anger; Lift Yourself up because of the rage of my enemies; Rise up for me to the judgment You have commanded!
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, iung bĕ lăm năr Ih blĕk, Iung blah bĕ hăm lu ayăt kơ inh; Iung hơdơ̆r bĕ ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei tơbăt bĕ tơdrong sek tơlang.

English: So the congregation of the peoples shall surround You; For their sakes, therefore, return on high.
Bahnar: Ơ khŭl kon bơngai akŭm bĕ tăp dăr kơ Ih; đơ̆ng anih kơpal, apinh Ih jur tơ lu sư.

English: The LORD shall judge the peoples; Judge me, O LORD, according to my righteousness, And according to my integrity within me.
Bahnar: Kră Yang tih hloh, sek tơlang kơ kon bơngai. Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih sek tơlang kơ inh, kiơ̆ thoi tơdrong tơpăt, păng kiơ̆ tơdrong rơgoh sĭt lăm jơhngơ̆m inh.

English: Oh, let the wickedness of the wicked come to an end, But establish the just; For the righteous God tests the hearts and minds.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpăt! Ih boih Kră Yang lăng lăm jơhngơ̆m kon bơngai, Apinh Ih pơtôch lê̆ dôm tơdrong kơnê̆ lu bơngai kơnê̆ wă pơm. Mă-lei pơm bĕ kơ lu bơngai tơpăt mă kơjăp.

English: My defense is of God, Who saves the upright in heart.
Bahnar: Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei jơ̆ khêl inh, Sư dŏng pơklaih lu bơngai đei jơhngơ̆m tơpăt.

English: God is a just judge, And God is angry with the wicked every day.
Bahnar: Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei jơ̆ Kră Yang sek tơlang tơpăt, Mă-lei rim năr Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei oei hil.

English: If he does not turn back, He will sharpen His sword; He bends His bow and makes it ready.
Bahnar: Tơdah lu bơngai kơnê̆ ưh kơ tơbral, Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei gô pat đao Sư, Hơ'năk lê̆ hră Sư răp tơ noh

English: He also prepares for Himself instruments of death; He makes His arrows into fiery shafts.
Bahnar: Sư hơmet lê̆ khêl đao wă pơlôch, Sư hơmet 'brơ̆m ŭnh.

English: Behold, the wicked brings forth iniquity; Yes, he conceives trouble and brings forth falsehood.
Bahnar: To lu sư anăp tơdrong kơnê̆, oei găn tơdrong kơnê̆ na hơiơch tơdrong hơlĕnh

English: He made a pit and dug it out, And has fallen into the ditch which he made.
Bahnar: Sư sir sơlŭng kôch jrŭ, Na lu sư huŏng tơ lăm hơlŭng đêl lu sư sir.

English: His trouble shall return upon his own head, And his violent dealing shall come down on his own crown.
Bahnar: Tơdrong lu sư pơm gô tuh tơ lu sư kơdih. Tơdrong kơnê̆ lu sư kư̆m tuh tơ kơ̆l lu sư.

English: I will praise the LORD according to His righteousness, And will sing praise to the name of the LORD Most High.
Bahnar: Inh gô bơnê kơ Kră Yang yua kơ tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt Sư Inh gô hơri bơnê kơ Anăn Kră Yang, jơ̆ Kră Yang tih hloh.

English: O LORD, our Lord, How excellent is Your name in all the earth, Who have set Your glory above the heavens!
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Ih boih Kră Yang lu nhôn, Anăn Ih 'lơ̆ng rŏ jơ̆p kơ lăm teh đak; Tơdrong ư-ang rang mơnhal Ih jơ̆p tơ kơpal plĕnh!

English: Out of the mouth of babes and nursing infants You have ordained strength, Because of Your enemies, That You may silence the enemy and the avenger.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r lu hơ'lơ̆p iĕ lu oei mŏm, Ih pơjing pơlei kơjăp, yua kơ lu ayăt. Wă pơm kơ lu bơngai ayăt păng lu iung kơting jing hreh.

English: When I consider Your heavens, the work of Your fingers, The moon and the stars, which You have ordained
Bahnar: Dah inh lăng tơ plĕnh đơ̆ng lu hơnglâu ti Ih pơjing Măt khei păng lu sơnglŏng mă Ih đei pơjing boih.

English: What is man that You are mindful of him, And the son of man that You visit him?
Bahnar: Kon bơngai noh kiơ na Ih mah tơchĕng 'blŏk? Kon bơngai noh kiơ, na Ih mah wei wêr sư.

English: For You have made him a little lower than the angels, And You have crowned him with glory and honor.
Bahnar: Kră Yang pơjing kon bơngai hơtuch 'biơ̆ kơ Ih,a pơyơ̆l ăn kơ lu sư tơdrong ư-ang păng đei pơyom.

English: You have made him to have dominion over the works of Your hands; You have put all things under his feet
Bahnar: Ih jao ăn kơ kon bơngai pơgơ̆r wei-lăng dôm tơmam đơ̆ng tơpang ti Ih pơjing, ăn kơ lu kon sem, tơmam chu đep tơ ala jơ̆ng kon bơngai.

English: All sheep and oxen— Even the beasts of the field
Bahnar: Đĭ lu triu, rơmo, hăm lu sem bri.

English: The birds of the air, And the fish of the sea That pass through the paths of the seas.
Bahnar: Đĭ kơ lu sem păr tơ plĕnh hăm đĭ lu ka glơi tơ lăm trong đak dơsĭ sŭng.

English: O LORD, our Lord, How excellent is Your name in all the earth!
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Kră Yang lu nhôn, anăn Ih jing ư-ang jơ̆p-jang tơ ala teh đak.

English: I will praise You, O LORD, with my whole heart; I will tell of all Your marvelous works.
Bahnar: Inh gô bơnê kơ Ih. Ơ Kră Yang, hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m, Inh gô ră roi dôm tơdrong jang hlĭch chrơp Ih

English: I will be glad and rejoice in You; I will sing praise to Your name, O Most High.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang Tih Hloh, inh gô chơt 'nă hal lăm Ih, păng hơri bơnê kơ Anăn Ih

English: When my enemies turn back, They shall fall and perish at Your presence.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai ayăt kơ inh kơdŭn tơ rŏng, lu sư gô pơ̆k hiong răm, 'bơ̆t anăp Ih

English: For You have maintained my right and my cause; You sat on the throne judging in righteousness.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Ih wei dŏng păng ăn kơ inh gơh jei; Ih oei tơ kơpal tang-dŏ pơtao sek tơlang tơpăt.

English: You have rebuked the nations, You have destroyed the wicked; You have blotted out their name forever and ever.
Bahnar: Kră Yang, Ih hil chrih boih rim teh đak pơrăm boih lu bơngai kơnê̆, Ih sut lê̆ boih dôm anăn lu sư ling-lang hlŏng hloi.

English: O enemy, destructions are finished forever! And you have destroyed cities; Even their memory has perished.
Bahnar: Lu ayăt tôch đĭ boih, hiong răm đĭ ling-lang hlŏng hloi Ih pơrăm lê̆ boih pơlei lu sư, Ưh pă đei bu 'blŏk kơ lu sư dơ̆ng.

English: But the LORD shall endure forever; He has prepared His throne for judgment.
Bahnar: Mă-lei Kră Yang pơtao pơgơ̆r ling-lang; Kră Yang sư hơmet boih tang-dŏ pơtao Sư wă sek tơlang

English: He shall judge the world in righteousness, And He shall administer judgment for the peoples in uprightness.
Bahnar: Sư gô sek tơlang kơ teh đak hăm tơdrong tơpăt, Sư pơgơ̆r tơpăt na sek tơlang kon bơngai hăm tơdrong trŏ.

English: The LORD also will be a refuge for the oppressed, A refuge in times of trouble.
Bahnar: Kră Yang jơ̆ anih kơ'nơp tih kơ bu mă đe pơjuă pơđep. Minh anih kơ'nơp tih lăm năr đei gleh truh

English: And those who know Your name will put their trust in You; For You, LORD, have not forsaken those who seek You.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu băt anăn Ih gô gơnang kơ Ih; Yua kơ Ih ưh kơ achăng lê̆ ôh, bơngai bu chơchă Ih.

English: Sing praises to the LORD, who dwells in Zion! Declare His deeds among the people.
Bahnar: Hơri bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang, Tơ'ngla oei lăm pơlei Siôn; Roi tơbăt kơ kon pơlei pơla tơdrong tih Sư pơm

English: When He avenges blood, He remembers them; He does not forget the cry of the humble.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Tơ'ngla iung kơting pham 'blŏk kơ lu bơngai mă pơmat-tat. Sư ưh kơ đei hiơt ôh tơdrong lu sư nhơ̆m ôr.

English: Have mercy on me, O LORD! Consider my trouble from those who hate me, You who lift me up from the gates of death
Bahnar: Kră Yang ơi, mơnat bĕ kơ inh, Lăng bĕ tơdrong pơmat-tat đơ̆ng lu bơngai areh kơ inh, pơm kơ inh. Ơ Kră Yang mă pôk hơtŏk inh hlôi kơ 'măng jang tơdrong lôch Lăng bĕ tơdrong pơmat-tat inh, Mă đơ̆ng đe areh kơ inh

English: That I may tell of all Your praise In the gates of the daughter of Zion. I will rejoice in Your salvation.
Bahnar: Tơ 'măng jang kon hơdruh Siôn. Inh ră roi đĭ dôm tơdrong 'mêm bơnê kơ Ih, Păng gô chơt hiôk lăm tơdrong Ih dŏng pơklaih

English: The nations have sunk down in the pit which they made; In the net which they hid, their own foot is caught.
Bahnar: Lu kon pơlei pơla huŏng boih lăm sơlŭng đơ̆ng lu sư sir; Jơ̆ng lu sư đom boih lăm hơnhuăl đêl lu sư dăng

English: The LORD is known by the judgment He executes; The wicked is snared in the work of his own hands. Meditation. Selah
Bahnar: Kră Yang pơdah boih Sư kơdih; đơ̆ng sek tơlang tơpăt; lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆, 'leh boih lăm hơnhuăl đơ̆ng ti lu sư dăng kơdih. Higaiôn Sêla

English: The wicked shall be turned into hell, And all the nations that forget God.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ gô huŏng tơ pơlei lu lôch, Păng đĭ lu bơngai mă hiơt kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: For the needy shall not always be forgotten; The expectation of the poor shall not perish forever.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơmat-tat đe ưh kơ đei hiơt ling-lang ôh, Păng lu bơngai răm-'băm kư̆m ưh kơ hiong tơdrong hơmĕng ling-lang mơ̆n

English: Arise, O LORD, Do not let man prevail; Let the nations be judged in Your sight.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang iung bĕ. 'Nĕ ăn jei kon bơngai ôh, Sek tơlang bĕ kơ đĭ kon bơngai 'bơ̆t anăp Ih

English: Put them in fear, O LORD, That the nations may know themselves to be but men. Selah
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, pơm bĕ kơ lu sư hli, Ăn kơ kon bơngai băt, sư jing bơngai hmă đĕch. Sêla

English: Why do You stand afar off, O LORD? Why do You hide in times of trouble?
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, yua kơ kiơ Ih dơ̆ng ataih, Kơplah đei tơdrong pơmat-tat liơ Ih ôn akâu?

English: The wicked in his pride persecutes the poor; Let them be caught in the plots which they have devised.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai kơnê̆, hăm tơdrong pơang lu sư druh lu dơnuh răm; Ăn kơ lu sư 'leh lăm hơđong mă lu sư đăk.

English: For the wicked boasts of his heart’s desire; He blesses the greedy and renounces the LORD.
Bahnar: Yua kơ lu bơngai kơnê̆ pơư kơdih kơ tơdrong lu sư 'maih wă; Lu bơngai ham kơ tơmam, achăng lê̆ păng pơjăm Kră Yang.

English: The wicked in his proud countenance does not seek God; God is in none of his thoughts.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai kơnê̆ pơang, ưh kơ wă chă Kră Yang. Đĭ tơdrong sư tơchĕng khan ưh kơ đei Kră Yang ôh.

English: His ways are always prospering; Your judgments are far above, out of his sight; As for all his enemies, he sneers at them.
Bahnar: Trong sư đei jinga ling-lang; Tơdrong Ih sek tơlang Kră Yang tih tơpă hloh kơ, măt lu sư 'bôh; Sư hiĕk pơjăm đĭ-đăng lu ayăt kơ sư.

English: He has said in his heart, “I shall not be moved; I shall never be in adversity.”
Bahnar: Sư tơchĕng lăm jơhngơ̆m khan: “Inh ưh pă tơdrŏ tơdrĕnh; Lăm chăl inh ưh kơ đei tơdrong kiơ truh gleh.”

English: His mouth is full of cursing and deceit and oppression; Under his tongue is trouble and iniquity.
Bahnar: 'Bơ̆r sư 'bĕnh kơ blei hiap, hơlĕnh pơdăr pơjăm pơjuă. Lăm hơpiĕt sư băt pơdăr păng pơm kơnê̆.

English: He sits in the lurking places of the villages; In the secret places he murders the innocent; His eyes are secretly fixed on the helpless.
Bahnar: Sư oei răp jê̆ pơlei, pơlôch bơngai ưh kơ đei yoch, lăm anih hlơp; Măt lu sư răp lăng wă pơm kơ lu bơngai pơmat-tat.

English: He lies in wait secretly, as a lion in his den; He lies in wait to catch the poor; He catches the poor when he draws him into his net.
Bahnar: Sư ôn lăm anih hlơp thoi dăm-brang oei lăm trôm sơlŭng sư, Sư oei răp wă rôp lu bơngai dơnuh răm. Sư răp bơngai dơnuh răm puh lăm hơnhuăl sư, na rôp hloi lu sư.

English: So he crouches, he lies low, That the helpless may fall by his strength.
Bahnar: Sư kŭp drap, na lu bơngai dơnuh răm huŏng lăm tơdrong kơtang.

English: He has said in his heart, “God has forgotten; He hides His face; He will never see.”
Bahnar: Sư khan lăm jơhngơ̆m. “Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei hiơt boih, Kră Yang ôn muh măt Sư, lăng pă 'bôh boih.”

English: Arise, O LORD! O God, lift up Your hand! Do not forget the humble.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Iung bĕ Ih, Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, yơ̆r ti Ih bĕ; 'Nĕ hiơt kơ bơngai răm-'băm.

English: Why do the wicked renounce God? He has said in his heart, “You will not require an account.”
Bahnar: Yua kơ kiơ lu bơngai kơnê̆ blei hiap Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei? Păng khan: “Kră Yang ưh pă đei wă phak pơmat inh boih,”

English: But You have seen, for You observe trouble and grief, To repay it by Your hand. The helpless commits himself to You; You are the helper of the fatherless.
Bahnar: Kră Yang 'bôh boih, tơdrong răm, pơmat-tat hăm tơdrong gleh, Na ti Ih pơm tơwih kơ lu sư. Lu bơngai răm-'băm jao akâu lu sư tơ Kră Yang; Kră Yang jơ̆ Tơ'ngla tơgŭm lu bơngai mơti.

English: Break the arm of the wicked and the evil man; Seek out his wickedness until You find none.
Bahnar: Gơ̆ bĕ kơkŏng ti lu bơngai kơnê̆, păng pơrăm tơdrong kơnê̆ lu bơngai yoch, dĭng pă 'bôh 'bơ̆t anăp Ih.

English: The LORD is King forever and ever; The nations have perished out of His land.
Bahnar: Kră Yang boih Pơtao ling-lang hlŏng hloi; Lu teh đak gô pơrăm đĭ đơ̆ng dêh char sư.

English: LORD, You have heard the desire of the humble; You will prepare their heart; You will cause Your ear to hear
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Ih mơ̆ng boih nơ̆r lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt 'maih wă. Ih pơm ăn kơ jơhngơ̆m lu sư kơjăp, Ih pơgling đon mơ̆ng lu sư

English: To do justice to the fatherless and the oppressed, That the man of the earth may oppress no more.
Bahnar: Wă pơm tơdrong tơpăt kơ lu mơti kơ 'bă păng lu bơngai mă đe pơjuă pơđep. Wă kơ lu kon bơngai mă lĕch đơ̆ng 'mui teh, ưh pă pơm tơhli băl dơ̆ng.

English: In the LORD I put my trust; How can you say to my soul, “Flee as a bird to your mountain”?
Bahnar: Inh gơnang kơ Kră Yang; Liơ Ih khan kơ inh: “Athei tŏk ôn tơ kông thoi sem?

English: For look! The wicked bend their bow, They make ready their arrow on the string, That they may shoot secretly at the upright in heart.
Bahnar: Yua kơ to, lu bơngai kơnê̆ gŭt hră, tah 'brơ̆m 'bơ̆t tơlei. Wă prah đơ̆ng lăm măng mu, tơ jơhngơ̆m lu bơngai đei đon tơpăt.

English: If the foundations are destroyed, What can the righteous do?
Bahnar: Tơdah hơnă hnam hơlih boih. Bơngai tơpăt gô pơm thoi yơ?”

English: The LORD is in His holy temple, The LORD’s throne is in heaven; His eyes behold, His eyelids test the sons of men.
Bahnar: Kră Yang oei tơ Anih 'lơ̆ng rơgoh Sư; Tang-dŏ Pơtao Sư tơ plĕnh ti; Măt Sư nger lăng, Gơnur măt Sư tưk lăng kơchăm tơ kon bơngai

English: The LORD tests the righteous, But the wicked and the one who loves violence His soul hates.
Bahnar: Kră Yang pơlong lăng lu bơngai tơpăt; Mă-lei jơhngơ̆ma Sư areh kơ bơngai kơnê̆ păng lu bơngai pơm kư̆ kă.

English: Upon the wicked He will rain coals; Fire and brimstone and a burning wind Shall be the portion of their cup.
Bahnar: Sư gô tuh ngar ŭnh tơmo ngŭr tơ lu bơngai kơnê̆, Kial tŏ hang tuh ăn kơ lu sư.

English: For the LORD is righteous, He loves righteousness; His countenance beholds the upright.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Kră Yang 'Lơ̆ng tơpăt; Sư 'mêm kơ tơdrong tơpăt: Lu bơngai mă tơpăt gô lăng 'bôh muh măt Sư.

English: Help, LORD, for the godly man ceases! For the faithful disappear from among the sons of men.
Bahnar: Kră Yang; apinh Ih dŏng lu nhôn, Yua kơ lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ưh pă đei boih, Ưh pă đei lu tơpăt lăm kon bơngai.

English: They speak idly everyone with his neighbor; With flattering lips and a double heart they speak.
Bahnar: Lu sư pơma hơlĕnh pơdăr pơma tơduă lu sư, 'bơ̆r pơma pơ'brơh jơhngơ̆m 'bar trong nơ̆r pơma.

English: May the LORD cut off all flattering lips, And the tongue that speaks proud things
Bahnar: Apinh Kră Yang pơtôch đĭ lu bơngai pơma che bơle, Păng lu hơpiĕt mă pơma pơang

English: Who have said, “With our tongue we will prevail; Our lips are our own; Who is lord over us?”
Bahnar: Lu bơngai noh khan: “Yua kơ đơ̆ng hơpiĕt gô jei bơ̆n; 'Bơ̆r lu bơ̆n kơdih: Bu pơm yŏng bơ̆n?”

English: “For the oppression of the poor, for the sighing of the needy, Now I will arise,” says the LORD; “I will set him in the safety for which he yearns.”
Bahnar: Yua kơ đe pơjuă lu bơngai răm-'băm păng lu dơnuh hin ôr krao, Kră Yang khan: “Dang ei Inh gô iung, Inh gô ăn kơ lu sư oei hiôk-hian kiơ̆ thoi lu sư krao apinh.”

English: The words of the LORD are pure words, Like silver tried in a furnace of earth, Purified seven times.
Bahnar: Dôm nơ̆r Kră Yang jơ̆ nơ̆r rơgoh, Thoi jên hu rơgoh đe rơ̆ lăm ŭnh rơ̆ tơpơh wơ̆t.

English: You shall keep them, O LORD, You shall preserve them from this generation forever.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Ih boih wei-lăng lu bơngai răm-'băm. Wei-lăng lu sư đơ̆ng chăl dang ei dĭng truh tơ ning-mônh hloi.b

English: The wicked prowl on every side, When vileness is exalted among the sons of men.
Bahnar: Na lu bơngai kơnê̆ gô năm tơ jơ̆p puăn pah dêh. Dah tơdrong kơnê̆ gô pơyom hloh kơ lăm kon bơngai.

English: How long, O LORD? Will You forget me forever? How long will You hide Your face from me?
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Ih gô hiơt kơ inh dĭng dang yơ? Wă hiơt hlŏng hloi hă? Dĭng dang yơ Ih ôn muh măt Ih kơ inh?

English: How long shall I take counsel in my soul, Having sorrow in my heart daily? How long will my enemy be exalted over me?
Bahnar: Bơhngol inh oei wă pơmat-tat dĭng dang yơ? Lăm jơhngơ̆m inh đei ơh sơ'ngon rim năr. Bơngai ayăt kơ inh pôk hơtŏk hloh kơ inh dĭng dang yơ?

English: Consider and hear me, O LORD my God; Enlighten my eyes, Lest I sleep the sleep of death
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh apinh Ih lăng inh păng tơl nơ̆r inh, Pơih ăn măt inh hơdah, Hli kơ inh tep lăm lôch răm

English: Lest my enemy say, “I have prevailed against him”; Lest those who trouble me rejoice when I am moved.
Bahnar: Hli kơ bơngai ayăt kơ inh khan: “Sư noh jei inh boih.” Lu ayăt kơ inh 'nă hal wă inh pơ̆k huŏng.

English: But I have trusted in Your mercy; My heart shall rejoice in Your salvation.
Bahnar: Mă-lei inh gơnang kơ tơdrong 'mêm Ih. Jơhngơ̆m inh chhôk hal kơ tơdrong Ih dŏng pơklaih

English: I will sing to the LORD, Because He has dealt bountifully with me.
Bahnar: Inh gô hơri bơnê kơ Kră Yang, yua kơ Sư pơm 'lơ̆ng kơ inh.

English: The fool has said in his heart, “There is no God.” They are corrupt, They have done abominable works, There is none who does good.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai kơtul khan lăm jơhngơ̆m; “Ưh kơ đei Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei.”* Lu sư ôm răm, pơm dôm tơdrong kơnê̆.

English: The LORD looks down from heaven upon the children of men, To see if there are any who understand, who seek God.
Bahnar: Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei nger lăng đơ̆ng plĕnh ti tơ kon bơngai. Wă lăng hăm đei bu gơh băt. Chơchă Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei ưh?

English: They have all turned aside, They have together become corrupt; There is none who does good, No, not one.
Bahnar: Đĭ-đăng weh tơklah băl, lu sư hiong răm đĭ. Ưh kơ đei bu pơm 'lơ̆ng, Hoh-hoy 'nhŏ kơ minh 'nu.

English: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge, Who eat up my people as they eat bread, And do not call on the LORD?
Bahnar: Hăm trŏ kơ đĭ-đăng lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆, ưh kơ đei đon băt? Na lu sư luăn sa kon pơlei Inh nhen thoi sa 'bĕng. Păng kư̆m ưh kơ đei apinh Kră Yang ôh.

English: There they are in great fear, For God is with the generation of the righteous.
Bahnar: Lu sư gô đei tơdrong hli krưp tơpă, Yua kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei oei hơdai hăm lu bơngai tơpăt.

English: You shame the counsel of the poor, But the LORD is his refuge.
Bahnar: Lu iĕm pơrăm tơdrong lu bơngai dơnuh tơdă, Mă-lei Kră Yang jơ̆ anih lu sư kơ'nơp.

English: Oh, that the salvation of Israel would come out of Zion! When the LORD brings back the captivity of His people, Let Jacob rejoice and Israel be glad.
Bahnar: Ơ rŏ kơ đơ̆ng pơlei Siôn tơdrong pơklaih lu bơngai Isơrael jah truh! Kơplah Kră Yang chông ba lu bơnă pơlei pơla Sư brŏk, Kơplah noh Jakôp gô chhôk hơnôk păng lu bơngai Isơrael gô 'nă hal.

English: LORD, who may abide in Your tabernacle? Who may dwell in Your holy hill?
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, bu gô oei lăm Hnam Yang Ih? Bu gô oei tơ kông rơgoh Ih?

English: He who walks uprightly, And works righteousness, And speaks the truth in his heart
Bahnar: Lu bơngai yak kiơ̆ trong tơpăt, pơm tơdrong trŏ. Sư pơma tơpăt lăm jơhngơ̆m sư

English: He who does not backbite with his tongue, Nor does evil to his neighbor, Nor does he take up a reproach against his friend
Bahnar: Bu mă hơpiĕt huay kơ hơwơ̆t kư̆ kă, Ưh kơ đei pơrăm bôl buăl, Ưh kơ đei pơm mơlâu kơ lu rông 'bôt

English: In whose eyes a vile person is despised, But he honors those who fear the LORD; He who swears to his own hurt and does not change
Bahnar: Sư areh kơ bơngai pơm kơnê̆, Mă-lei sư pơyom kơ lu bơngai mă chu yom kơ Kră Yang; Sư pơkă, ưh kơ đei tơplih ôh, mă khan đei tơdrong răm kơ akâu sư ră

English: He who does not put out his money at usury, Nor does he take a bribe against the innocent. He who does these things shall never be moved.
Bahnar: Sư ăn kơ đe iŏk mưng jên mă-lei huay kơ chă lơi, Ưh kơ wă iŏk sa pơgâm, wă pơrăm lu bơngai tơpăt. Bơngai bu mă pơm thoi noh ưh kơ hli tơtơ̆.

English: Preserve me, O God, for in You I put my trust.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei! Wei inh, Yua kơ inh kơ'nơp lăm Ih.

English: O my soul, you have said to the LORD, “You are my Lord, My goodness is nothing apart from You.”
Bahnar: Inh đei khan păng Kră Yang boih: “Ih boih Kră Yang inh. 'Nguaih kơ Ih inh ưh kơ đei pŭn hiôka nai dơ̆ng.”

English: As for the saints who are on the earth, “They are the excellent ones, in whom is all my delight.”
Bahnar: Lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh kơpal teh păng lu bơngai đe pơyom. Lăm lu sư inh đei chơt hiôk.

English: Their sorrows shall be multiplied who hasten after another god; Their drink offerings of blood I will not offer, Nor take up their names on my lips.
Bahnar: Tơdrong ơh sơ'ngon lu bơngai pơyơ̆r kiơ̆ yang nai gô rai dêh. Inh ưh kơ pơyơ̆r ôh, pham tơmam soi kơ lu sư.

English: O LORD, You are the portion of my inheritance and my cup; You maintain my lot.
Bahnar: Kră Yang jơ̆ mŭk inh yua păng kơchŏkb inh nhă: Ih boih wei-lăng chăl arih inh.

English: The lines have fallen to me in pleasant places; Yes, I have a good inheritance.
Bahnar: Pŭn dêh kơ inh đei teh yua lăm anih 'lơ̆ng, Tơpă, inh đei tơmam yua 'măn kơ inh 'lơ̆ng tơpă.

English: I will bless the LORD who has given me counsel; My heart also instructs me in the night seasons.
Bahnar: Inh bơnê ư-ang kơ Kră Yang, Tơ'ngla bơtho tơ'bôh ăn kơ inh. Kơmăng jơhngơ̆m inh kư̆m bơtho inh.

English: I have set the LORD always before me; Because He is at my right hand I shall not be moved.
Bahnar: Inh 'măn Kră Yang ling-lang 'bơ̆t anăp inh; Inh ưh kơ đei hli kiơ, yua kơ Sư oei gah 'ma kơ inh.

English: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoices; My flesh also will rest in hope.
Bahnar: Yua kơ noh jơhngơ̆m inh chơt hiôk, bơhngol inh 'nă hal; Akâu akar inh gô pơdơh, hiôk-hian

English: For You will not leave my soul in Sheol, Nor will You allow Your Holy One to see corruption.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Ih ưh kơ achăng lê̆ bơhngol inh tơ lăm bơsat. Kŭm huay kơ ăn lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh Ih 'bôh tơdrong ôm răm

English: You will show me the path of life; In Your presence is fullness of joy; At Your right hand are pleasures forevermore.
Bahnar: Ih gô tơ'bôh ăn kơ inh trong tơdrong arih; 'Bơ̆t anăp Ih 'bĕnh hăm tơdrong chhôk hal. Gah 'ma kơ Kră Yang đei tơdrong chơt hiôk ling-lang khŏm khŏm.

English: Hear a just cause, O LORD, Attend to my cry; Give ear to my prayer which is not from deceitful lips.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Apinh Ih mơ̆ng tơdrong tơpăt, Mơ̆ng pơnhen nơ̆r inh krao chă; Apinh pơgling đon Ih mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh krao khan. Đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r ưh kơ hơlĕnh.

English: Let my vindication come from Your presence; Let Your eyes look on the things that are upright.
Bahnar: Ăn tơdrong inh pơm trŏ lĕch đơ̆ng anăp Ih; Apinh măt Ih lăng tơdrong tơpăt inh.

English: You have tested my heart; You have visited me in the night; You have tried me and have found nothing; I have purposed that my mouth shall not transgress.
Bahnar: Kră Yang lăng boih jơhngơ̆m inh, năm lăng inh kiơ̆ kơmăng;a Đei pơlong inh, mă-lei ưh kơ đei 'bôh kiơ; Inh đei pơkă 'bơ̆r inh ưh kơ pơm yoch.b

English: Concerning the works of men, By the word of Your lips, I have kept away from the paths of the destroyer.
Bahnar: Gah tơdrong jang kon bơngai pơm, đơ̆ng nơ̆r 'bơ̆r Ih khan, na inh gơh klaih huay kơ kiơ̆ lu trong bơngai kơnê̆.

English: Uphold my steps in Your paths, That my footsteps may not slip.
Bahnar: Inh yak năm kơjăp lăm trong Ih, Jơ̆ng inh ưh kơ tơpling.

English: I have called upon You, for You will hear me, O God; Incline Your ear to me, and hear my speech.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, inh Krao apinh Ih, Yua kơ Ih gô tơl tơwih nơ̆r inh krao khan. Apinh Ih pơgling đon mơ̆ng inh krao khan.

English: Show Your marvelous lovingkindness by Your right hand, O You who save those who trust in You From those who rise up against them.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang Apinh Ih pơdah tơdrong 'mêm hlĭch chrơp Ih, kơ bu mă năm ôn akâu sư tơ ti 'ma Ih. Đơ̆ng lu bơngai mă ayăt kơ lu sư.

English: Keep me as the apple of Your eye; Hide me under the shadow of Your wings
Bahnar: Apinh Ih bơwei inh thoi bơwei kon-ngai lăm măt Ih, Apinh krôp inh ala pơnăr Ih Kră Yang.

English: From the wicked who oppress me, From my deadly enemies who surround me.
Bahnar: Wă kơ inh klaih đơ̆ng lu bơngai wă pơrăm inh, Păng klaih đơ̆ng lu ayăt kơnê̆ oei wang tăp kơ inh.

English: They have closed up their fat hearts; With their mouths they speak proudly.
Bahnar: Lu sư chĭt lê̆ jơhngơ̆m mơnat sư;c 'Bơ̆r lu sư pơma pơang.

English: They have now surrounded us in our steps; They have set their eyes, crouching down to the earth
Bahnar: Lu sư wang tăp kơ nhôn rim yak boih, Măt lu sư oei lăng kơchăm tơ inh wă tơlơ̆ pơ̆k tơ teh.

English: As a lion is eager to tear his prey, And like a young lion lurking in secret places.
Bahnar: Lu sư thoi dăm-brang pơngot. Hơrum 'maih hek sa thoi kon dăm-brang oei răp lăm anih hlơp.

English: Arise, O LORD, Confront him, cast him down; Deliver my life from the wicked with Your sword
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, iung bĕ răp tơpơ̆k tơhuŏng lê̆ lu sư; Iŏk đao gưm han Ih dŏng pơklaih bơhngol inh klaih đơ̆ng lu bơngai kơnê̆.

English: With Your hand from men, O LORD, From men of the world who have their portion in this life, And whose belly You fill with Your hidden treasure. They are satisfied with children, And leave the rest of their possession for their babes.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, yua ti Ih dŏng pơklaih inh đơ̆ng lu kon bơngai. Lu bơngai arih lăm teh đak đĕch. Lu bơngai mă Ih pơm ăn kơ klak lu sư 'bĕnh hăm mŭk gĭt Ih;d Lu sư hiôk yua kơ kon lu sư, kư̆m đei 'măn lê̆ tơmam rơkah kơ kon sâu se sư.

English: As for me, I will see Your face in righteousness; I shall be satisfied when I awake in Your likeness.
Bahnar: Bĭ inh âu, lăm tơdrong tơpăt inh gô 'bôh muh măt Ih; Mưh hơđơ̆r, inh gô lăp đon lăng rup hơbŏ Ih.e

English: I will love You, O LORD, my strength.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh 'mêm kơ Ih boih jơhngơ̆m inh pran.

English: The LORD is my rock and my fortress and my deliverer; My God, my strength, in whom I will trust; My shield and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.
Bahnar: Kră Yang thoi tơmo pĕng inh, jing kơđông inh, Kră Yang dŏng pơklaih inh; Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei thoi tơmo pĕng inh, inh gô kơ'nơp tơ lăm Sư; khêl inh, hơke dŏng pơklaih inh păng anih kơjăp inh.

English: I will call upon the LORD, who is worthy to be praised; So shall I be saved from my enemies.
Bahnar: Kră Yang trŏ kơ bơ̆n kơkuh bơnê; inh gô krao apinh Sư, Na Sư gô pơklaih inh đơ̆ng lu ayăt.a

English: The pangs of death surrounded me, And the floods of ungodliness made me afraid.
Bahnar: Bră tơdrong lôch pơ̆n tăp dăr kơ inh boih, Đak tihb lơ̆p pơhoch lê̆ inh.

English: The sorrows of Sheol surrounded me; The snares of death confronted me.
Bahnar: Lu bră dêh atâu dăng tăp dăr kơ inh, Hơnhuăl tơdrong lôch dăng anăp inh.

English: In my distress I called upon the LORD, And cried out to my God; He heard my voice from His temple, And my cry came before Him, even to His ears.
Bahnar: Lăm năr hơnat hơnot inh krao chă Kră Yang. Inh krao apinh Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh: Đơ̆ng anih Pơtao Sư, Sư kơtơ̆ng nơ̆r inh, Păng nơ̆r inh krao truh tơ đon Sư.

English: Then the earth shook and trembled; The foundations of the hills also quaked and were shaken, Because He was angry.
Bahnar: Dang ei teh pơpơ̆ păng tơdrŏ, Na lu kông kư̆m tơrĭ păng kư̆m tơdrŏ, yua kơ Sư hil.

English: Smoke went up from His nostrils, And devouring fire from His mouth; Coals were kindled by it.
Bahnar: Đei 'nhui lĕch đơ̆ng trôm muh Sư, Pla ŭnh khơ̆ng lĕch đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r Sư, soh sa ngar ngŭr.

English: He bowed the heavens also, and came down With darkness under His feet.
Bahnar: Sư rĭ plĕnh, đơ̆ng noh jur;c Ala kơ jơ̆ng sư đei măng gueo.

English: And He rode upon a cherub, and flew; He flew upon the wings of the wind.
Bahnar: Sư hao chêrubim, na păr; Sư păr đông hăm pơnăr jơwa kial.

English: He made darkness His secret place; His canopy around Him was dark waters And thick clouds of the skies.
Bahnar: Sư pơm măng mu klơ̆p tăp dăr kơ Sư, Sư iŏk hơmơ̆l găm 'mi hơ'bơ̆l gueo gom tăp kơ Sư.

English: From the brightness before Him, His thick clouds passed with hailstones and coals of fire.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng lăm rang mơnhal 'bơ̆t anăp Sư, đei lu hơmơ̆l đông lĕch hloi 'mi prĕl păng ngar ŭnh ngŭr.

English: The LORD thundered from heaven, And the Most High uttered His voice, Hailstones and coals of fire.
Bahnar: Kră Yang Sư pơm grơ̆m glaih tơ kơpal plĕnh. Kră Yang kơpal hloh ăn kơ đe kơtơ̆ng nơ̆r Sư. Tơ lăm 'mi prĕl hăm ngar ŭnh ngŭr

English: He sent out His arrows and scattered the foe, Lightnings in abundance, and He vanquished them.
Bahnar: Sư prah 'brơ̆m pơm kơ lu ayăt kơ inh tơklah tơklang đĭ, Tơlĕch kơmlat pơm kơ lu sư mơnhal hơwơ̆l hơwang.

English: Then the channels of the sea were seen, The foundations of the world were uncovered At Your rebuke, O LORD, At the blast of the breath of Your nostrils.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, đơ̆ng nơ̆r Ih chrih, Kial lĕch đơ̆ng trôm muh Ih, na kơđĕl đak dơsĭ 'bôh hơnă teh đak kư̆m 'bôh bang.

English: He sent from above, He took me; He drew me out of many waters.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng kơpal plĕnh kơjung Sư chro ti rôp inh. Hiŏng hơtŏk inh hlôi đơ̆ng đak jrŭ.

English: He delivered me from my strong enemy, From those who hated me, For they were too strong for me.
Bahnar: Sư dŏng pơklaih inh đơ̆ng lu ayăt mă pran kơtang. Đơ̆ng lu bơngai areh kơ inh, yua kơ lu sư pran hloh kơ inh.

English: They confronted me in the day of my calamity, But the LORD was my support.
Bahnar: Lu sư bruh tơ inh, mă-lei Kră Yang dŏng tơgŭm inh, lăm năr inh anat anot.

English: He also brought me out into a broad place; He delivered me because He delighted in me.
Bahnar: Sư chông tơlĕch inh tơ anih să rơhơi. Dŏng inh, yua kơ Sư hiôk kơ inh.

English: The LORD rewarded me according to my righteousness; According to the cleanness of my hands He has recompensed me.
Bahnar: Kră Yang apah inh boih. Kiơ̆ thoi tơdrong tơpăt inh; sư pơdrâu tơwih kơ inh kiơ̆ thoi đêl ti inh rơgoh.

English: For I have kept the ways of the LORD, And have not wickedly departed from my God.
Bahnar: Yua kơ inh wei răk kiơ̆ trong Kră Yang, Ưh kơ đei pơm kơnê̆ achăng lê̆ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh.

English: For all His judgments were before me, And I did not put away His statutes from me.
Bahnar: Yua kơ dôm nơ̆r Sư tơtă oei 'bơ̆t anăp inh, Gah tơdrong juăt Sư, inh ưh kơ lê̆ ôh.

English: I was also blameless before Him, And I kept myself from my iniquity.
Bahnar: Inh oei 'lơ̆ng hơiă 'bơ̆t anăp Sư, Bơwei kơdih akâu huay kơ pơm kơnê̆

English: Therefore the LORD has recompensed me according to my righteousness, According to the cleanness of my hands in His sight.
Bahnar: Thoi noh, Kră Yang tơwih pơdrâu kơ inh kiơ̆ thoi tơdrong tơpăt inh, Apah inh kiơ̆ thoi tơdrong rơgoh đơ̆ng ti inh 'bơ̆t anăp Sư.

English: With the merciful You will show Yourself merciful; With a blameless man You will show Yourself blameless
Bahnar: Hăm lu đei đon lui, Ih gô tơ'bôh Ih boih Kră Yang sĭt. Hăm lu bơngai tơpăt, Ih boih Tơ'ngla tơpăt

English: With the pure You will show Yourself pure; And with the devious You will show Yourself shrewd.
Bahnar: Hăm lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh, Ih boih Tơ'ngla 'lơ̆ng rơgoh; Gah lu bơngai ưh kơ chu, Ih gô phak tơpă.

English: For You will save the humble people, But will bring down haughty looks.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Ih dŏng tơgŭm lu bơngai iŏk đon ala; Mă-lei Ih gô tơjur lu bơngai pơang.

English: For You will light my lamp; The LORD my God will enlighten my darkness.
Bahnar: Kră Yang tơ̆k ŭnh kơđeng inh khơ̆ng: Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, Pơchrang ăn lăm anih măng mu inh.

English: For by You I can run against a troop, By my God I can leap over a wall.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng Ih tơgŭm inh gô kĕ đơ̆ng lu tơpôl linh ayăt. Gơnang kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, đei pơplŏng hlôi kơ dur.

English: As for God, His way is perfect; The word of the LORD is proven; He is a shield to all who trust in Him.
Bahnar: Gah Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei rim trong Sư 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ngăl; Nơ̆r Kră Yang hlôi hơmet rơgoh boih. Sư boih khêl kơ đe bu wă kơ'nơp tơ Sư.

English: For who is God, except the LORD? And who is a rock, except our God?
Bahnar: 'Nguaih kơ Kră Yang, Bu dơ̆ng Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei? 'Nguaih kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, bu dơ̆ng thoi Tơmo tih?

English: It is God who arms me with strength, And makes my way perfect.
Bahnar: Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei tơ̆n ăn kơ inh hăm tơdrong pran kơtang, Păng pơm kơ trong inh dơnă.

English: He makes my feet like the feet of deer, And sets me on my high places.
Bahnar: Sư pơm kơ jơ̆ng inh hơbĕch thoi jơ̆ng juei akăn, Păng hơtŏk dan inh tơ anih kơjung.

English: He teaches my hands to make war, So that my arms can bend a bow of bronze.
Bahnar: Sư pơhrăm ti inh tơblah, Na kơkŏng inh kĕ gŭt hră kong

English: You have also given me the shield of Your salvation; Your right hand has held me up, Your gentleness has made me great.
Bahnar: Kră Yang ăn kơ inh khêl tơdrong dŏng pơklaih;d Ti gah 'ma Ih tơiung inh, Đơ̆ng tơdrong Ih dŏng na inh jing tih mơng.

English: You enlarged my path under me, So my feet did not slip.
Bahnar: Kră Yang pơih trong să tơ rim yak inh, Jơ̆nge inh huay kơ tơpling.

English: I have pursued my enemies and overtaken them; Neither did I turn back again till they were destroyed.
Bahnar: Inh druh rôp lu ayăt kơ inh, tam hloi; Inh ưh kơ wih brŏk ôh tơ rŏng, Dĭng inh pơrăm lu sư 'mơ̆i.

English: I have wounded them, So that they could not rise; They have fallen under my feet.
Bahnar: Inh 'bet lu sư mah klĕch dĭng lu sư mah pă kĕ iung dơ̆ng, Lu sư pơ̆k hloi tơ ala jơ̆ng inh.

English: For You have armed me with strength for the battle; You have subdued under me those who rose up against me.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Ih tơ̆n ăn kơ inh hăm tơdrong kơtang wă kơ tơblah, Ăn kơ bơngai ayăt kơ inh chu drap 'bơ̆t ala jơ̆ng inh.

English: You have also given me the necks of my enemies, So that I destroyed those who hated me.
Bahnar: Kră Yang ăn kơ lu ayăt kơ inh tơwih kơ inh rŏng; Păng lu bơngai hil areh kơ inh, Inh pơrăm đĭ.

English: They cried out, but there was none to save; Even to the LORD, but He did not answer them.
Bahnar: Lu sư ôr krao, mă-lei ưh kơ đei bu dŏng; Lu sư krao chă Kră Yang, mă-lei Sư ưh kơ tơl tơwih.

English: Then I beat them as fine as the dust before the wind; I cast them out like dirt in the streets.
Bahnar: Inh teh pơrăm lu sư hĕch hoch thoi 'mui teh kial pơbăr pơđông. Inh tuh lê̆f lu sư thoi rơnŭk rok trong.

English: You have delivered me from the strivings of the people; You have made me the head of the nations; A people I have not known shall serve me.
Bahnar: Ih pơklaih inh đơ̆ng tơdrong kon pơlei blah pơjah hăm inh; Ih pơjing inh pơm kơ̆l kơ đĭ-đăng teh đak. Minh adrĕch adrung inh mă ưh kơ băt kơ inh gô bơ̆jang kơ inh.

English: As soon as they hear of me they obey me; The foreigners submit to me.
Bahnar: Lăp Lu sư kơtơ̆ng gah inh; lu sư chu yom kơ inh; Lu bơngai tơmoi kư̆m gô chu kiơ̆ inh.

English: The foreigners fade away, And come frightened from their hideouts.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai tơmoi rơdu jơhngơ̆m, lu sư hli tơrơ lĕch đơ̆ng anih kơjăp lu sư ôn.

English: The LORD lives! Blessed be my Rock! Let the God of my salvation be exalted.
Bahnar: Kră Yang oei arih ling-lang, thoi tơmo pĕng, trŏ kơ bơ̆n kơkuh tơpă Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei Tơ'ngla pơklaih inh trŏ kơkuh pơyom

English: It is God who avenges me, And subdues the peoples under me
Bahnar: Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, blah dŏng inh. Ăn kơ kon pơlei lui yom kơ inh.

English: He delivers me from my enemies. You also lift me up above those who rise against me; You have delivered me from the violent man.
Bahnar: Sư dŏng pơklaih inh đơ̆ng lu ayăt; Tơpă Kră Yang hơtŏk inh jing kơjung hloh kơ lu ayăt kơ inh, Sư pơklaih inh đơ̆ng lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆.

English: Therefore I will give thanks to You, O LORD, among the Gentiles, And sing praises to Your name.
Bahnar: Thoi noh, Ơ Kră Yang, inh gô ư-ang kơ Ih lăm kon pơlei pơla, Păng hơri bơnê kơ Ih.

English: Great deliverance He gives to His king, And shows mercy to His anointed, To David and his descendants forevermore.
Bahnar: Kră Yang ăn kơ pơtao Sư jei jơneig tih tơpă, Sư ăn tơdrong mơnat kơ bơngai mă Sư tuh đak rơmă, kơ Đawit, Păng kơ lu kon, sâu sư ling-lang hloi.

English: The heavens declare the glory of God; And the firmament shows His handiwork.
Bahnar: Lu hơtăl plĕnh ră roi tơdrong ư-ang Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, Tơ plĕnh ti tơ'bôh tơdrong jang đơ̆ng ti Sư pơm.

English: Day unto day utters speech, And night unto night reveals knowledge.
Bahnar: Năr âu pơma bơtho kơ năr dơning, Măng âu tơ'bôh tơbăt kơ măng đơ̆ng rŏng.

English: There is no speech nor language Where their voice is not heard.
Bahnar: Ưh kơ đei nơ̆r pơma, ưh kơ đei jơwa re; Kŭm ưh kơ đei bu kơtơ̆ng nơ̆r lu sư.a

English: Their line has gone out through all the earth, And their words to the end of the world. In them He has set a tabernacle for the sun
Bahnar: Mă-lei nơ̆r lu sư pơma truh jơ̆p-jang kơ teh đak, Păng nơ̆r lu sư kơtơ̆ng truh tôch teh đak.b Tơ plĕnh Kră Yang pơm hnam bơsŭn ăn kơ măt 'năr boih

English: Which is like a bridegroom coming out of his chamber, And rejoices like a strong man to run its race.
Bahnar: Măt 'năr noh thoi ŏng di 'nao lĕch đơ̆ng anih pơkong. Chhôk hal kơdâu thoi bơngai nuih pran.

English: Its rising is from one end of heaven, And its circuit to the other end; And there is nothing hidden from its heat.
Bahnar: Măt 'năr lĕch đơ̆ng plĕnh âu, năm dăr truh tơ jơ̆ng plĕnh gah to, Ưh kơ đei kiơ mă gơh weh đơ̆ng yuh tŏ măt 'năr.

English: The law of the LORD is perfect, converting the soul; The testimony of the LORD is sure, making wise the simple
Bahnar: Khôi juăt đơ̆ng Kră Yang jơ̆ 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, pơrih ăn bơhngol inh, c Kră Yang khan sĭt tơpă, pơm ăn kơ bơngai kơtul jing hơgei.

English: The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart; The commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes
Bahnar: Tơdrong Kră Yang athei jơ̆ tơpăt, Pơm ăn kơ jơhngơ̆m chơt hiôk. Nơ̆r tơtă Kră Yang jơ̆ rơgoh, pơm ăn kơ măt đe hơdah hơdong.

English: The fear of the LORD is clean, enduring forever; The judgments of the LORD are true and righteous altogether.
Bahnar: Hli yom kơ Kră Yang jơ̆ 'lơ̆ng rơgoh, oei oei truh tơ ning-mônh, Dôm tơdrong Kră Yang pơkă jơ̆ sĭt tơpă, đĭ-đăng trŏ ngăl.

English: More to be desired are they than gold, Yea, than much fine gold; Sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong noh gĭt hloh kơ maih, gĭt hloh kơ ling maih; Kŭm 'ngam hloh kơ đak sut đơ̆ng hơkoh sư.

English: Moreover by them Your servant is warned, And in keeping them there is great reward.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng tơdrong noh bơtho ăn kơ đĭch đam Kră Yang hlôh wao; Bu bơwei, sư đei apah tih tơpă.

English: Who can understand his errors? Cleanse me from secret faults.
Bahnar: Bu băt kơdih đei yoch glăi? Apinh Kră Yang mơnat tơdrong yoch mă inh ưh kơ băt.

English: Keep back Your servant also from presumptuous sins; Let them not have dominion over me. Then I shall be blameless, And I shall be innocent of great transgression.
Bahnar: Apinh Kră Yang bơwei lu đĭch đam Ih huay kơ pơrơ̆ng pơm yoch,d 'Nĕ ăn tơdrong yoch noh pơgơ̆r inh; na Ih huay chrih kơ inh, Păng huay kơ pơm tơdrong yoch tih.

English: Let the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart Be acceptable in Your sight, O LORD, my strength and my Redeemer.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ nơ̆r pơma đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r inh, Ơ Kră Yang Ih jơ̆ thoi tơmo pĕng inh, Păng jơ̆ Kră Yang dŏng pơklaih inh, Hăm tơdrong tơchĕng đơ̆ng lăm jơhngơ̆m inh jing 'lơ̆ng pơm kơ Ih lăp đon!

English: May the LORD answer you in the day of trouble; May the name of the God of Jacob defend you
Bahnar: Apinh Kră Yang tơl tơwih nơ̆r ih kơplah năr đei anat anot! Ăn kơ anăn Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei Jakôp wei-lăng ih.

English: May He send you help from the sanctuary, And strengthen you out of Zion
Bahnar: Apinh đơ̆ng anih rơgoh, gơih ăn tơdrong tơgŭm ih Păng đơ̆ng Siôn tơgŭm dŏng ih

English: May He remember all your offerings, And accept your burnt sacrifice. Selah
Bahnar: Apinh Kră Yang 'blŏk kơ dôm tơmam ih soi. Păng iŏk dôm tơmam soi pơyơ̆r. Sêla

English: May He grant you according to your heart’s desire, And fulfill all your purpose.
Bahnar: Apinh Kră Yang ăn kơ ih dôm jơhngơ̆m hơpơi wă, Păng pơkeh dôm tơdrong ih tơchĕng wă pơm!

English: We will rejoice in your salvation, And in the name of our God we will set up our banners! May the LORD fulfill all your petitions.
Bahnar: Lu nhôn chơt hiôk yua kơ ăn jei pơtao,a Apinh hăm anăn Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei lu nhôn, yơ̆r kơjung hla-kơ lu nhôn. Apinh Kră Yang pơm keh dôm tơdrong pơtao hơpơi.

English: Now I know that the LORD saves His anointed; He will answer him from His holy heaven With the saving strength of His right hand.
Bahnar: Âu inh băt Kră Yang dŏng pơklaihb 'Bok mă đei tuh đak rơmă đơ̆ng Sư. Đơ̆ng kơpal plĕnh rơgoh Sư gô tơl tơwih kơ pơtao, Hăm tơdrong kơtang tơgŭm dŏng pơklaih đơ̆ng ti 'ma Sư.

English: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses; But we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
Bahnar: Lu đe âu gơnang kơ gre, lu đe nai gơnang kơ aseh Mă-lei lu nhôn gơnang kơ anăn Kră Yang jơ̆ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei lu nhôn.

English: They have bowed down and fallen; But we have risen and stand upright.
Bahnar: Lu đe noh kơdŭn pơ̆k hraih đang, Gah lu nhôn iung păng dơ̆ng tơpăt hloi.

English: Save, LORD! May the King answer us when we call.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, tơgŭm bĕ 'Bok Pơtao! Apinh tơl tơwih ăn kơ lu nhôn, dah lu nhôn krao apinh.

English: The king shall have joy in Your strength, O LORD; And in Your salvation how greatly shall he rejoice!
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, hăm pran kơtang Ih, pơtao gô chơt hiôk, Đơ̆ng tơdrong Ih dŏng pơklaih, sư gô chhôk hal pă băt dang yơ!

English: You have given him his heart’s desire, And have not withheld the request of his lips. Selah
Bahnar: Kră Yang ăn boih kơ sư, dôm jơhngơ̆m sư 'maih wă, Ưh kơ đei sơngah ôh, dôm 'bơ̆r sư apinh.

English: For You meet him with the blessings of goodness; You set a crown of pure gold upon his head.
Bahnar: Yua kơ hăm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng rŏ na năm sơng iŏk sư, Pơyơ̆l ăn tơ kơ̆l sư môk pơtao 'maih rang.

English: He asked life from You, and You gave it to him— Length of days forever and ever.
Bahnar: Sư apinh Ih tơdrong arih, Ih ăn hloi kơ sư Ih ăn kơ sư năr đunh sot ling-lang hlŏng hloi.

English: His glory is great in Your salvation; Honor and majesty You have placed upon him.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng tơdrong dŏng pơklaih Ih, sư đei ư-ang tih tơpă: Ih ăn kơ sư tơdrong rang rŏ dêh.

English: For You have made him most blessed forever; You have made him exceedingly glad with Your presence.
Bahnar: Ih ăn kơ sư pŭn hiôk ling-lang, Pơm ăn kơ sư chơt hiôk 'bơ̆t anăp Ih.a

English: For the king trusts in the LORD, And through the mercy of the Most High he shall not be moved.
Bahnar: Yua kơ pơtao lui gơnang kơ Kră Yang, Gơnang kơ tơdrong 'mêm mơnat đơ̆ng Kră Yang mă kơpal Hloh, Na sư ưh kơ đei tơdrŏ.

English: Your hand will find all Your enemies; Your right hand will find those who hate You.
Bahnar: Ti Ih gô rôp lu ayăt kơ Ih, Ti gah 'ma Ih gô rôp đei lu hil areh kơ Ih

English: You shall make them as a fiery oven in the time of Your anger; The LORD shall swallow them up in His wrath, And the fire shall devour them.
Bahnar: Lăm năr Ih pơdah akâu. Ihb gô pơm kơ lu sư khơ̆ng thoi pla ŭnh, Kră Yang gô luăn lu sư, lăm năr Kră Yang hil blĕk, Păng ŭnh gô soh chhông đĭ lu sư.

English: Their offspring You shall destroy from the earth, And their descendants from among the sons of men.
Bahnar: Ih gô pơrăm kon sâu lu sư đơ̆ng teh đak, Păng adrĕch adrung lu sư đơ̆ng kon bơngai.

English: For they intended evil against You; They devised a plot which they are not able to perform.
Bahnar: Mă lu sư wă pơm kơnê̆ kơ Ih ră Lu sư pơđâu chă đon ưh kơ jing ôh.

English: Therefore You will make them turn their back; You will make ready Your arrows on Your string toward their faces.
Bahnar: Ih gô pơm ăn kơ lu sư kơdâu tơ rŏng Ih gŭt hră Ih rĕng tơ lu sư

English: Be exalted, O LORD, in Your own strength! We will sing and praise Your power.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, anăn Ih ư-ang lăm pran kơtang Ih! Lu nhôn gô hơri bơnê kơkuh tơdrong mơsêh Ih.

English: My God, My God, why have You forsaken Me? Why are You so far from helping Me, And from the words of My groaning?
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei! Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei ơi! Liơ Ih achăng lê̆ inh? Yua kơ kiơ Ih dơ̆ng tơ ataih, Ưh kơ tơgŭm dŏng inh, ưh kơ mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh ôr krao?

English: O My God, I cry in the daytime, but You do not hear; And in the night season, and am not silent.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh! Prăt năr inh krao khan, Ih ưh kơ tơl tơwih. Kơmăng inh kư̆m pă đei pơdơh.a

English: But You are holy, Enthroned in the praises of Israel.
Bahnar: Mă-lei gah Kră Yang Ih Tơ'ngla 'lơ̆ng rơgoh, Ih jơ̆ Yang oei tŏk-bŏk tơdrong bơnê lu bơngai Isơrael.b

English: Our fathers trusted in You; They trusted, and You delivered them.
Bahnar: 'Bok yă nhôn sơ̆, gơnang kơ Ih. Lu sư lui gơnang na Ih pơklaih lu sư.

English: They cried to You, and were delivered; They trusted in You, and were not ashamed.
Bahnar: Lu sư krao apinh Ih, na Ih dŏng pơklaih lu sư. Lu sư gơnang kơ Ih huay kơ mơlâu.

English: But I am a worm, and no man; A reproach of men, and despised by the people.
Bahnar: Mă-lei inh nhen thoi hơdrông ưh kơ trŏ kon bơngai. Inh jing tơmam pơm kơ kon bơngai pơjăm, Păng tơmam pơm ăn kơ kon pơlei hiĕk ăr.

English: All those who see Me ridicule Me; They shoot out the lip, they shake the head, saying
Bahnar: Dah bu 'bôh inh lu sư hiĕk ăr. Lu sư gô pơpơm 'bơ̆r cheng păng tơtreh kơ̆l na khan

English: “He trusted in the LORD, let Him rescue Him; Let Him deliver Him, since He delights in Him!”
Bahnar: “Sư gơnang kơ Kră Yang, wă kơ Kră Yang dŏng pơklaih sư; Tơpă Kră Yang gô pơklaih sư; Yua kơ Kră Yang 'mêm kơ sư.”

English: But You are He who took Me out of the womb; You made Me trust while on My mother’s breasts.
Bahnar: Trŏ boih, Ih tơlĕch inh đơ̆ng klak mĕ inh. Ăn kơ inh gơnang kơ Ih kơplah inh gơning 'bơ̆t kơtơh mĕ inh.

English: I was cast upon You from birth. From My mother’s womb You have been My God.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng inh oei lăm klak, jao inh kơ Kră Yang boih; Ih boih Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, đơ̆ng năr mĕ inh 'nao tơpŭ kơ inh.

English: Be not far from Me, For trouble is near; For there is none to help.
Bahnar: 'Nĕ kơ oei ataih đơ̆ng inh, yua kơ tơdrong rŭng răng wă jê̆ boih, păng ưh kơ đei bu dŏng inh.

English: Many bulls have surrounded Me; Strong bulls of Bashan have encircled Me.
Bahnar: Đei lơ rơmo bri tơno tăp dăr kơ inh, Lu rơmo tơno pran kơtang đơ̆ng Basan wang tăp kơ inh.

English: They gape at Me with their mouths, Like a raging and roaring lion.
Bahnar: Lu sư ha 'bơ̆r wă pơm kơ inh thoi dăm-brang châu hek sa păng grĕnh.

English: I am poured out like water, And all My bones are out of joint; My heart is like wax; It has melted within Me.
Bahnar: Inh thoi đak đe tuh, đĭ kơting inh pă đei tơklep băl. Plei nuih inh thoi jrĕnh, lek đĭ tơ lăm kơtơh inh.

English: My strength is dried up like a potsherd, And My tongue clings to My jaws; You have brought Me to the dust of death.
Bahnar: Jơhngơ̆m pran inh kro thoi lơ̆n 'buh păng hơpiĕt inh klep tơ păk-'ngơk. Kră Yang dan inh tơ lăm 'mui teh thoi lôch.

English: For dogs have surrounded Me; The congregation of the wicked has enclosed Me. They pierced My hands and My feet
Bahnar: Yua kơ lu kŏ tăp dăr kơ inh, Minh khŭl bơngai kơnê̆ wang tăp kơ inh boih; Lu sư 'bet klĕch ti păng jơ̆ng inh boih.

English: I can count all My bones. They look and stare at Me.
Bahnar: Inh gơh jô̆ đĭ-đăng kơting inh, Lu sư lăng pơglăn tơ inh păng hiĕk ăr kơ inh.

English: They divide My garments among them, And for My clothing they cast lots.
Bahnar: Lu sư asong băl hơbĕn ao inh, Hlang lăng ao tai inh.

English: But You, O LORD, do not be far from Me; O My Strength, hasten to help Me!
Bahnar: Mă-lei Ih ơ Kră Yang! 'Nĕ dơ̆ng ataih đơ̆ng inh, Ơ Kră Yang pran kơtang inh! Tĕnh bĕ tơgŭm dŏng inh.

English: Deliver Me from the sword, My precious life from the power of the dog.
Bahnar: Dŏng pơklaih bơhngol inh đơ̆ng đao gưm. Păng tơdrong arih inh đơ̆ng khŭl kŏ.

English: Save Me from the lion’s mouth And from the horns of the wild oxen! You have answered Me.
Bahnar: Pơklaih inh đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r dăm-brang, Đơ̆ng hơke rơmo bri, yua kơ Ih kơtơ̆ng boih nơ̆r inh krao.

English: I will declare Your name to My brethren; In the midst of the assembly I will praise You.
Bahnar: Inh gô ră roi anăn Ih kơ lu 'nhŏng oh inh, Păng bơnê kơ Ih lăm kon pơlei inh.

English: You who fear the LORD, praise Him! All you descendants of Jacob, glorify Him, And fear Him, all you offspring of Israel!
Bahnar: Ơ lu bơngai băt hli yom kơ Kră Yang, bơnê bĕ kơ Sư, Ơ đĭ-đăng adrĕch Jakôp, kơkuh ư-ang bĕ kơ Sư, Ơ đĭ-đăng adrĕch adrung Isơrael hli yom bĕ kơ sư.

English: For He has not despised nor abhorred the affliction of the afflicted; Nor has He hidden His face from Him; But when He cried to Him, He heard.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Sư ưh kơ đei pơdê, ưh kơ krưp. Tơdrong pơmat kơ lu đe bu mă pơmat-tat, Kŭm ưh kơ đei ôn muh măt Sư kơ đe noh; Mưh lu sư krao apinh Sư, Sư tơl tơwih hloi

English: My praise shall be of You in the great assembly; I will pay My vows before those who fear Him.
Bahnar: Tơdrong inh hơri bơnê tơ anih akŭm tih lĕch đơ̆ng Ih, Inh gô pơm keh dôm nơ̆r đêl inh pơkă 'bơ̆t anăp lu bơngai hli yom kơ Kră Yang.

English: The poor shall eat and be satisfied; Those who seek Him will praise the LORD. Let your heart live forever!
Bahnar: Lu bơngai dơnuh hin gô sa phĭ jơnap; Lu bơngai chơchă Kră Yang gô kơkuh bơnê kơ Sư; Ăn kơ jơhngơ̆m ih đei arih ling-lang.

English: All the ends of the world Shall remember and turn to the LORD, And all the families of the nations Shall worship before You.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng tôch kơ teh đak gô 'blŏk păng wih tơ Kră Yang; Đĭ adrĕch adrung kon bơngai gô kơkuh 'bơ̆t anăp Sư.

English: For the kingdom is the LORD’s, And He rules over the nations.
Bahnar: Tơdrong Kră Yang pơgơ̆r, Sư pơgơ̆r đĭ kon bơngai.

English: All the prosperous of the earth Shall eat and worship; All those who go down to the dust Shall bow before Him, Even he who cannot keep himself alive.
Bahnar: Đĭ kơ lu bơngai mơdrŏng tih lăm teh đak kư̆m gô sŏng sa păng kơkuh; Đĭ-đăng lu bơngai brŏk tơ 'mui teh, gô drap kơkuh 'bơ̆t anăp Sư Păng dôm lu bơngai mă ưh kơ gơh bơwei tơdrong arih sư

English: A posterity shall serve Him. It will be recounted of the Lord to the next generation
Bahnar: Minh adrĕch adrung gô bơ̆jang kơ Sư; Đe gô roi tơdrong Kră Yang kơ adrĕch adrung đơ̆ng rŏng.

English: They will come and declare His righteousness to a people who will be born, That He has done this.
Bahnar: Adrĕch adrung noh gô ră roi gah tơdrong tơpăt Kră Yang, Roi tơbăt kơ adrĕch adrung đơ̆ng rŏng khan. Kră Yang boih pơm tơdrong noh.

English: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Bahnar: Kră Yang Tơ'ngla wei-lăng inh, inh ưh kơ khăi kơ kiơ.

English: He makes me to lie down in green pastures; He leads me beside the still waters.
Bahnar: Sư ăn kơ inh pơdơh tơ 'nhĕt hơdrih, ba inh tơ đak hlăng.

English: He restores my soul; He leads me in the paths of righteousness For His name’s sake.
Bahnar: Sư ăn kơ bơhngol inh pran dơ̆ng.a Dui ba inh lăm trong tơpăt, yua kơ anăn Sư.

English: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil; For You are with me; Your rod and Your staff, they comfort me.
Bahnar: Mă inh năm lăm thŭng yơ̆p tơdrong lôch, inh ưh kơ hli kơ răm, yua kơ Kră Yang oei hăm inh; 'long băl hăm 'long jra Ih pơlung inh.

English: You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies; You anoint my head with oil; My cup runs over.
Bahnar: Kră Yang hơmet ăn kơ inh gơ'bang sŏng sa. 'Bơ̆t anăp lu bơngai ayăt kơ inh; Kră Yang tuh đak rơmă tơ kơ̆l inh, kơchŏk inh 'bĕnh blai.

English: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me All the days of my life; And I will dwell in the house of the LORD Forever.
Bahnar: Tơpă lăm đĭ năr inh oei arih, tơdrong pŭn hiôk păng tơdrong 'mêm mơnat gô kiơ̆ inh; inh gô oei lăm hnam Kră Yang ling-lang hlŏng hloi.

English: The earth is the LORD’s, and all its fullness, The world and those who dwell therein.
Bahnar: Teh păng dôm tơmam kơpal teh, Teh đak păng lu bơngai oei tơ lăm noh. Tă kơ tơmam Kră Yang ngăl.

English: For He has founded it upon the seas, And established it upon the waters.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Sư pơjing teh kơpal đak krong dơsĭ, Păng dan sư kơjăp kơpal đak tih.

English: Who may ascend into the hill of the LORD? Or who may stand in His holy place?
Bahnar: Bu gơh tŏk tơ kông Kră Yang? Bu gơh kĕ dơ̆ng lăm anih rơgoh Sư?

English: He who has clean hands and a pure heart, Who has not lifted up his soul to an idol, Nor sworn deceitfully.
Bahnar: Noh lu bơngai đei ti rơgoh păng jơhngơ̆m rơgoh, Ưh kơ wă ăn bơhngol sư tơdrong yoch glăi, Kŭm ưh kơ pơkă hơlĕnh.

English: He shall receive blessing from the LORD, And righteousness from the God of his salvation.
Bahnar: Bơngai noh gô đei pŭn hiôk đơ̆ng Kră Yang, Păng tơdrong tơpăt đơ̆ng Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, Tơ'ngla dŏng pơklaih Sư.

English: This is Jacob, the generation of those who seek Him, Who seek Your face. Selah
Bahnar: Noh boih adrĕch adrung lu bơngai chơchă Kră Yang, Wă khan lu bơngai chơchă muh măt Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei Jakôp.a Sêla

English: Lift up your heads, O you gates! And be lifted up, you everlasting doors! And the King of glory shall come in.
Bahnar: Ơ lu 'măng jang hiŏng kơ̆l ih bĕ! Ơ lu 'măng mă oei oei ling-lang, pơih kơjung bĕ! Na pơtao ư-ang gô mơ̆t

English: Who is this King of glory? The LORD strong and mighty, The LORD mighty in battle.
Bahnar: Pơtao ư-ang ei bu? Sư boih Kră Yang mă pran kơtang păng mơsêh. Kră Yang nuih pran lăm anih tơblah.

English: Lift up your heads, O you gates! Lift up, you everlasting doors! And the King of glory shall come in.
Bahnar: Ơ lu 'măng jang hơtŏk bĕ! Ơ lu 'măng oei oei ling-lang, Pơih kơjung bĕ, Na pơtao ư-ang gô mơ̆t

English: Who is this King of glory? The LORD of hosts, He is the King of glory. Selah
Bahnar: Pơtao ư-ang âu bu? Noh boih Kră Yang Tih Hloh. Sư boih pơtao ư-ang mơsêh mơyang Tih Hloh lăm anih tơblah. Sêla

English: To You, O LORD, I lift up my soul.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh pơjao bơhngol inh kơ Ih.

English: O my God, I trust in You; Let me not be ashamed; Let not my enemies triumph over me.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh! Jơhngơ̆m inh lui gơnang kơ Ih; 'nĕ ăn kơ inh mơlâu, 'Nĕ ăn jei lu ayăt kơ inh.

English: Indeed, let no one who waits on You be ashamed; Let those be ashamed who deal treacherously without cause.
Bahnar: Tơpă, dôm lu bơngai gơnang kơ Ih. Ưh kơ đei mơlâu, Ăn bĕ kơ lu bơngai ưh kơ chu lui gô mơlâu.

English: Show me Your ways, O LORD; Teach me Your paths.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih Tơ'bôh kơ inh trong Ih, Păng bơtho inh băt dôm trong gơlong Ih.

English: Lead me in Your truth and teach me, For You are the God of my salvation; On You I wait all the day.
Bahnar: Apinh chông ba inh lăm trong tơpăt Ih păng bơtho tơ'bôh kơ inh, Yua kơ Ih boih Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei dŏng pơklaih inh. Rim năr inh chang gô Ih.

English: Remember, O LORD, Your tender mercies and Your lovingkindnesses, For they are from of old.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih 'blŏk kơ jơhngơ̆m mơnat păng tơdrong 'mêm Ih; Yua kơ 'bar tơdrong noh đei boih đơ̆ng sơ̆.

English: Do not remember the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions; According to Your mercy remember me, For Your goodness’ sake, O LORD.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih lê̆ pă 'blŏk kơ tơdrong yoch, Inh pơm oei hơmuh hơmŏng, dah tơdrong kơnê̆ mă inh pơm boih; 'Blŏk kơ inh kiơ̆ thoi Ih mơnat, yua kơ tơdrong 'lơ̆ng Ih. Ơ Kră Yang.

English: Good and upright is the LORD; Therefore He teaches sinners in the way.
Bahnar: Kră Yang 'lơ̆ng rŏ păng tơpăt. Yua kơ thoi noh Sư gô bơtho tơ'bôh trong kơ lu bơngai yoch.

English: The humble He guides in justice, And the humble He teaches His way.
Bahnar: Sư gô ba lu iơ̆m dim, lăm trong tơpăt, Bơtho tơ'bôh trong Sư kơ lu bơngai chu yom.

English: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth, To such as keep His covenant and His testimonies.
Bahnar: Lu trong Kră Yang 'mêm mơnat păng tơpăt ngăl Ăn kơ bu mă bơwei nơ̆r Sư pơkă păng tơdrong Sư pơgơ̆p.

English: For Your name’s sake, O LORD, Pardon my iniquity, for it is great.
Bahnar: Yua kơ anăn Ih, Ơ Kră Yang, Mơnat ăn tơdrong yoch kơnê̆ inh, mă khan yoch noh tih dêh.

English: Who is the man that fears the LORD? Him shall He teach in the way He chooses.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu hli yom kơ Kră Yang? Sư gô bơtho pơhrăm bơngai noh lăm trong sư wă rơih.

English: He himself shall dwell in prosperity, And his descendants shall inherit the earth.
Bahnar: Bơhngol sư gô oei tơ anih hiôk-hian. Păng lu kon sâu sư gô đei teh jang sa

English: The secret of the LORD is with those who fear Him, And He will show them His covenant.
Bahnar: Kră Yang pơdah ăn tơdrong hlơpa hăm lu Bơngai đe mă hli yom kơ Sư. Tơ'bôh ăn kơ bơngai noh băt tơdrong Sư pơgơ̆p.

English: My eyes are ever toward the LORD, For He shall pluck my feet out of the net.
Bahnar: Măt inh gô pơglăn tơ Kră Yang ling-lang Yua kơ Sư gô pleh jơ̆ng inh đơ̆ng hơnhuăl.

English: Turn Yourself to me, and have mercy on me, For I am desolate and afflicted.
Bahnar: Apinh Kră Yang lăng inh păng mơnat kơ inh, Yua kơ inh hơdrô̆ păng pơmat-tat dêh

English: The troubles of my heart have enlarged; Bring me out of my distresses!
Bahnar: Tơdrong hli hlơt inh rai dêh, apinh Ih pơklaih inh đơ̆ng tơdrong hơnat hơnot.

English: Look on my affliction and my pain, And forgive all my sins.
Bahnar: Lăng ba inh 'bơ̆t năr hơnat hơnot păng lăm năr pơmat-tat, Păng mơnat ăn đĭ tơdrong yoch inh.

English: Consider my enemies, for they are many; And they hate me with cruel hatred.
Bahnar: Lăng bĕ tơ lu ayăt kơ inh, yua kơ lu sư lơ dêh; Lu sư areh kơ inh dêh tơpă.

English: Keep my soul, and deliver me; Let me not be ashamed, for I put my trust in You.
Bahnar: Apinh Kră Yang wei bơhngol inh; păng dŏng pơklaih inh. 'Nĕ ăn kơ inh mơlâu, Yua kơ inh kơ'nơp lăm Ih

English: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me, For I wait for You.
Bahnar: Ăn tơdrong 'lơ̆ng rơgoh păng tơdrong tơpăt wei-lăng inh, Yua kơ inh chang gô Ih.

English: Redeem Israel, O God, Out of all their troubles!
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei! Apinh Ih dŏng pơklaih bơngai Isơrael. Đơ̆ng đĭ-đăng tơdrong gleh sư.

English: Vindicate me, O LORD, For I have walked in my integrity. I have also trusted in the LORD; I shall not slip.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih sek tơlang lăng inh, Yua kơ inh oei arih 'lơ̆ng rơgoh,a Inh gơnang kơ Kră Yang na inh huay kơ tơpling jơ̆ng.

English: Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; Try my mind and my heart.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Lăng lăng păng pơlong lăng inh. Lăng năng jơhngơ̆m inh păng đon inh tơchĕng

English: For Your lovingkindness is before my eyes, And I have walked in Your truth.
Bahnar: Yua kơ tơdrong 'mêm mơnat Ih oei 'bơ̆t anăp inh, Inh kiơ̆ boih tơdrong sĭt Ih

English: I have not sat with idolatrous mortals, Nor will I go in with hypocrites.
Bahnar: Inh ưh kơ ngôi hơdai hăm lu bơngai hơlĕnh pơdăr, Kŭm ưh kơ wă pơgơ̆p hơdai hăm lu bơngai chă pơm pơrŏ 'nguaih.

English: I have hated the assembly of evildoers, And will not sit with the wicked.
Bahnar: Inh areh kơ lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆. Kŭm ưh kơ wă ngôi hăm lu bơngai kư̆ kă.

English: I will wash my hands in innocence; So I will go about Your altar, O LORD
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh gô ôp ti inh Tơ lăm tơdrong rơgoh 'lơ̆ng, Păng yak dăr kơ chơnang soi Ih.

English: That I may proclaim with the voice of thanksgiving, And tell of all Your wondrous works.
Bahnar: Hơri nơ̆r bơnê re, Păng ră roi dôm tơdrong hlĭch chrơp mă Ih đei pơm.

English: LORD, I have loved the habitation of Your house, And the place where Your glory dwells.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh 'mêm kơ hnam Ih oei păng anih ư-ang mă Ih oei.

English: Do not gather my soul with sinners, Nor my life with bloodthirsty men
Bahnar: Apinh Ih 'nĕ tah bơhngol inh hơdai hăm lu bơngai yoch, Kŭm 'nĕ kơ 'bŭ tơdrong arih inh hơdai hăm lu bơngai pơlôch đe.

English: In whose hands is a sinister scheme, And whose right hand is full of bribes.
Bahnar: Lăm tơpang ti lu sư tă kơ pơm kơnê̆ ngăl. Ti 'ma lu sư 'bĕnh kơ sa pơgâm.

English: But as for me, I will walk in my integrity; Redeem me and be merciful to me.
Bahnar: Gah inh, inh yak năm lăm trong 'lơ̆ng rơgoh, Apinh Ih pơklaih inh păng mơnat kơ inh.

English: My foot stands in an even place; In the congregations I will bless the LORD.
Bahnar: Jơ̆ng inh dơ̆ng 'bơ̆t trong dơhnă; Inh gô bơnê ư-ang kơ Kră Yang lăm năr akŭm tih.

English: The LORD is my light and my salvation; Whom shall I fear? The LORD is the strength of my life; Of whom shall I be afraid?
Bahnar: Kră Yang boih tơdrong hơdah păng tơdrong dŏng pơklaih inh: Inh wă hli kơ bu dơ̆ng? Kră Yang anih kơjăp kơ tơdrong arih inh: Inh wă hli kơ bu dơ̆ng?

English: When the wicked came against me To eat up my flesh, My enemies and foes, They stumbled and fell.
Bahnar: Mưh lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ bruh Wă hek sa sĕch inh, lu ayăt hăm lu bơngai wă blah inh. Na lu sư pơ̆k đĭ-đăng.

English: Though an army may encamp against me, My heart shall not fear; Though war may rise against me, In this I will be confident.
Bahnar: Mă khan khŭl linh wang tăp kơ inh, Jơhngơ̆m inh ưh kơ hli, Mă khan ayăt iung blah inh, jơhngơ̆m inh oei hơđơ̆ng.

English: One thing I have desired of the LORD, That will I seek: That I may dwell in the house of the LORD All the days of my life, To behold the beauty of the LORD, And to inquire in His temple.
Bahnar: Inh đei apinh boih Kră Yang minh tơdrong, Tơdrong mă inh chơchă, Noh inh wă kơ đĭ chăl arih inh oei lăm hnam Kră Yang. Wă kơ lăng dôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt Kră Yang păng wă chă Sư tơ lăm Hnam Sư.

English: For in the time of trouble He shall hide me in His pavilion; In the secret place of His tabernacle He shall hide me; He shall set me high upon a rock.
Bahnar: Yua kơ lăm năr đei tơdrong truh, Kră Yang gô krôp inh lăm bơsŭn Sư, Ôn inh hlơp lăm kơđông Sư; păng pôk hơtŏk inh tơ kơpal tơmo tih.

English: And now my head shall be lifted up above my enemies all around me; Therefore I will offer sacrifices of joy in His tabernacle; I will sing, yes, I will sing praises to the LORD.
Bahnar: Dang ei kơ̆l inh gô ngơk kơjung. Hloh kơ lu ayăt mă wang tăp kơ inh. Lăm kơđông Sư inh pơyơ̆r tơmam soi. Hăm nơ̆r ôr chơt hiôk, Inh gô hơri, bơnê kơ Kră Yang.

English: Hear, O LORD, when I cry with my voice! Have mercy also upon me, and answer me.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, mơ̆ng bĕ dôm nơ̆r inh krao apinh. Mơnat kơ inh păng tơl nơ̆r inh krao khan.

English: When You said, “Seek My face,” My heart said to You, “Your face, LORD, I will seek.”
Bahnar: Jơhngơ̆m inh khan kơ Ih, “chơchă bĕ muh măt Sư,”a Na inh khan! Inh gô chơchă muh măt Ih.

English: Do not hide Your face from me; Do not turn Your servant away in anger; You have been my help; Do not leave me nor forsake me, O God of my salvation.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei mă dŏng pơklaih inh, Apinh 'nĕ ôn muh măt Ih kơ inh. 'Nĕ kơ pơpuh lu đĭch đam Ih Kơplah Ih hil blĕk. Ih jơ̆ Kră Yang tơgŭm dŏng inh, 'nĕ kơ lê̆ inh, 'nĕ kơ achăng inh.

English: When my father and my mother forsake me, Then the LORD will take care of me.
Bahnar: Mă mĕ 'bă achăng lê̆ inh, Kră Yang, gô sơng iŏk inh

English: Teach me Your way, O LORD, And lead me in a smooth path, because of my enemies.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, bơtho tơ'bôh kơ inh trong Ih, Yua kơ đei lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ kơ inh, Apinh Ih dui ba inh lăm trong tơhnă.

English: Do not deliver me to the will of my adversaries; For false witnesses have risen against me, And such as breathe out violence.
Bahnar: 'Nĕ jao inhb tơ lu ayăt kơ inh kiơ̆ thoi lu sư wă, Yua kơ nơ̆r pơm kơdranh hơlĕnh Păng lu bơngai trĕn wă pơm kơnê̆ kơ inh.

English: I would have lost heart, unless I had believed That I would see the goodness of the LORD In the land of the living.
Bahnar: Ngeh tơpă Inh gô 'bôh tơdrong pŭn hiôk đơ̆ng Kră Yang tơ lăm teh đak lu bơngai arih.

English: Wait on the LORD; Be of good courage, And He shall strengthen your heart; Wait, I say, on the LORD!
Bahnar: Chang gô bĕ Kră Yang Athei chơ̆n jơhngơ̆m păng hơđơ̆ng đon! Tơpă, chang gô bĕ Kră Yang.

English: To You I will cry, O LORD my Rock: Do not be silent to me, Lest, if You are silent to me, I become like those who go down to the pit.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh krao apinh Ih, Ơ tơmo inh 'nĕ kơ chĭt đon Hăm inh. Dah Ih ngăn kơ inh. Inh gô thoi bơngai wă huŏng tơ lăm sơlŭng jrŭ.

English: Hear the voice of my supplications When I cry to You, When I lift up my hands toward Your holy sanctuary.
Bahnar: Apinh ih mơ̆ng inh krao apinh. Mưh inh yơ̆r ti tơ Anih 'Lơ̆ng rơgoh Ih. Mưh inh krao apinh ih dŏng tơgŭm.

English: Do not take me away with the wicked And with the workers of iniquity, Who speak peace to their neighbors, But evil is in their hearts.
Bahnar: 'Nĕ kơ lê̆ inh răm hơdai lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆. Păng hăm lu bơngai pơm kư̆ kă. Lu sư pơma hiôk hăm bơngai jê̆ lu sư. Mă-lei lăm jơhngơ̆m hơlĕnh ngăl

English: Give them according to their deeds, And according to the wickedness of their endeavors; Give them according to the work of their hands; Render to them what they deserve.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih phak lu sư kiơ̆ thoi kơ tơdrong jang lu sư pơm, Kiơ̆ thoi tơdrong lu sư pơm kơnê̆ noh; Phak bĕ lu sư kiơ̆ thoi đêl ti lu sư pơm boih. Tơwih ăn kơ lu sư tơdrong kiơ̆ trŏ đêl pơm.

English: Because they do not regard the works of the LORD, Nor the operation of His hands, He shall destroy them And not build them up.
Bahnar: Yua kơ lu sư ưh kơ wă mơ̆ng kơ tơdrong jang Kră Yang. Mă đơ̆ng ti Kră Yang pơm. Na Kră Yang gô pơrăm lê̆ lu sư, Ưh pă pơdơ̆ng ming lu sư dơ̆ng.

English: Blessed be the LORD, Because He has heard the voice of my supplications!
Bahnar: Kơkuh bơnê ư-ang kơ Kră Yang! Yua kơ Sư mơ̆ng boih nơ̆r inh krao khan

English: The LORD is my strength and my shield; My heart trusted in Him, and I am helped; Therefore my heart greatly rejoices, And with my song I will praise Him.
Bahnar: Kră Yang jơ̆ jơhngơ̆m pran păng thoi khêl inh, Jơhngơ̆m inh gơnang boih kơ Sư, na inh mă gơh klaih, Yua kơ thoi noh jơhngơ̆m inh chơt hiôk tơpă. Inh gô iŏk nơ̆r hơri bơnê kơ Sư.

English: The LORD is their strength, And He is the saving refuge of His anointed.
Bahnar: Kră Yang jơ̆ tơdrong pran kơtang kơ kon pơlei pơla Sư, Kơđông kơjăp dŏng pơklaih bơngai mă sư hling boih đak rơmă 'bâu phu.

English: Save Your people, And bless Your inheritance; Shepherd them also, And bear them up forever.
