English: May you be blessed by the LORD, Who made heaven and earth.
Bahnar: Hơpơi sư ăn pŭn hiôk kơ lu iĕm. Kră Yang Tơ'ngla pơjing kơ plĕnh păng teh.

English: The heaven, even the heavens, are the LORD’s; But the earth He has given to the children of men.
Bahnar: Lu hơtăl plĕnh ti jơ̆ tơmam Kră Yang ngăl. Mă-lei Sư ăn teh âu kơ kon bơngai.

English: The dead do not praise the LORD, Nor any who go down into silence.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai lôch dah lu bơngai jur tơ pơlei lôch. Ưh kơ đei hơri bơnê kơ Kră Yang ôh.

English: But we will bless the LORD From this time forth and forevermore. Praise the LORD!
Bahnar: Mă-lei lu nhôn gô hơri bơnê kơ Kră Yang. Đơ̆ng dang ei dĭng truh tơ ning-mônh ling-lang hloi, Halêluya!

English: I love the LORD, because He has heard My voice and my supplications.
Bahnar: Inh 'mêm bơnê kơ Kră Yang, yua kơ Sư kơtơ̆ng nơ̆r inh. Păng kơtơ̆ng nơ̆r inh krao apinh

English: Because He has inclined His ear to me, Therefore I will call upon Him as long as I live.
Bahnar: Inh gô krao apinh Kră Yang đĭ chăl arih inh. Yua kơ Sư pơgling đon mơ̆ng inh.

English: The pains of death surrounded me, And the pangs of Sheol laid hold of me; I found trouble and sorrow.
Bahnar: Bră tơdrong lôch chô̆ tăp kơ inh, Tơdrong pơmat dêh atâu rôp inh, tơdrong truh kơ inh pơmat păng sơ'ngon.

English: Then I called upon the name of the LORD: “O LORD, I implore You, deliver my soul!”
Bahnar: Lei na inh ôr krao Kră Yang: “Ơ Kră Yang! Apinh ih dŏng pơklaih bơhngola inh.”

English: Gracious is the LORD, and righteous; Yes, our God is merciful.
Bahnar: Kră Yang 'lơ̆ng tơpăt păng ăn tơdrong mơnat. Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei lu bơ̆n đei jơhngơ̆m mơnat.

English: The LORD preserves the simple; I was brought low, and He saved me.
Bahnar: Kră Yang wei-lăng lu bơngai tơpăt; Tơdah inh pơmat-tat Sư pơklaih inh hloi

English: Return to your rest, O my soul, For the LORD has dealt bountifully with you.
Bahnar: Ơ bơhngol inh, brŏk dơ̆ng tơ anih pơdơh ih, Yua kơ Kră Yang pơm 'lơ̆ng kơ ih.

English: For You have delivered my soul from death, My eyes from tears, And my feet from falling.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Ih ơ Kră Yang dŏng pơklaih boih inh đơ̆ng tơdrong lôch. Măt inh huay pă lĕch đak măt, Păng jơ̆ng inh huay kơtơih pơ̆k.

English: I will walk before the LORD In the land of the living.
Bahnar: Inh gô yak năm 'bơ̆t anăp Kră Yang. Lăm teh đak lu bơngai arih.

English: I believed, therefore I spoke, “I am greatly afflicted.”
Bahnar: Inh oei lui mă inh đei khan. “Inh pơmat-tat dêh.”

English: I said in my haste, “All men are liars.”
Bahnar: Lăm năr inh hli tơtăm inh khan: “Rim 'nu bơngai tă kơ pơma hơlĕnh ngăl.”

English: What shall I render to the LORD For all His benefits toward me?
Bahnar: Inh gô iŏk kiơ wă 'mong kơ Kră Yang. Gah dôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng mă Sư đei pơm kơ inh?

English: I will take up the cup of salvation, And call upon the name of the LORD.
Bahnar: Inh gô yơ̆r pơnhan dŏng pơklaih na krao apinh hăm anăn Kră Yang.

English: I will pay my vows to the LORD Now in the presence of all His people.
Bahnar: Inh gô pơkeh ăn đĭ kơ Kră Yang dôm tơdrong đêl nơ̆r inh pơkă. 'Bơ̆t anăp đĭ-đăng kon pơlei Sư

English: Precious in the sight of the LORD Is the death of His saints.
Bahnar: Tơdrong lôch lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh jơ̆ gĭt tơpă 'bơ̆t anăp Kră Yang.

English: O LORD, truly I am Your servant; I am Your servant, the son of Your maidservant; You have loosed my bonds.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang inh đĭch đam Ih tơpă. Inh đĭch đam Ih, jơ̆ kon drŏ-nglo đam drŏ-kăn Ih, Ih yaih boih inh đơ̆ng bră đe chô̆.

English: I will offer to You the sacrifice of thanksgiving, And will call upon the name of the LORD.
Bahnar: Inh gô pơyơ̆r tơmam soi bơnê kơ Ih Kră Yang. Păng krao apinh hăm anăn Kră Yang.

English: I will pay my vows to the LORD Now in the presence of all His people
Bahnar: Inh gô pơkeh ăn đĭ kơ Kră Yang dôm tơdrong đêl nơ̆r inh pơkă, 'Bơ̆t anăp đĭ-đăng kon pơlei Sư.

English: In the courts of the LORD’s house, In the midst of you, O Jerusalem. Praise the LORD!
Bahnar: Lăm cham hnam Kră Yang. Tơ tŏk-bŏk pơlei Jêrusalem, Halêluya!

English: Praise the LORD, all you Gentiles! Laud Him, all you peoples!
Bahnar: Ơ đĭ-đăng dêh char bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang, ơ đĭ-đăng lu kon pơlei, hơri bơnê bĕ kơ Sư!

English: For His merciful kindness is great toward us, And the truth of the LORD endures forever. Praise the LORD!
Bahnar: Yua kơ tơdrong Sư 'mêm kơ lu bơ̆n tih dêh. Tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt Kră Yang oei oei ling-lang, Halêluya!

English: Oh, give thanks to the LORD, for He is good! For His mercy endures forever.
Bahnar: Bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang, Yua kơ Sư 'lơ̆ng; Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: Let Israel now say, “His mercy endures forever.”
Bahnar: Ăn kơ Isơrael khan bĕ: “Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang!”

English: Let the house of Aaron now say, “His mercy endures forever.”
Bahnar: Ăn kơ hnam Arôn khan bĕ: “Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang!”

English: Let those who fear the LORD now say, “His mercy endures forever.”
Bahnar: Ăn kơ lu bơngai hli yom kơ Kră Yang khan bĕ: “Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang!”

English: I called on the LORD in distress; The LORD answered me and set me in a broad place.
Bahnar: Lăm năr pơmat-tat inh krao apinh Kră Yang; Kră Yang tơl tơwih nơ̆r inh Ăn kơ inh rơngei.a

English: The LORD is on my side; I will not fear. What can man do to me?
Bahnar: Kră Yang oei hơdai inh, inh ưh kơ đei hli kiơ; Kon bơngai gơh pơm kiơ kơ inh?

English: The LORD is for me among those who help me; Therefore I shall see my desire on those who hate me.
Bahnar: Kră Yang oei hơdai inh; dŏng tơgŭm inh. Inh 'bôh lu bơngai areh kơ inh jei inh.

English: It is better to trust in the LORD Than to put confidence in man.
Bahnar: Gơnang kơ Kră Yang đĕch hloh kơ gơnang kơ kon bơngai.

English: It is better to trust in the LORD Than to put confidence in princes.
Bahnar: Gơnang kơ Kră Yang đĕch hloh kơ gơnang kơ lu pơtao mơng.

English: All nations surrounded me, But in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
Bahnar: Lu dêh char wang tăp kơ inh; Lăm anăn Kră Yang inh pơrămb đĭ lu sư.

English: They surrounded me, Yes, they surrounded me; But in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
Bahnar: Lu sư wang tăp dăr kơ inh puăn pah. Hăm anăn Kră Yang inh pơrăm đĭ lu sư.

English: They surrounded me like bees; They were quenched like a fire of thorns; For in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
Bahnar: Lu sư wang inh lơ thoi sut; lu sư gô lôch păt thoi ŭnh sa bơmreh. Hăm anăn Kră Yang pơrăm đĭ lu sư.

English: You pushed me violently, that I might fall, But the LORD helped me.
Bahnar: Đei bơngai tơlơ̆ inh kơtang wă kơ inh pơ̆k; Mă-lei Kră Yang tơgŭm inh

English: The LORD is my strength and song, And He has become my salvation.
Bahnar: Kră Yang boih ăn kơ jơhngơ̆m inh pran păng nơ̆r inh hơri; Sư Tơ'ngla dŏng pơklaih inh.

English: The voice of rejoicing and salvation Is in the tents of the righteous; The right hand of the LORD does valiantly.
Bahnar: Đei lăm kơđông lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, đei nơ̆r hơri chơt hiôk kĕ jei jơnei tih; “Ti 'ma Kră Yang pơm kĕ jei jơnei tih.

English: The right hand of the LORD is exalted; The right hand of the LORD does valiantly.
Bahnar: Ti 'ma Kră Yang yơ̆r kơjung, Ti 'ma Kră Yang pơm kĕ jei jơnei tih.”

English: I shall not die, but live, And declare the works of the LORD.
Bahnar: Inh pă đei lôch boih, mă-lei gơh arih. Păng gô ră roi dôm tơdrong jang Kră Yang đei pơm boih.

English: The LORD has chastened me severely, But He has not given me over to death.
Bahnar: Kră Yang phak bơtho inh dêh tơpă. Mă-lei huay ăn kơ inh truh kơ lôch.

English: Open to me the gates of righteousness; I will go through them, And I will praise the LORD.
Bahnar: Pơih ăn bĕ kơ inh 'măng jang tơdrong tơpăt, Inh gô mơ̆t bơnê ư-ang kơ Kră Yang.

English: This is the gate of the LORD, Through which the righteous shall enter.
Bahnar: Âu jơ̆ 'măng jang Kră Yang; Lu bơngai tơpăt gô mơ̆t tơ noh.

English: I will praise You, For You have answered me, And have become my salvation.
Bahnar: Inh bơnê kơ Ih, yua kơ Ih tơl tơwih nơ̆r inh apinh. Ih boih Tơ'ngla dŏng pơklaih inh.

English: The stone which the builders rejected Has become the chief cornerstone.
Bahnar: Tơmo mă thơ̆ mam hnam hŭt lê̆, jing tơmo man 'bơ̆t mum hnam

English: This was the LORD’s doing; It is marvelous in our eyes.
Bahnar: 'Nâu tơdrong jang Kră Yang đei pơm, Minh tơdrong hlĭch chrơp 'bơ̆t anăp lu bơ̆n.

English: This is the day the LORD has made; We will rejoice and be glad in it.
Bahnar: Âu boih năr Kră Yang đei pơm pơjing, Bĕ bơ̆n chơt hiôk 'nă hal lăm năr noh.

English: Save now, I pray, O LORD; O LORD, I pray, send now prosperity.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Dŏng pơklaih lu nhôn bĕ, ơ Kră Yang! Apinh Ih ăn kơ lu nhôn kĕ jei.

English: Blessed is he who comes in the name of the LORD! We have blessed you from the house of the LORD.
Bahnar: Pŭn hiôk dêh kơ bu, mă năm hăm anăn Kră Yang. Đơ̆ng hnam Kră Yang. Nhôn bơnê ư-ang kơ Ih.

English: God is the LORD, And He has given us light; Bind the sacrifice with cords to the horns of the altar.
Bahnar: Kră Yang jơ̆ 'Bok Kei-Dei, Sư boih pơchrang ăn kơ lu nhôn hơdah. Chô̆ bĕ tơmam soi pơyơ̆r hăm tơlei bră tơ lu chơnglơ̆ng hơke chơnang soi.

English: You are my God, and I will praise You; You are my God, I will exalt You.
Bahnar: Ih boih Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, inh gô bơnê kơ Ih; Ih boih Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, inh gô yom kơkuh kơ Ih.

English: Oh, give thanks to the LORD, for He is good! For His mercy endures forever.
Bahnar: Bơnê ư-ang kơ Kră Yang bĕ, yua kơ Sư 'lơ̆ng rŏ; Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, Who walk in the law of the LORD!
Bahnar: Pŭn dêh kơ lu đe bu mă pơm 'lơ̆ng đe huay kơ chrih lăm trong sư yak. Arih kiơ̆ khôi juăt Kră Yang.

English: Blessed are those who keep His testimonies, Who seek Him with the whole heart!
Bahnar: Pŭn dêh kơ bu wei răk dôm nơ̆r Sư tơtă. Păng đĭ jơhngơ̆m krao chă Sư.

English: They also do no iniquity; They walk in His ways.
Bahnar: Lu sư ưh kơ pơm glăi, Mă-lei arih kiơ̆ trong Kră Yang

English: You have commanded us To keep Your precepts diligently.
Bahnar: Ih đei bơtho pơkă boih tơdrong juăt Ih Wă kơ lu nhôn rok kiơ̆.

English: Oh, that my ways were directed To keep Your statutes!
Bahnar: Ô! Rŏ kơ trong inh gơh kơjăp; Wă kơ inh kĕ kiơ̆ khôi juăt Ih!

English: Then I would not be ashamed, When I look into all Your commandments.
Bahnar: Inh ưh kơ đei mơlâu ôh. Kơplah inh lăng tơ lu nơ̆r Ih tơtă

English: I will praise You with uprightness of heart, When I learn Your righteous judgments.
Bahnar: Inh iŏk jơhngơ̆m tơpăt hơri ư-ang kơ Ih. Kơplah inh hŏk iŏk tơdrong Ih sek tơpăt

English: I will keep Your statutes; Oh, do not forsake me utterly!
Bahnar: Inh gô wei răk khôi juăt Ih; Apinh ih 'nĕ achăng lê̆ inh.

English: How can a young man cleanse his way? By taking heed according to Your word.
Bahnar: Bơngai oei hơmuh hơmŏng pơm liơ wă kơ trong sư 'lơ̆ng rơgoh? Athei arih pơm kiơ̆ nơ̆r Kră Yang.

English: With my whole heart I have sought You; Oh, let me not wander from Your commandments!
Bahnar: Inh chă Ih hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m. 'Nĕ ăn kơ inh weh đơ̆ng nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: Your word I have hidden in my heart, That I might not sin against You.
Bahnar: Inh răk boih nơ̆r Ih lăm jơhngơ̆m inh Wă kơ inh huay kơ pơm yoch hăm Ih

English: Blessed are You, O LORD! Teach me Your statutes.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh hơri ư-ang kơ Ih; Apinh bơtho inh tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: With my lips I have declared All the judgments of Your mouth.
Bahnar: 'Bơ̆r inh gô ră roi, dôm lu nơ̆r đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: I have rejoiced in the way of Your testimonies, As much as in all riches.
Bahnar: Inh hiôk chơt kiơ̆ nơ̆r Ih đei tơtă. Thoi chhôk 'nă kơ mơdrŏng tih.

English: I will meditate on Your precepts, And contemplate Your ways.
Bahnar: Inh oei tơchĕng ling-lang kơ tơdrong juăt ih. Lăng kơchăm lăng tơ trong Ih.

English: I will delight myself in Your statutes; I will not forget Your word.
Bahnar: Inh lăp dêh kơ tơdrong juăt Ih, ưh kơ hiơt kơ nơ̆r Ih

English: Deal bountifully with Your servant, That I may live and keep Your word.
Bahnar: Pơm 'Lơ̆ng kơ inh đĭch đam Ih, wă kơ inh gơh arih; Inh gô wei răk nơ̆r Ih.

English: Open my eyes, that I may see Wondrous things from Your law.
Bahnar: Pơih măt inh, wă kơ inh gơh 'bôh dôm tơdrong hlĭch chrơp lăm khôi juăt Ih.

English: I am a stranger in the earth; Do not hide Your commandments from me.
Bahnar: Inh jơ̆ minh 'nu bơngai tơmoi oei kơpal teh. Apinh 'nĕ ôn kơ inh dôm nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: My soul breaks with longing For Your judgments at all times.
Bahnar: Bơhngol inh hơkĕ hrŏ chang hơpơi ling-lang wă kơ băt dôm tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: You rebuke the proud—the cursed, Who stray from Your commandments.
Bahnar: Ih chrih hil kơ lu bơngai pơang, jơ̆ lu bơngai trŏ kơ hiap pơtê̆. Lu bơngai mă weh ataih đơ̆ng Ih tơtă.

English: Remove from me reproach and contempt, For I have kept Your testimonies.
Bahnar: Apinh iŏk lê̆ đơ̆ng tơdrong inh mơlâu. Păng tơdrong đe areh. Na inh răk dôm nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: Princes also sit and speak against me, But Your servant meditates on Your statutes.
Bahnar: Yŏng pơgơ̆r oei pơđâu chă wă pơm kơ inh; Mă-lei đĭch đam Ih gô tơchĕng kơ khôi juăt Ih.

English: Your testimonies also are my delight And my counselors.
Bahnar: Dôm nơ̆r Ih tơpăt, jơ̆ nơ̆r mă inh lăp đon, Lu nơ̆r noh boih tơ'bôh tơbăt ăn kơ inh.

English: My soul clings to the dust; Revive me according to Your word.
Bahnar: Bơhngol inh klep lăm 'mui teh. Tơiung pơrih inh dơ̆ng. Kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: I have declared my ways, and You answered me; Teach me Your statutes.
Bahnar: Inh đei roi boih trong inh kơ Ih. Na Ih đei tơl tơwih kơ inh; apinh Ih bơtho inh dôm tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: Make me understand the way of Your precepts; So shall I meditate on Your wonderful works.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ inh gơh hlôh băt tơdrong Ih bơtho tơtă. Na inh gô tơchĕng ling-lang dôm tơdrong jang hlĭch chrơp Ih.

English: My soul melts from heaviness; Strengthen me according to Your word.
Bahnar: Inh lĕch đak măt nhơ̆m hmoi, yua kơ sơ'ngon. Apinh Ih ăn kơ inh đei jơhngơ̆m pran kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: Remove from me the way of lying, And grant me Your law graciously.
Bahnar: Apinh wei inh weh ataih đơ̆ng trong glăi. Apinh Ih mơnat bơtho ăn kơ inh băt kơ khôi juăt Ih.

English: I have chosen the way of truth; Your judgments I have laid before me.
Bahnar: Inh đei rơih iŏk boih trong tơ anăp; 'Măn nơ̆r Ih tơtă 'bơ̆t anăp inh.

English: I cling to Your testimonies; O LORD, do not put me to shame!
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang ơi! Inh rôp kơjăp nơ̆r Ih tơbăt; Apinh Ih 'nĕ ăn kơ inh mơlâu.

English: I will run the course of Your commandments, For You shall enlarge my heart.
Bahnar: Inh gô kơdâu kiơ̆ trong Ih tơtă. Dah Ih pơih jơhngơ̆m inh să

English: Teach me, O LORD, the way of Your statutes, And I shall keep it to the end.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh bơtho tơ'bôh kơ inh kiơ̆ trong Ih tơtă. Na inh gô wei răk dĭng truh tơ năr tôch.

English: Give me understanding, and I shall keep Your law; Indeed, I shall observe it with my whole heart.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih ăn kơ inh gơh hơgei, Na inh gô wei răk tơdrong juăt Ih. Păng chu yom hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m.

English: Make me walk in the path of Your commandments, For I delight in it.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih ăn kơ inh yak kiơ̆ nơ̆r Ih tơtă; Yua kơ inh chơt hiôk lăm trong noh.

English: Incline my heart to Your testimonies, And not to covetousness.
Bahnar: Apinh ăn kơ jơhngơ̆m inh tơchĕng kơ tơdrong juăt Ih. 'Nĕ ăn kơ inh tơchĕng kơ tơdrong lơi kơdih akâu.

English: Turn away my eyes from looking at worthless things, And revive me in Your way.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih pơdăr măt inh wă kơ huay lăng lu tơdrong ưh kơ yua. Ăn kơ inh gơh arih kiơ̆ lăm lu trong Ih.

English: Establish Your word to Your servant, Who is devoted to fearing You.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih pơkeh nơ̆r pơkăm hăm lu đĭch đam Ih. Lu bơngai mă hli yom kơ Ih.

English: Turn away my reproach which I dread, For Your judgments are good.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih iŏk lê̆ tơdrong đe pơm kơ inh mơlâu mă inh hli tơtơ̆, yua kơ nơ̆r tơtă đơ̆ng Ih 'lơ̆ng tơpăt.

English: Behold, I long for Your precepts; Revive me in Your righteousness.
Bahnar: Âu, inh hơpơi wă dôm lu nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă. Apinh ăn kơ inh gơh arih kiơ̆ lăm trong tơdrong tơpăt Ih.

English: Let Your mercies come also to me, O LORD— Your salvation according to Your word.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, ăn kơ tơdrong 'mêm Ih truh tơ inh. Tơdrong Ih dŏng pơklaih kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r Ih đei pơkăm.

English: So shall I have an answer for him who reproaches me, For I trust in Your word.
Bahnar: Lei inh gơh tơl tơwih kơ lu bơngai pơjăm inh. Yua kơ inh gơnang kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth, For I have hoped in Your ordinances.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih 'nĕ kơ iŏk lê̆ dôm nơ̆r tơpăt đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r inh, Yua kơ inh gơnang hơmĕng kơ nơ̆r tơtă Ih.

English: So shall I keep Your law continually, Forever and ever.
Bahnar: Inh gô wei răk tơdrong juăt Ih dĭng truh tơ ning-mônh ling-lang hlŏng hloi.

English: And I will walk at liberty, For I seek Your precepts.
Bahnar: Inh gô yak nơnăm rơngei, yua kơ inh kiơ̆ chơchă tơdrong Ih bơtho tơtă.

English: I will speak of Your testimonies also before kings, And will not be ashamed.
Bahnar: Inh gô ră roi tơdrong Ih tơtă 'bơ̆t anăp lu pơtao. Ưh kơ đei mơlâu.

English: And I will delight myself in Your commandments, Which I love.
Bahnar: Inh chơt hiôk kơ nơ̆r Ih tơtă tơdrong mă inh 'mêm.

English: My hands also I will lift up to Your commandments, Which I love, And I will meditate on Your statutes.
Bahnar: Inh gô yơ̆r ti gah nơ̆r tơtă Ih, mă inh 'mêm păng tơchĕng kơ lu tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: Remember the word to Your servant, Upon which You have caused me to hope.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih 'blŏk kơ nơ̆r Ih đei pơkă hăm lu đĭch đam Ih. Đơ̆ng tơdrong 'nâu Ih ăn kơ inh đei hơmĕng.

English: This is my comfort in my affliction, For Your word has given me life.
Bahnar: Nơ̆r Ih pơkă wă wei tơdrong arih inh. 'Nâu boih tơdrong mă pơlung inh lăm năr pơmat-tat.

English: The proud have me in great derision, Yet I do not turn aside from Your law.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơang, blei hiap inh lơ dêh. Mă-lei inh ưh kơ achăng lê̆ khôi juăt Ih.

English: I remembered Your judgments of old, O LORD, And have comforted myself.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh 'blŏk kơ nơ̆r Ih tơtă đơ̆ng sơ̆. Nơ̆r noh pơlung inh.

English: Indignation has taken hold of me Because of the wicked, who forsake Your law.
Bahnar: Inh blĕk tơtŏ 'bĕnh kơ jơhngơ̆m inh. 'Bôh lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ achăng lê̆ khôi juăt Ih

English: Your statutes have been my songs In the house of my pilgrimage.
Bahnar: Lu tơdrong juăt Ih jing 'bai hơri inh. Kơplah inh oei lăm hnam tơmoi.

English: I remember Your name in the night, O LORD, And I keep Your law.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, kơmăng inh 'blŏk kơ anăn Ih; Kŭm wei răk khôi juăt Ih.

English: This has become mine, Because I kept Your precepts.
Bahnar: Inh đei tơdrong âu. Inh đei wei răk dôm nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă.

English: You are my portion, O LORD; I have said that I would keep Your words.
Bahnar: Kră Yang jing mŭk tơmam inh boih. Inh đei pơkă wă wei răk nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă.

English: I entreated Your favor with my whole heart; Be merciful to me according to Your word.
Bahnar: Đĭ jơhngơ̆m inh krao apinh Kră Yang mơnat, Apinh Ih mơnat ăn kơ inh kiơ̆ thoi nơ̆r Ih pơkă.

English: I thought about my ways, And turned my feet to Your testimonies.
Bahnar: Inh tơchĕng kơ trong inh, inh gơwĕch jơ̆ng inh gah tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: I made haste, and did not delay To keep Your commandments.
Bahnar: Inh hăt hot hloi ưh kơ gô ôh. Wă wei răk dôm nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: The cords of the wicked have bound me, But I have not forgotten Your law.
Bahnar: Mă tơlei lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ dăng tăp kơ inh, Mă-lei inh ưh kơ hiơt kơ khôi juăt Ih.

English: At midnight I will rise to give thanks to You, Because of Your righteous judgments.
Bahnar: Inh gô iung tŏk-bŏk măng wă bơnê kơ Ih. Yua kơ tơdrong pơkă tơpăt Ih.

English: I am a companion of all who fear You, And of those who keep Your precepts.
Bahnar: Inh jing buăl kơ lu bơngai băt hli yom kơ Ih, Păng lu bơngai mă bơwei dôm tơdrong Ih đei bơtho pơkă.

English: The earth, O LORD, is full of Your mercy; Teach me Your statutes.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, teh âu 'bĕnh kơ tơdrong 'mêm Ih, Apinh Ih bơtho pơhrăm ăn kơ inh tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: You have dealt well with Your servant, O LORD, according to Your word.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Ih pơm 'lơ̆ng kơ lu đĭch đam Ih. Kiơ̆ thoi nơ̆r Ih khan.

English: Teach me good judgment and knowledge, For I believe Your commandments.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih bơtho inh hlôh wao. Wă kơ inh pơm trŏ. Yua kơ inh lui kơ nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: Before I was afflicted I went astray, But now I keep Your word.
Bahnar: Adrol kơ đei tơdrong pơmat-tat inh đĭ jrok boih; Mă-lei dang ei inh wei răk nơ̆r Ih.

English: You are good, and do good; Teach me Your statutes.
Bahnar: Ih 'lơ̆ng juăt kơ pơm 'lơ̆ng; apinh Ih bơtho inh tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: The proud have forged a lie against me, But I will keep Your precepts with my whole heart.
Bahnar: Mă lu bơngai pơang đei boih nơ̆r pơma kơnê̆ hơlĕnh kơ inh. Inh gô wei răk dôm nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m.

English: Their heart is as fat as grease, But I delight in Your law.
Bahnar: Jơhngơ̆m lu sư hơ'bơ̆l thoi rơmă đĭ pă mơn. Mă-lei inh hiôk lăm khôi juăt Ih.

English: It is good for me that I have been afflicted, That I may learn Your statutes.
Bahnar: Inh đei tơdrong pơmat, trŏ 'lơ̆ng tơpă. Wă kơ inh hŏk iŏk kiơ̆ khôi juăt Ih.

English: The law of Your mouth is better to me Than thousands of coins of gold and silver.
Bahnar: Khôi juăt đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r Ih pơma jing 'lơ̆ng kơ inh. Hloh kơ đei rơbâu tơpei hu maih.

English: Your hands have made me and fashioned me; Give me understanding, that I may learn Your commandments.
Bahnar: Tơpang ti Ih pơjing păng man inh; Ăn kơ inh 'ngok hlôh wao, wă kơ inh hŏk kiơ̆ nơ̆r tơtă Ih.

English: Those who fear You will be glad when they see me, Because I have hoped in Your word.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai hli yom kơ Kră Yang 'bôh inh lu sư gô chơt hiôk. Yua kơ inh hơmĕng kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: I know, O LORD, that Your judgments are right, And that in faithfulness You have afflicted me.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh băt tơdrong Ih sek tơlang tơpăt. Noh đơ̆ng tơdrong Ih tơpăt. Na Ih pơm kơ inh pơmat-tat.

English: Let, I pray, Your merciful kindness be for my comfort, According to Your word to Your servant.
Bahnar: Ăn tơdrong 'mêm Ih pơlung inh. 'Blep thoi nơ̆r Ih đei pơkă kơ lu đĭch đam Ih.

English: Let Your tender mercies come to me, that I may live; For Your law is my delight.
Bahnar: Apinh tơdrong 'mêm mơnat Ih truh tơ inh, wă kơ inh gơh arih, Yua kơ inh hiôk lăm khôi juăt Ih.

English: Let the proud be ashamed, For they treated me wrongfully with falsehood; But I will meditate on Your precepts.
Bahnar: Thŭ lu pơang mơlâu, Yua kơ lu sư yua tơdrong hơlĕnh pơdăr wă pơrăm inh; Mă-lei inh gô tơchĕng lu nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan.

English: Let those who fear You turn to me, Those who know Your testimonies.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih ăn kơ lu bơngai hli yom kơ Ih brŏk hơlơ̆k tơ inh, wă kơ lu sư băt kơ tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: Let my heart be blameless regarding Your statutes, That I may not be ashamed.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih ăn kơ jơhngơ̆m inh gơh 'lơ̆ng tơpăt lăm Khôi juăt Ih; wă kơ inh huay kơ mơlâu.

English: My soul faints for Your salvation, But I hope in Your word.
Bahnar: Bơhngol inh rơdu rơmơ̆n chang gô tơdrong dŏng pơklaih đơ̆ng Ih. Mă-lei Inh hơmĕng kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: My eyes fail from searching Your word, Saying, “When will You comfort me?”
Bahnar: Măt inh rơmơ̆n chang gô nơ̆r Ih pơkă; Inh khan: “Dang yơ Ih pơlung inh?”

English: For I have become like a wineskin in smoke, Yet I do not forget Your statutes.
Bahnar: Yua kơ inh jing thoi get akar 'nhek 'nhoi. Mă-lei inh ưh kơ hiơt kơ khôi juăt Ih.

English: How many are the days of Your servant? When will You execute judgment on those who persecute me?
Bahnar: Đĭch đam Ih oei gô dĭng dang yơ dơ̆ng. Layơ Ih wă sek tơlang kơ bơngai pơm kơnê̆ kơ inh?

English: The proud have dug pits for me, Which is not according to Your law.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơang sir boih sơlŭng wă pơrăm inh? Noh lu bơngai ưh kơ pơm kiơ̆ khôi juăt Ih.

English: All Your commandments are faithful; They persecute me wrongfully; Help me!
Bahnar: Dôm nơ̆r Ih tơtă trŏ sĭt tơpă apinh Ih tơgŭm inh. Bơngai lăm teh đak yua tơdrong hơlĕnh wă pơrăm inh

English: They almost made an end of me on earth, But I did not forsake Your precepts.
Bahnar: Mă lu sư wă pơlôch inh đơ̆ng kơpal teh; Mă-lei inh ưh kơ đei lê̆ dôm nơ̆r Ih bơtho pơkă.

English: Revive me according to Your lovingkindness, So that I may keep the testimony of Your mouth.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih ăn kơ inh gơh arih Kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong 'mêm Ih, Na inh gô wei răk nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan.

English: Forever, O LORD, Your word is settled in heaven.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, nơ̆r Ih oei kơjăp ling-lang tơ kơpal plĕnh

English: Your faithfulness endures to all generations; You established the earth, and it abides.
Bahnar: Tơdrong sĭt 'lơ̆ng tơpăt Ih oei đei đơ̆ng jơhnơr âu truh tơ jơhnơr nai. Ih pơjing boih teh, teh oei kơjăp.

English: They continue this day according to Your ordinances, For all are Your servants.
Bahnar: Kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r tơtă Ih, dôm tơdrong oei kơjăp truh năr âu; Yua kơ đĭ-đăng đĭch đam Ih ngăl.

English: Unless Your law had been my delight, I would then have perished in my affliction.
Bahnar: Tơdah khôi juăt Ih ưh kơ pơm kơ inh hiôk. Lei inh lôch hiong boih, lăm năr inh pơmat-tat.

English: I will never forget Your precepts, For by them You have given me life.
Bahnar: Inh ưh kơ đei layơ hiơt kơ nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă. Yua kơ đơ̆ng lu tơdrong noh na Ih ăn kơ inh đei arih.

English: I am Yours, save me; For I have sought Your precepts.
Bahnar: Inh gah Ih boih, apinh Ih dŏng pơklaih inh; inh chă dôm nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă.

English: The wicked wait for me to destroy me, But I will consider Your testimonies.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai kơnê̆ nŏng kơ chă wă pơlôch inh, Mă-lei inh adrin kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan.

English: I have seen the consummation of all perfection, But Your commandment is exceedingly broad.
Bahnar: Inh 'bôh boih dôm tơdrong tơmam mă 'lơ̆ng tôch ngăl. Mă-lei tơdrong juăt Ih ưh kơ tôch.

English: Oh, how I love Your law! It is my meditation all the day.
Bahnar: Inh 'mêm kơ khôi juăt Ih dêh! Prăt năr inh tơchĕng kơ khôi juăt noh.

English: You, through Your commandments, make me wiser than my enemies; For they are ever with me.
Bahnar: Dôm nơ̆r Ih tơtă, pơm kơ inh hơgei hloh kơ lu ayăt kơ inh. Yua kơ dôm nơ̆r noh oei hơdai inh ling-lang.

English: I have more understanding than all my teachers, For Your testimonies are my meditation.
Bahnar: Inh đei đon hơgei hloh kơ lu bơngai bơtho inh. Yua kơ inh tơchĕng lu tơdrong đêl Ih bơtho khan.

English: I understand more than the ancients, Because I keep Your precepts.
Bahnar: Inh hlôh wao hloh kơ lu kră. Yua kơ inh wei răk dôm nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: I have restrained my feet from every evil way, That I may keep Your word.
Bahnar: Inh gơ̆t jơ̆ng inh kuă ăn năm trong glăi. Wă kơ inh wei răk nơ̆r Ih.

English: I have not departed from Your judgments, For You Yourself have taught me.
Bahnar: Inh ưh kơ đei achăng lê̆ nơ̆r tơtă Ih. Yua kơ Ih kơdih đei bơtho tơ'bôh kơ inh.

English: How sweet are Your words to my taste, Sweeter than honey to my mouth!
Bahnar: Nơ̆r Kră Yang pơm kơ hơlŏng inh 'ngam dêh. 'Ngam hloh kơ đak sut lăm 'bơ̆r inh.

English: Through Your precepts I get understanding; Therefore I hate every false way.
Bahnar: Đơ̆ng nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan na inh hlôh wao, thoi noh na inh areh kơ trong hơlĕnh.

English: Your word is a lamp to my feet And a light to my path.
Bahnar: Nơ̆r Ih jing ŭnh kơđeng kơ jơ̆ng inh. Nhơk pơchrang ăn kơ trong inh.

English: I have sworn and confirmed That I will keep Your righteous judgments.
Bahnar: Inh đei pơkăm păng wei răk nơ̆r pơkăm. Inh gô kiơ̆ nơ̆r Ih tơtă tơpăt

English: I am afflicted very much; Revive me, O LORD, according to Your word.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Inh pơmat-tat dêh; Apinh Ih pơrih inh dơ̆ng kiơ̆ thoi nơ̆r Ih.

English: Accept, I pray, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O LORD, And teach me Your judgments.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Apinh Ih iŏk tơdrong bơnê pơyơ̆r kơ Ih đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r inh. Păng bơtho inh tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: My life is continually in my hand, Yet I do not forget Your law.
Bahnar: Tơdrong arih inh ngăl đei hli hơmơt, Mă-lei inh ưh kơ hiơt kơ khôi juăt Ih.

English: The wicked have laid a snare for me, Yet I have not strayed from Your precepts.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ hơ'năk hơđong wă pơrăm inh; Mă-lei inh ưh kơ achăng lê̆ nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan.

English: Your testimonies I have taken as a heritage forever, For they are the rejoicing of my heart.
Bahnar: Nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan jing mŭk tơmam inh ling-lang. Yua kơ noh jơhngơ̆m inh chơt hiôk

English: I have inclined my heart to perform Your statutes Forever, to the very end.
Bahnar: Jơhngơ̆m inh rơih boih pơm kiơ̆ khôi juăt Ih. Ling-lang dĭng truh tơ tôch.

English: I hate the double-minded, But I love Your law.
Bahnar: Inh areh kơ lu bơngai đei jơhngơ̆m 'bar pah. Mă-lei 'mêm kơ khôi juăt Ih.

English: You are my hiding place and my shield; I hope in Your word.
Bahnar: Ih boih anih inh kơ'nơp păng khêl pĕng inh; Inh hơmĕng kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: Depart from me, you evildoers, For I will keep the commandments of my God!
Bahnar: Ơ lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆, weh bĕ đơ̆ng inh. Wă kơ inh wei răk nơ̆r Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh tơtă.

English: Uphold me according to Your word, that I may live; And do not let me be ashamed of my hope.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih tơgŭm tơiung inh kiơ̆ thoi Ih pơkă wă kơ inh gơh arih; 'Nĕ ăn kơ inh mơlâu kơ tơdrong inh chang hơmĕng

English: Hold me up, and I shall be safe, And I shall observe Your statutes continually.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih dŏng tơgŭm inh, na inh hơđơ̆ng. Wă kơ inh pơm kiơ̆ kơ khôi juăt Ih ling-lang.

English: You reject all those who stray from Your statutes, For their deceit is falsehood.
Bahnar: Ih sơngah đĭ kơ lu bơngai weh đơ̆ng khôi juăt Ih; Tơdrong lu sư hơlĕnh jing tơdrong ưh kơ đei.

English: You put away all the wicked of the earth like dross; Therefore I love Your testimonies.
Bahnar: Ih lăng lu bơngai kơnê̆ lăm teh đak thoi hla đuih; Yua kơ noh na inh 'mêm kơ nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan.

English: My flesh trembles for fear of You, And I am afraid of Your judgments.
Bahnar: Akâu inh pơpơ̆ yua kơ hli kơ Ih. Kŭm hli kơ tơdrong Ih sek tơlang.

English: I have done justice and righteousness; Do not leave me to my oppressors.
Bahnar: Inh pơm boih tơdrong tơpăt păng tơdrong trŏ, 'Nĕ jao inh kơ lu bơngai pơjuă pơđep inh.

English: Be surety for Your servant for good; Do not let the proud oppress me.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih wei-lăng lu đĭch đam Ih wă kơ đei pŭn hiôk; 'Nĕ ăn kơ lu bơngai pơang pơjuă pơđep inh.

English: My eyes fail from seeking Your salvation And Your righteous word.
Bahnar: Măt inh hrŏ yua kơ chang gô Ih dŏng pơklaih. Păng nơ̆r Ih pơkă tơpăt.

English: Deal with Your servant according to Your mercy, And teach me Your statutes.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih pơm hăm lu đĭch đam kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong 'mêm Ih, Păng bơtho inh lu khôi juăt Ih.

English: I am Your servant; Give me understanding, That I may know Your testimonies.
Bahnar: Inh đĭch đam Ih, Apinh Ih ăn kơ inh tơdrong hlôh wao. Wă kơ inh gơh băt hlôh kơ nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan.

English: It is time for You to act, O LORD, For they have regarded Your law as void.
Bahnar: Truh boih kơ jơ Kră Yang wă pơm. Yua kơ đei bơngai pơm pơhloh kơ tơdrong juăt Ih

English: Therefore I love Your commandments More than gold, yes, than fine gold!
Bahnar: Yua kơ inh 'mêm kơ nơ̆r Ih tơtă. Hloh kơ maih, kư̆m hloh loi kơ maih rơgoh.

English: Therefore all Your precepts concerning all things I consider to be right; I hate every false way.
Bahnar: Yua kơ thoi noh, inh lăng đĭ-đăng nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă trŏ ngăl. Inh areh kơ trong tơdrong hơlĕnh.

English: Your testimonies are wonderful; Therefore my soul keeps them.
Bahnar: Nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan jing hlĭch chrơp tơpă. Thoi noh inh wei răk lu sư.

English: The entrance of Your words gives light; It gives understanding to the simple.
Bahnar: Tơdrong bơtho tơblang nơ̆r Ih pơchrang ăn hơdah. Sư ăn tơdrong hlôh wao kơ lu bơngai tơpăt.

English: I opened my mouth and panted, For I longed for Your commandments.
Bahnar: Inh ha 'bơ̆r rơhing. Yua kơ inh chang hơpơi dêh lu nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: Look upon me and be merciful to me, As Your custom is toward those who love Your name.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih hue lăng păng mơnat kơ inh, Kŭm thoi Ih ngăl juăt 'mêm kơ lu bơngai bu mă 'mêm kơ anăn Ih.

English: Direct my steps by Your word, And let no iniquity have dominion over me.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih ăn kơ rim yak inh kơjăp lăm nơ̆r Ih. 'Nĕ ăn tơdrong kơnê̆ kiơ̆ pơgơ̆r inh.

English: Redeem me from the oppression of man, That I may keep Your precepts.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih huai iŏk inh đơ̆ng bơngai pơjuă pơđep, wă kơ inh wei răk kiơ̆ nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă.

English: Make Your face shine upon Your servant, And teach me Your statutes.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih pơchrang bĕ muh măt Ih kơ lu đĭch đam Ih, Păng bơtho inh tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: Rivers of water run down from my eyes, Because men do not keep Your law.
Bahnar: Đak măt inh lĕch ro nhen thoi đak glung. Yua kơ đe kuă kơ wei răk khôi juăt Ih.

English: Righteous are You, O LORD, And upright are Your judgments.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Ih 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, Tơdrong Ih sek tơlang tơpăt.

English: Your testimonies, which You have commanded, Are righteous and very faithful.
Bahnar: Ih tơtă boih tơdrong ih bơtho 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, Trŏ kơ lui gơnang tơpă.

English: My zeal has consumed me, Because my enemies have forgotten Your words.
Bahnar: Tơdrong inh tơnăp soh chhông lăm jơhngơ̆m inh. Yua kơ lu bơngai ayăt kơ inh hiơt boih kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: Your word is very pure; Therefore Your servant loves it.
Bahnar: Nơ̆r Ih pơma 'lơ̆ng rơgoh tơpă. Na lu đĭch đam Ih 'mêm kơ nơ̆r noh

English: I am small and despised, Yet I do not forget Your precepts.
Bahnar: Mă inh bơngai iĕ, đe pơjăm pơjuă, Mă-lei ưh kơ đei layơ hiơt kơ nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă.

English: Your righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, And Your law is truth.
Bahnar: Tơdrong tơpăt Ih jơ̆ tơdrong tơpăt ling-lang hlŏng hloi. Khôi juăt Ih sĭt tơpă.

English: Trouble and anguish have overtaken me, Yet Your commandments are my delights.
Bahnar: Tơdrong pơmat-tat păng tơdrong ơh sơ'ngon truh tơ inh. Mă-lei inh oei hiôk kơ nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: The righteousness of Your testimonies is everlasting; Give me understanding, and I shall live.
Bahnar: Nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan jơ̆ tơpăt ling-lang hlŏng hloi. Ăn kơ inh hlôh wao, wă kơ inh gơh arih.

English: I cry out with my whole heart; Hear me, O LORD! I will keep Your statutes.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang inh krao chă Ih hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m, Apinh Ih tơl tơwih kơ inh. Inh gô wei răk khôi juăt Ih.

English: I cry out to You; Save me, and I will keep Your testimonies.
Bahnar: Inh krao apinh Ih. Dŏng pơklaih inh bĕ; Na inh gô wei răk nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă.

English: I rise before the dawning of the morning, And cry for help; I hope in Your word.
Bahnar: Inh iung đơ̆ng hrôih drôih krao apinh, Inh chang hơmĕng kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: My eyes are awake through the night watches, That I may meditate on Your word.
Bahnar: Măt inh kral prăt măng ưh kơ tep, wă kơ tơchĕng kơ nơ̆r Ih pơkă.

English: Hear my voice according to Your lovingkindness; O LORD, revive me according to Your justice.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong 'mêm Ih, apinh Ih mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh apinh, Apinh wei tơdrong arih inh kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: They draw near who follow after wickedness; They are far from Your law.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai chă pơm tơdrong kơnê̆ truh jê̆ boih. Mă-lei lu sư ataih đơ̆ng khôi juăt Ih.

English: You are near, O LORD, And all Your commandments are truth.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang Ih oei jê̆; păng dôm lu nơ̆r Ih tơtă sĭt tơpă.

English: Concerning Your testimonies, I have known of old that You have founded them forever.
Bahnar: Kư̆ kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r Ih bơtho, inh băt boih đơ̆ng sơ̆: Ih pơjing nơ̆r tơtă noh oei oei ling-lang.

English: Consider my affliction and deliver me, For I do not forget Your law.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih lăng bĕ tơdrong inh pŭ pơmat păng dŏng pơklaih inh; Na inh ưh kơ hiơt ôh khôi juăt ih.

English: Plead my cause and redeem me; Revive me according to Your word.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih dŏng inh păng huai iŏk inh, Apinh wei tơdrong arih inh kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r Ih pơkă.

English: Salvation is far from the wicked, For they do not seek Your statutes.
Bahnar: Tơdrong dŏng pơklaih ataih dơ̆ng lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆. Yua kơ lu sư ưh kơ đei chơchă lu tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: Great are Your tender mercies, O LORD; Revive me according to Your judgments.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, tơdrong 'mêm mơnat Ih tih tơpă. Apinh wei tơdrong arih inh kiơ̆ khôi juăt Ih.

English: Many are my persecutors and my enemies, Yet I do not turn from Your testimonies.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai ayăt areh păng pơjuă pơđep inh lơ tơpă; Mă-lei inh ưh kơ đei achăng lê̆ nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă.

English: I see the treacherous, and am disgusted, Because they do not keep Your word.
Bahnar: Inh 'bôh lu bơngai hơlĕnh pơdăr, lăng krưp areh dêh kơ lu sư; Yua kơ lu sư ưh kơ wei răk nơ̆r Ih.

English: Consider how I love Your precepts; Revive me, O LORD, according to Your lovingkindness.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih lăng inh 'mêm kơ nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan dang yơ! Ơ Kră Yang, apinh wei tơdrong arih inh kiơ̆ thoi tơdrong 'mêm Ih.

English: The entirety of Your word is truth, And every one of Your righteous judgments endures forever.
Bahnar: Đĭ dôm nơ̆r Ih pơma jơ̆ sĭt tơpă. Dôm nơ̆r tơtă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt Ih oei oei ling-lang

English: Princes persecute me without a cause, But my heart stands in awe of Your word.
Bahnar: Lu yŏng pơgơ̆r rôp pơmat inh tơdrong ưh kơ đei. Mă-lei inh hli yom kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: I rejoice at Your word As one who finds great treasure.
Bahnar: Inh hiôk chơt kơ nơ̆r Ih pơkă thoi lu đe blah iŏk đei tơmam lơ.

English: I hate and abhor lying, But I love Your law.
Bahnar: Inh areh păng krưp dêh, kơ tơdrong hơlĕnh pơdăr. Mă-lei inh 'mêm kơ khôi juăt Ih.

English: Seven times a day I praise You, Because of Your righteous judgments.
Bahnar: Rim năr inh kơkuh bơnê kơ Ih tơpơh wơ̆t. Kơ nơ̆r tơtă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt Ih.

English: Great peace have those who love Your law, And nothing causes them to stumble.
Bahnar: Bu mă 'mêm kơ khôi juăt Ih đei tơdrong hiôk-hian tih. Ưh kơ đei kiơ mă gơh pơm kơ lu sư pơ̆k huŏng.

English: LORD, I hope for Your salvation, And I do Your commandments.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh chang hơmĕng kơ tơdrong dŏng pơklaih đơ̆ng Ih, Păng pơm kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: My soul keeps Your testimonies, And I love them exceedingly.
Bahnar: Inh wei răk boih nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă. Inh 'mêm kơ nơ̆r tơtă noh dêh tơpă.

English: I keep Your precepts and Your testimonies, For all my ways are before You.
Bahnar: Inh wei răk nơ̆r Ih bơtho khan păng nơ̆r Ih tơtă. Yua kơ trong inh tă kơ 'bơ̆t anăp Ih ngăl.

English: Let my cry come before You, O LORD; Give me understanding according to Your word.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, ăn kơ nơ̆r inh ôr krao truh tơ Ih. Ăn kơ inh hlôh wao, kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r Ih.

English: Let my supplication come before You; Deliver me according to Your word.
Bahnar: Ăn nơ̆r inh krao ôr truh tơ Ih. Apinh dŏng pơklaih inh kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r Ih pơkă.

English: My lips shall utter praise, For You teach me Your statutes.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ 'bơ̆r inh lĕch dôm nơ̆r bơnê kơ Ih. Yua kơ Ih bơtho boih inh dôm tơdrong juăt Ih.

English: My tongue shall speak of Your word, For all Your commandments are righteousness.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ hơpiĕt inh hơri kơ nơ̆r Ih. Yua kơ đĭ nơ̆r Ih tơtă tơpăt ngăl.

English: Let Your hand become my help, For I have chosen Your precepts.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ ti Ih dŏng tơgŭm inh hloi; Yua kơ inh rơih iŏk nơ̆r Ih bơtho tơtă.

English: I long for Your salvation, O LORD, And Your law is my delight.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh hơpơi chang tơdrong dŏng pơklaih đơ̆ng Ih. Khôi juăt Ih mă inh hiôk tơpă.

English: Let my soul live, and it shall praise You; And let Your judgments help me.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ bơhngol inh arih. Wă kơ hơri bơnê kơ Ih. Ăn kơ tơdrong juăt Ih tơgŭm inh.

English: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; Seek Your servant, For I do not forget Your commandments.
Bahnar: Inh wơ̆l jrok thoi triu hiong; apinh chơchă inh đĭch đam Ih. Yua kơ inh ưh kơ hiơt nơ̆r Ih tơtă.

English: In my distress I cried to the LORD, And He heard me.
Bahnar: Lăm năr đei tơdrong pơmat-tat inh krao apinh Kră Yang. Na Sư tơl tơwih nơ̆r inh.

English: Deliver my soul, O LORD, from lying lips And from a deceitful tongue.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh pơklaih bơhngol inh đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r hơlĕnh, Đơ̆ng hơpiĕt lu bơngai pơhlŭ.

English: What shall be given to you, Or what shall be done to you, You false tongue?
Bahnar: Ơ hơpiĕt hơlĕnh pơhlŭ, Kră Yang wă pơm kiơ kơ ih? Thim ăn kơ ih tơdrong phak kiơ dơ̆ng?

English: Sharp arrows of the warrior, With coals of the broom tree!
Bahnar: Noh 'brơ̆m suĕng đơ̆ng lu linh; păng ngar 'long ŭnh ngŭr.

English: Woe is me, that I dwell in Meshech, That I dwell among the tents of Kedar!
Bahnar: Răm-'băm dêh kơ inh oei lăm Mêsĕk. Păng oei tơ lăm kơđông Kêđa.

English: My soul has dwelt too long With one who hates peace.
Bahnar: Đunh tơpă inh oei hơdai hăm lu bơngai areh kơ tơdrong hiôk-hian.

English: I am for peace; But when I speak, they are for war.
Bahnar: Inh wă tơdrong rơnŭk rơnua, mă-lei dah inh pơma 'biơ̆, Lu sư 'maih tơblah.

English: I will lift up my eyes to the hills— From whence comes my help?
Bahnar: Inh ngơk măt lăng tơ kơpal kông tơdrong tơgŭm dŏng inh truh đơ̆ng yơ?

English: My help comes from the LORD, Who made heaven and earth.
Bahnar: Tơdrong dŏng tơgŭm inh lĕch đơ̆ng Kră Yang. Tơ'ngla mă pơjing plĕnh hăm teh.

English: He will not allow your foot to be moved; He who keeps you will not slumber.
Bahnar: Sư ưh kơ đei lê̆ jơ̆ng ih tơpling. Sư Tơ'ngla wei-lăng ih ưh kơ layơ tep.

English: Behold, He who keeps Israel Shall neither slumber nor sleep.
Bahnar: Kră Yang wei-lăng Isơrael ưh kơ đei layơ 'bĭch păng kư̆m ưh kơ đei layơ tep.

English: The LORD is your keeper; The LORD is your shade at your right hand.
Bahnar: Kră Yang Tơ'ngla wei-lăng ih. Kră Yang yơ̆p pơyơ̆l kơ ti 'ma ih.

English: The sun shall not strike you by day, Nor the moon by night.
Bahnar: Măt 'năr ưh kơ đei pơm kơ ih tŏ ôh kơ 'năr, măt khei kư̆m ưh kơ đei pơrăm ih kơmăng.

English: The LORD shall preserve you from all evil; He shall preserve your soul.
Bahnar: Kră Yang wei-lăng ih huay kơ răm, Sư gô bơwei tơdrong arih ih.

English: The LORD shall preserve your going out and your coming in From this time forth, and even forevermore.
Bahnar: Kră Yang gô wei-lăng kơplah ih lĕch dah ih mơ̆t. Đơ̆ng dang ei dĭng truh tơ ning-mônh ling-lang.

English: I was glad when they said to me, “Let us go into the house of the LORD.”
Bahnar: Inh hiôk dêh mưh đe khan kơ inh thoi âu: “Bĕ bơ̆n năm tơ hnam Kră Yang.”

English: Our feet have been standing Within your gates, O Jerusalem!
Bahnar: Ơ Jêrusalem, jơ̆ng lu nhôn dơ̆ng 'bơ̆t 'măng jang ih.

English: Jerusalem is built As a city that is compact together
Bahnar: Jêrusalem đei man thoi pơlei tih. Đei man pơkăp băl kơjăp.

English: Where the tribes go up, The tribes of the LORD, To the Testimony of Israel, To give thanks to the name of the LORD.
Bahnar: Tơ noh adrĕch kon pơlei tŏk năm. Lu adrĕch adrung Kră Yang tŏk kiơ̆ kơ nơ̆r tơtă kơ lu bơngai Isơrael, wă kơkuh bơnê kơ Anăn Kră Yang.

English: For thrones are set there for judgment, The thrones of the house of David.
Bahnar: Tơ noh đei pơjing lu anih tang-dŏ sek tơlang. Wă khan tang-dŏ lu pơtao adrĕch Đawit.

English: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: “May they prosper who love you.
Bahnar: Krao khan bĕ kơ Jêrusalem đei rơnŭk rơnua. Wă kơ bơngai bu 'mêm kơ ih gô đei tơdrong hiôk jơnap.

English: Peace be within your walls, Prosperity within your palaces.”
Bahnar: Ăn kơ tơdrong hiôk-hian oei tơ lăm kơ lu dur ih. Tơdrong hiôk chơt tơ lăm hnam pơtao ih.

English: For the sake of my brethren and companions, I will now say, “Peace be within you.”
Bahnar: Yua kơ lu 'nhŏng oh păng bôl buăl inh. Inh khan: “Ăn tơdrong hiôk-hian tơ lăm ih.”

English: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek your good.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Hnam Kră Yang, 'Bok Kei-Dei lu bơ̆n. Inh krao chă ăn kơ ih pŭn hiôk.

English: Unto You I lift up my eyes, O You who dwell in the heavens.
Bahnar: Inh ngơk muh măt tơ Ih ơ Tơ'ngla mă oei tơ kơpal tang-dŏ pơtao tơ plĕnh.

English: Behold, as the eyes of servants look to the hand of their masters, As the eyes of a maid to the hand of her mistress, So our eyes look to the LORD our God, Until He has mercy on us.
Bahnar: Thoi măt lu đĭch đam drŏ-nglo chang gô đơ̆ng ti yŏng tơ'ngla drŏ-nglo lu sư. Thoi măt lu đam drŏ-kăn lăng tơ ti yŏng tơ'ngla drŏ-kăn lu sư. Na măt lu bơ̆n kư̆m chang gô Kră Yang, 'Bok Kei-Dei thoi noh; Dĭng Sư mă mơnat kơ lu bơ̆n.

English: Have mercy on us, O LORD, have mercy on us! For we are exceedingly filled with contempt.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh mơnat kơ lu nhôn, Apinh mơnat kơ lu nhôn, yua kơ lu nhôn pŭ lơ dêh boih kơ đe areh pơjăm lu nhôn.

English: Our soul is exceedingly filled With the scorn of those who are at ease, With the contempt of the proud.
Bahnar: Bơhngol lu nhôn hrăp dêh kơ tơdrong pơjăm đơ̆ng lu bơngai pơrŏ. Păng tơdrong areh pơjăm đơ̆ng lu bơngai pơang

English: “If it had not been the LORD who was on our side,” Let Israel now say
Bahnar: Isơrael athei khan: “Tơdah Kră Yang ưh kơ gah lu bơ̆n

English: “If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, When men rose up against us
Bahnar: Tơdah Kră Yang Yêsu ưh kơ gah bơ̆n. Kơplah lu sư iung blah lu bơ̆n

English: Then they would have swallowed us alive, When their wrath was kindled against us
Bahnar: Kơplah lu sư hil blah lu bơ̆n, Lei lu sư luăn boih lu bơ̆n oei arih

English: Then the waters would have overwhelmed us, The stream would have gone over our soul
Bahnar: Đak lơ̆p pơhoch lu bơ̆n, Đak lơ̆p boih bơhngol lu bơ̆n.

English: Then the swollen waters Would have gone over our soul.”
Bahnar: Đak poh-yă pơhoch lê̆ lu bơ̆n.

English: Blessed be the LORD, Who has not given us as prey to their teeth.
Bahnar: Bơnê ư-ang kơ Kră Yang. Sư ưh kơ đei jao lu bơ̆n kơ hơnĕnh lu sư kăp sa.

English: Our soul has escaped as a bird from the snare of the fowlers; The snare is broken, and we have escaped.
Bahnar: Lu bơ̆n klaih hloi thoi sem klaih đơ̆ng hơnhuăl lu đe dăng. Hơnhuăl kơtĕch hloi, na lu bơ̆n lĕch hlôi hloi

English: Our help is in the name of the LORD, Who made heaven and earth.
Bahnar: Tơdrong dŏng tơgŭm lu bơ̆n lăm anăn Kră Yang. Tơ'ngla pơjing plĕnh teh.

English: Those who trust in the LORD Are like Mount Zion, Which cannot be moved, but abides forever.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai gơnang kơ Kră Yang. Thoi kông Siôn ưh kơ đei pơpơ̆, mă-lei oei oei ling-lang.

English: As the mountains surround Jerusalem, So the LORD surrounds His people From this time forth and forever.
Bahnar: Lu kông tăp dăr kơ Jêrusalem thoi yơ. Kră Yang wei tăp dăr kơ kon pơlei pơla Sư thoi noh mơ̆n. Đơ̆ng dang ei dĭng truh tơ ning-mônh khŏm khŏm hloi.

English: For the scepter of wickedness shall not rest On the land allotted to the righteous, Lest the righteous reach out their hands to iniquity.
Bahnar: Yua kơ 'long jra lu bơngai kơnê̆ ưh kơ gơh pơgơ̆r lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, Wă kơ ti lu bơngai tơpăt huay kơ pơm tơ tơdrong kơnê̆.

English: Do good, O LORD, to those who are good, And to those who are upright in their hearts.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih ăn tơdrong 'lơ̆ng kơ bơngai pơm 'lơ̆ng păng ăn kơ lu bơngai đei jơhngơ̆m tơpăt.

English: As for such as turn aside to their crooked ways, The LORD shall lead them away With the workers of iniquity. Peace be upon Israel!
Bahnar: Mă gah lu bơngai hơlơ̆k kiơ̆ lu trong kơnê̆, Kră Yang gô puh lu sư hơdai lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆. Ăn tơdrong hiôk-hian kơ lu bơngai Isơrael!

English: When the LORD brought back the captivity of Zion, We were like those who dream.
Bahnar: Kơplah Kră Yang chông lu bơngai bơnă brŏk tơ Siôn. Lu nhôn thoi bơngai tep apo.

English: Then our mouth was filled with laughter, And our tongue with singing. Then they said among the nations, “The LORD has done great things for them.”
Bahnar: 'Bơ̆r lu nhôn 'bĕnh kơ nơ̆r hiĕk chơt. Hơpiĕt lu nhôn hơri 'nă hal. Lu đe teh đak khan: “Kră Yang đei tơgŭm lu sư tih tơpă.”

English: The LORD has done great things for us, And we are glad.
Bahnar: Kră Yang đei tơgŭm lu nhôn tih tơpă; lu nhôn chơt hiôk.

English: Bring back our captivity, O LORD, As the streams in the South.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih chông bơnă lu nhôn brŏk. Thoi thong đak gah gơal đei đak ro dơ̆ng.

English: Those who sow in tears Shall reap in joy.
Bahnar: Bu rei adrĕch mă lĕch đak măt, Sư gô kĕch iŏk hăm hơri chơt hiôk.

English: He who continually goes forth weeping, Bearing seed for sowing, Shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, Bringing his sheaves with him.
Bahnar: Bu yak rah nhơ̆m rah chĕp adrĕch năm rei. Sĭt gô đei brŏk hăm hơri chơt hiôk tôi hơchô̆ 'ba sư.

English: Unless the LORD builds the house, They labor in vain who build it; Unless the LORD guards the city, The watchman stays awake in vain.
Bahnar: Tơdah Kră Yang ưh kơ đei pơm hnam, Lei lu thơ̆ jang man hnam ưh kơ đei kơ yua. Tơdah Kră Yang ưh kơ wei pơlei. Lu bơngai gak kral kơmăng kư̆m tơdrong kơ đei.

English: It is vain for you to rise up early, To sit up late, To eat the bread of sorrows; For so He gives His beloved sleep.
Bahnar: Ưh kơ đei yua ôh kơ lu iĕm iung đơ̆ng hrôih, năm tep măng, Đơ̆ng gleh hrat chă tơmam sa. Kră Yang kư̆m ăn kơ lu bơngai mă Sư 'mêm kơeng đei pơdơh tep.

English: Behold, children are a heritage from the LORD, The fruit of the womb is a reward.
Bahnar: To, kon hơ'lơ̆p jơ̆ tơmam đơ̆ng Kră Yang ăn; Hơ'lơ̆p đơ̆ng blu pôih jơ̆ tơmam apah

English: Like arrows in the hand of a warrior, So are the children of one’s youth.
Bahnar: Kon drŏ-nglo hơiơch kơplah oei hơmuh hơmŏng, Kŭm thoi 'brơ̆m hră lu bơngai hơgei prah.

English: Happy is the man who has his quiver full of them; They shall not be ashamed, But shall speak with their enemies in the gate.
Bahnar: Pŭn dêh kơ bơngai bu mă đei 'brơ̆m 'bĕnh kơ jŏ, sư huay kơ mơlâu. Dah sư pơma pơjah păng lu ayăt tơ 'măng dur pơlei.

English: Blessed is every one who fears the LORD, Who walks in His ways.
Bahnar: Pŭn dêh kơ bơngai bu mă hli yom kơ Kră Yang. Yak năm lăm trong sư!

English: When you eat the labor of your hands, You shall be happy, and it shall be well with you.
Bahnar: Ih gô đei sa yua đơ̆ng tơdrong jang tơpang ti kơdih, ih gô đei pŭn hiôk jơnap.

English: Your wife shall be like a fruitful vine In the very heart of your house, Your children like olive plants All around your table.
Bahnar: Akăn ih thoi tơm hơmu plei trem oei lăm hnam ih. Lu kon ih oei tăp dăr gơ'bang thoi dơng ôliwơ.

English: Behold, thus shall the man be blessed Who fears the LORD.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu mă hli yom kơ Kră Yang; gô đei pŭn hiôk thoi noh.

English: The LORD bless you out of Zion, And may you see the good of Jerusalem All the days of your life.
Bahnar: Hơpơi kơ Kră Yang đơ̆ng Siôn ăn pŭn hiôk kơ ih. Hơpơi lăm đĭ chăl arih ih 'bôh dôm tơdrong pŭn hiôk Jêrusalem.

English: Yes, may you see your children’s children. Peace be upon Israel!
Bahnar: Hơpơi kơ ih gơh 'bôh kon sâu ih. Hơpơi kơ Isơrael đei hiôk-hian.

English: “Many a time they have afflicted me from my youth,” Let Israel now say
Bahnar: “Đơ̆ng kơplah inh oei 'lơ̆p lu sư ngăl juăt pơjuă pơđep inh,” Isơrael athei pơma thoi noh.

English: “Many a time they have afflicted me from my youth; Yet they have not prevailed against me.
Bahnar: “Đơ̆ng kơplah inh oei 'lơ̆p lu sư ngăl pơjuă pơđep inh. Mă-lei ưh kơ jei lu sư ôh.

English: The plowers plowed on my back; They made their furrows long.”
Bahnar: Lu bơngai năm choh, choh rơuơ boih rok kơdŭ rŏng inh. Chrek trong rơuơ kơjung ataih.”

English: The LORD is righteous; He has cut in pieces the cords of the wicked.
Bahnar: Kră Yang jơ̆ 'lơ̆ng tơpăt; Sư chơ̆ng lê̆ boih tơlei lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ chô̆ inh.

English: Let all those who hate Zion Be put to shame and turned back.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ lu bơngai areh kơ Siôn mơlâu păng kơdŭn tơ rŏng.

English: Let them be as the grass on the housetops, Which withers before it grows up
Bahnar: Lê̆ lu sư thoi 'nhĕt tơ bơbŭng hnam, jô kro đĭ adrol kơ chăt.

English: With which the reaper does not fill his hand, Nor he who binds sheaves, his arms.
Bahnar: Bơngai yuă ưh kơ đei minh chup. Bơngai chô̆ pơpôi kư̆m ưh kơ đei minh kuăr.

English: Neither let those who pass by them say, “The blessing of the LORD be upon you; We bless you in the name of the LORD!”
Bahnar: Lu bơngai yak brih găn kư̆m ưh kơ pơma sơkat: “Hơpơi kơ Kră Yang tuh ăn tơdrong pŭn hiôk kơ lu iĕm! Lu nhôn yua anăn Kră Yang sơkat kơ iĕm đei pŭn hiôk.”

English: Out of the depths I have cried to You, O LORD
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Đơ̆ng anih jrŭ inh krao apinh Ih.

English: Lord, hear my voice! Let Your ears be attentive To the voice of my supplications.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Apinh Ih mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh; Apinh Ih pơgling đon mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh krao apinh.

English: If You, LORD, should mark iniquities, O Lord, who could stand?
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, tơdah Ih oei 'blŏk tơdrong kơnê̆ lu nhôn, Lei ơ Kră Yang! Bu gơh oei arih?a

English: But there is forgiveness with You, That You may be feared.
Bahnar: Mă-lei Ih đei jơhngơ̆m huay kơ jô̆ yo wă kơ đe hli yom kơ Ih.

English: I wait for the LORD, my soul waits, And in His word I do hope.
Bahnar: Inh chang gô Kră Yang. Bơhngol inh chang gô Sư; Păng inh gơnang hơmĕng kơ nơ̆r Sư.

English: My soul waits for the Lord More than those who watch for the morning— Yes, more than those who watch for the morning.
Bahnar: Bơhngol inh chang gô Kră Yang hloh kơ linh gak chang hơdah. Hloh kơ linh gak chang hơdah.

English: O Israel, hope in the LORD; For with the LORD there is mercy, And with Him is abundant redemption.
Bahnar: Ơ Isơrael, chang hơmĕng bĕ kơ Kră Yang; Yua kơ Kră Yang 'mêm mơnat Sư ăn tơdrong dŏng pơklaih lơ

English: And He shall redeem Israel From all his iniquities.
Bahnar: Kơdih kâu Sư gô huai iŏk Isơrael đơ̆ng dôm tơdrong yoch kơnê̆ lu sư.

English: LORD, my heart is not haughty, Nor my eyes lofty. Neither do I concern myself with great matters, Nor with things too profound for me.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, jơhngơ̆m inh huay kơ pơư kơdih, măt inh kư̆m huay kơ pơang. Inh kư̆m ưh kơ chơchă tơdrong tih krưp, dah tơdrong hloh kơ ai hnang.

English: Surely I have calmed and quieted my soul, Like a weaned child with his mother; Like a weaned child is my soul within me.
Bahnar: Mă-lei bơhngol inh hiôk hơđơ̆ng. Kŭm thoi kon nge pơdơh kơ mŏm oei cheng mĕ sư. Bơhngol inh hiôk hơđơ̆ng tơ lăm inh kư̆m thoi nge pơdơh kơ mŏm.

English: O Israel, hope in the LORD From this time forth and forever.
Bahnar: Ơ Isơrael, gơnang hơmĕng bĕ kơ Kră Yang. Đơ̆ng dang ei dĭng truh tơ ning-mônh.

English: LORD, remember David And all his afflictions
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Apinh Ih 'blŏk kơ Đawit, Păng tơdrong gleh pơmat sư pŭ.

English: How he swore to the LORD, And vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob
Bahnar: Sư đei pơkăm hăm Kră Yang. Păng pơkă hăm Kră Yang mơsêh mơyang Jakôp

English: “Surely I will not go into the chamber of my house, Or go up to the comfort of my bed
Bahnar: “Inh ưh kơ mơ̆t tơ lăm hnam inh, Kŭm ưh kơ tŏk tơ giơng tep.

English: I will not give sleep to my eyes Or slumber to my eyelids
Bahnar: Inh ưh kơ tep măt pơdơh, Kŭm ưh kơ ăn kơ gơnur măt inh pơdơh.

English: Until I find a place for the LORD, A dwelling place for the Mighty One of Jacob.”
Bahnar: Dĭng truh tơ inh mă chă đei anih ăn kơ Kră Yang. Minh anih oei ăn kơ Kră Yang mơsêh mơyang Jakôp!”

English: Behold, we heard of it in Ephrathah; We found it in the fields of the woods.
Bahnar: Lu nhôn đei kơtơ̆ng roi gah hom tơdrong pơgơ̆p tơ Êphratha. Nhôn 'bôh boih Sư tơ lăm mir Jaar.

English: Let us go into His tabernacle; Let us worship at His footstool.
Bahnar: Bĕ bơ̆n năm tơ anih Sư oei. Hăm drap kơkuh 'bơ̆t jơ̆ng Sư.

English: Arise, O LORD, to Your resting place, You and the ark of Your strength.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, iung bĕ na mơ̆t pơdơh tơ anih Ih, Ih păng hom pơgơ̆p pran kơtang Ih!

English: Let Your priests be clothed with righteousness, And let Your saints shout for joy.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ 'bok soi Ih hrŭk iŏk tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt; Lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh Ih gô hơri hiôk chơt.

English: For Your servant David’s sake, Do not turn away the face of Your Anointed.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Đawit, đĭch đam Ih, Ih 'nĕ kơ sơngah ôh kơ bơngai mă Ih đei tuh đak rơmă.

English: The LORD has sworn in truth to David; He will not turn from it: “I will set upon your throne the fruit of your body.
Bahnar: Kră Yang đei pơkă pơkăm boih hăm Đawit. Sư ưh kơ đei sơngah dơ̆ng: “Inh gô pôk hơtŏk tơ tang-dŏ pơtao Ih. Minh 'nu kon drŏ-nglo lĕch đơ̆ng akâu akar Ih.

English: If your sons will keep My covenant And My testimony which I shall teach them, Their sons also shall sit upon your throne forevermore.”
Bahnar: Tơdah lu kon ih wei răk nơ̆r Inh pơgơ̆p. Păng nơ̆r tơtă mă Inh gô bơtho kơ lu sư, Lei kon hơ'lơ̆p lu sư kư̆m gô oei tơ kơpal tang-dŏ pơtao ih ling-lang hlŏng hloi.”

English: For the LORD has chosen Zion; He has desired it for His dwelling place
Bahnar: Yua kơ Kră Yang rơih boih Siôn; Sư wă kơ Siôn jing anih Sư oei

English: “This is My resting place forever; Here I will dwell, for I have desired it.
Bahnar: “Âu boih anih Inh mă pơdơh ling-lang hlŏng hloi. Inh gô oei tơ âu, Yua kơ inh wă thoi noh.

English: I will abundantly bless her provision; I will satisfy her poor with bread.
Bahnar: Inh gô ăn kơ Siôn đei tơmam sa rơkah rơkai. Ăn kơ lu bơngai dơnuh hin pơlei noh sa phĭ rơkah.

English: I will also clothe her priests with salvation, And her saints shall shout aloud for joy.
Bahnar: Inh gô pơhrŭk ăn tơdrong dŏng pơklaih kơ lu 'bok soi pơlei noh păng lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh sư gô hơri 'nă hal.

English: There I will make the horn of David grow; I will prepare a lamp for My Anointed.
Bahnar: Tơ noh inh gô ăn hơke Đawit bluh chăt; Inh đei hơmet lê̆ ŭnh kơđeng kơ bơngai mă inh đei tuh đak rơmă.

English: His enemies I will clothe with shame, But upon Himself His crown shall flourish.”
Bahnar: Inh gô pơhrŭk ăn tơdrong mơlâu kơ lu bơngai ayăt kơ sư. Gah môk pơtao tơ kơpal kơ̆l Sư gô rang hơdah.”

English: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is For brethren to dwell together in unity!
Bahnar: Ơ lăng deh 'lơ̆ng hơiă tơpă 'nhŏng oh oei sa hiôk pơgơ̆p băl.

English: It is like the precious oil upon the head, Running down on the beard, The beard of Aaron, Running down on the edge of his garments.
Bahnar: Noh kư̆m thoi đak rơmă 'bâu gĭt tuh tơ kơpal kơ̆l. Ro jur tơ sŏk kang, sŏk kang Arôn. Ro truh tơ hơko ao sư

English: It is like the dew of Hermon, Descending upon the mountains of Zion; For there the LORD commanded the blessing— Life forevermore.
Bahnar: Kŭm thoi đak ngom tơ kông Hermôn. Ro jur tơ kông Siôn, Yua kơ tơ noh Kră Yang đei ăn boih tơdrong pŭn hiôk, Wă khan tơdrong arih ling-lang hlŏng hloi.

English: Behold, bless the LORD, All you servants of the LORD, Who by night stand in the house of the LORD!
Bahnar: Ơ lu đĭch đam Kră Yang, lu bơngai awih awăn kơmăng lăm hnam Sư. Hơri bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang!

English: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary, And bless the LORD.
Bahnar: Yơ̆r bĕ ti iĕm tơ gah anih rơgoh, kơkuh bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang!

English: The LORD who made heaven and earth Bless you from Zion!
Bahnar: Apinh Kră Yang, Tơ'ngla pơjing plĕnh teh Đơ̆ng Siôn gô ăn tơdrong pŭn hiôk kơ iĕm.

English: Praise the LORD! Praise the name of the LORD; Praise Him, O you servants of the LORD!
Bahnar: Halêluya! Bơnê kơkuh bĕ kơ anăn Kră Yang, Ơ lu đĭch đam Kră Yang

English: You who stand in the house of the LORD, In the courts of the house of our God
Bahnar: Lu iĕm bơngai mă bơ̆jang lăm hnam Kră Yang. Tơ cham Hnam Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei lu bơ̆n.

English: Praise the LORD, for the LORD is good; Sing praises to His name, for it is pleasant.
Bahnar: Bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang, Yua kơ Kră Yang 'lơ̆ng; Hơri bơnê bĕ kơ anăn Kră Yang, yua kơ noh chơt hiôk

English: For the LORD has chosen Jacob for Himself, Israel for His special treasure.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Kră Yang rơih boih Jakôp kơ Sư, păng rơih Isơrael jing tơmam Sư kơdih.

English: For I know that the LORD is great, And our Lord is above all gods.
Bahnar: Inh băt Kră Yang tih tơpă. Kră Yang lu bơ̆n tih hloh kơ đĭ-đăng lu yang.

English: Whatever the LORD pleases He does, In heaven and in earth, In the seas and in all deep places.
Bahnar: Kră Yang pơm đĭ-đăng, tơdrong kiơ Sư lăp đon. Mă tơ plĕnh ti dah tơ teh âu, lăm đak dơsĭ, dah tơ lăm anih jrŭ sŭng.

English: He causes the vapors to ascend from the ends of the earth; He makes lightning for the rain; He brings the wind out of His treasuries.
Bahnar: Sư ăn kơ hơmơ̆l đông đơ̆ng tôch jih kơ plei teh. Sư ăn kơmlat kiơ̆ kơ 'mi, Ăn kơ kial lĕch đơ̆ng anih mong sư.

English: He destroyed the firstborn of Egypt, Both of man and beast.
Bahnar: Sư pơlôch lu kon kơdră bơngai Êyiptơ, Đơ̆ng kon kơdră kon bơngai truh tơ kon sem dơrong.

English: He sent signs and wonders into the midst of you, O Egypt, Upon Pharaoh and all his servants.
Bahnar: Ơ bơngai Êyiptơ! Sư ăn boih dôm tơdrong hlĭch chrơp tơ iĕm, wă phak pơtao Pharaôn păng lu jang kơ sư

English: He defeated many nations And slew mighty kings
Bahnar: Sư kư̆m pơlôch lơ dêh char tih păng pơlôch lu pơtao nuih pran.

English: Sihon king of the Amorites, Og king of Bashan, And all the kingdoms of Canaan
Bahnar: Thoi Sihôn pơtao bơngai Amôrit, Ok, pơtao lu bơngai Basan. Păng đĭ-đăng pơtao dêh char Kanaan

English: And gave their land as a heritage, A heritage to Israel His people.
Bahnar: Sư ăn char lu đe noh jing teh jang sa kơ lu bơngai Isơrael, jơ̆ kon pơlei Sư.

English: Your name, O LORD, endures forever, Your fame, O LORD, throughout all generations.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, anăn Ih oei oei ling-lang; Tơdrong 'blŏk kơ anăn Ih đơ̆ng jơhnơr âu truh tơ jơhnơr nai.

English: For the LORD will judge His people, And He will have compassion on His servants.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Kră Yang gô sek tơlang tơpăt kơ kon pơlei pơla Sư. Păng đei jơhngơ̆m mơnat kơ lu đĭch đam Sư.

English: The idols of the nations are silver and gold, The work of men’s hands.
Bahnar: Lu rup mam pơm yang păng hu maih noh tơdrong jang đơ̆ng tơpang ti kon bơngai pơm.

English: They have mouths, but they do not speak; Eyes they have, but they do not see
Bahnar: Rup man noh đei 'bơ̆r mă-lei ưh kơ gơh pơma. Đei măt mă-lei ưh kơ gơh 'bôh.

English: They have ears, but they do not hear; Nor is there any breath in their mouths.
Bahnar: Đei đon mă-lei ưh kơ kơtơ̆ng păng kư̆m ưh kơ đei kial dui jơhngơ̆m lăm 'bơ̆r.

English: Those who make them are like them; So is everyone who trusts in them.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai mă pơm lu rup noh sư kư̆m nhen thoi rup noh. Đĭ-đăng lu bơngai lui gơnang kơ rup yang noh kư̆m lei-lăi thoi rup man noh.

English: Bless the LORD, O house of Israel! Bless the LORD, O house of Aaron!
Bahnar: Ơ adrĕch Isơrael, kơkuh bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang! Ơ adrĕch Arôn, kơkuh bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang!

English: Bless the LORD, O house of Levi! You who fear the LORD, bless the LORD!
Bahnar: Ơ adrĕch Lêwi, kơkuh bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang. Ơ lu bơngai hli yom kơ Kră Yang, kơkuh bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang!

English: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, Who dwells in Jerusalem! Praise the LORD!
Bahnar: Kơkuh bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang đơ̆ng pơlei Siôn. Kră Yang mă oei tơ Jêrusalem! Halêluya.

English: Oh, give thanks to the LORD, for He is good! For His mercy endures forever.
Bahnar: Bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang, yua kơ Sư 'lơ̆ng; Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: Oh, give thanks to the God of gods! For His mercy endures forever.
Bahnar: Bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, yang tih hloh kơ lu yang nai. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: Oh, give thanks to the Lord of lords! For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang, Sư yŏng hloh kơ lu yŏng. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: To Him who alone does great wonders, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Lăp minh 'nu Sư đĕch mă pơm mơsêh hlĭch dêh. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: To Him who by wisdom made the heavens, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư yua boih tơdrong hơgei mơsêh Sư pơjing plĕnh; Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: To Him who laid out the earth above the waters, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư bơlang boih teh tơ kơpal đak Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: To Him who made great lights, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Pơjing lu măt chrang hơdah tih, Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: The sun to rule by day, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Măt 'năr wă pơgơ̆r kơ'năr, Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: The moon and stars to rule by night, For His mercy endures forever.
Bahnar: Măt khei păng lu sơnglŏng wă pơgơ̆r kơmăng. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: To Him who struck Egypt in their firstborn, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư pơlôch lê̆ boih lu kon kơdră bơngai Êyiptơ, Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang

English: And brought out Israel from among them, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư ba Isơrael lĕch hlôi đơ̆ng lu sư. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: With a strong hand, and with an outstretched arm, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư yơ̆r kơkŏng păng tơpang ti mơsêh mơyang Sư. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: To Him who divided the Red Sea in two, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư klah đak Dơsĭ 'Brê jing 'bar. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: And made Israel pass through the midst of it, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Ăn kơ lu bơngai Isơrael yak tŏk rok đak dơsĭ noh. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: But overthrew Pharaoh and his army in the Red Sea, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Teh tơhuŏng Pharaôn păng lu linh sư tơ lăm đak Dơsĭ 'Brê. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang

English: To Him who led His people through the wilderness, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư chông kon pơlei Sư rok char 'blach. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: To Him who struck down great kings, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư blah pơrăm đĭ lu pơtao tih mơng. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: And slew famous kings, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Pơlôch pơrăm lu pơtao đe ư-ang. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang

English: Sihon king of the Amorites, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sihôn, pơtao bơngai Amôrit. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang

English: And Og king of Bashan, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Păng Ok, pơtao char Basan Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang

English: And gave their land as a heritage, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư jao ăn teh đe noh kơ lu kon pơlei sư jang sa. Tơdrong 'mêm sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: A heritage to Israel His servant, For His mercy endures forever.
Bahnar: Wă khan ăn teh jang sa kơ Isơrael, đĭch đam Sư. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: Who remembered us in our lowly state, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Sư 'blŏk hơdơ̆r kơ lu nhôn răm-'băm. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: And rescued us from our enemies, For His mercy endures forever
Bahnar: Dŏng pơklaih lu nhôn đơ̆ng lu ayăt kơ bơ̆n. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: Who gives food to all flesh, For His mercy endures forever.
Bahnar: Sư kư̆m ăn tơmam sa kơ lu adrĕch sĕch akar. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: Oh, give thanks to the God of heaven! For His mercy endures forever.
Bahnar: Athei bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei kơpal plĕnh. Tơdrong 'mêm Sư oei oei ling-lang.

English: By the rivers of Babylon, There we sat down, yea, we wept When we remembered Zion.
Bahnar: Lu nhôn oei ngôi cheng đak glung Babilôn. 'Blŏk kơ Siôn, na nhơ̆m.

English: We hung our harps Upon the willows in the midst of it.
Bahnar: Lu nhôn tơ'băk brŏ nhôn tơ kơpal 'long hla prai tơter glung noh.

English: For there those who carried us away captive asked of us a song, And those who plundered us requested mirth, Saying, “Sing us one of the songs of Zion!”
Bahnar: Yua kơ tơ noh lu bơngai mă rôp nhôn pơm bơnă. Athei lu nhôn hơri; Lu bơngai pơjuă pơjăm lu nhôn athei lu nhôn hơri chơt hiôk: “Hơri bĕ kơ nhôn 'bai hơri pơlei Siôn.”

English: How shall we sing the LORD’s song In a foreign land?
Bahnar: Tơ dêh char tơmoi. Liơ lu nhôn gơh hơri kơ Kră Yang?

English: If I forget you, O Jerusalem, Let my right hand forget its skill!
Bahnar: Ơ Jêrusalem, dah inh hiơt kơ ih, Ăn kơ ti 'ma inh hiơt kơ tơdrong gơh hơgei sư.

English: If I do not remember you, Let my tongue cling to the roof of my mouth— If I do not exalt Jerusalem Above my chief joy.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ hơpiĕt inh klep tơ păk-'ngơk. Tơdah inh ưh kơ 'blŏk kơ ih, Tơdah inh ưh kơ wă Jêrusalem pơm tơdrong chơt hiôk dêh kơ inh

English: Remember, O LORD, against the sons of Edom The day of Jerusalem, Who said, “Raze it, raze it, To its very foundation!”
Bahnar: Lăm năr Jêrusalem pơchah. Ơ Kră Yang, 'blŏk bĕ kơ lu kon pơlei dêh char Eđôm. Lu sư khan: “Pơrăm lê̆ bĕ, pơrăm lê̆ bĕ; Dĭng truh tơ hơnă sư!”

English: O daughter of Babylon, who are to be destroyed, Happy the one who repays you as you have served us!
Bahnar: Ơ lu kon drŏ-kăn Babilôn, lu bơngai đe wă pơrăm. Pŭn hiôk dêh bu wă pơm tơwih kơ iĕm, kiơ̆ tơdrong ih pơm kơnê̆ kơ lu nhôn.

English: Happy the one who takes and dashes Your little ones against the rock!
Bahnar: Pŭn dêh kơ bu rôp kon hơ'lơ̆p iĕm, Hơtat lu sư tơ tơmo.

English: I will praise You with my whole heart; Before the gods I will sing praises to You.
Bahnar: Inh hơri bơnê kơ Ih hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m. Hơri bơnê kơ Ih 'bơ̆t anăp lu yang.

English: I will worship toward Your holy temple, And praise Your name For Your lovingkindness and Your truth; For You have magnified Your word above all Your name.
Bahnar: Inh gô drap kơkuh 'bơ̆t anih rơgoh Ih. Bơnê kơ anăn Ih yua kơ tơdrong 'mêm păng tơdrong sĭt tơpăt Ih. Yua kơ Ih đei pơm ăn kơ anăn păng nơ̆r Ih đei pơyom tih hloh kơ đĭ-đăng

English: In the day when I cried out, You answered me, And made me bold with strength in my soul.
Bahnar: Lăm năr inh krao apinh, Ih tơl tơwih, Ăn kơ jơhngơ̆m inh rai nuih pran kơtang.

English: All the kings of the earth shall praise You, O LORD, When they hear the words of Your mouth.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, ăn đĭ kơ lu pơtao lăm teh đak kơkuh bơnê kơ Ih. Mưh lu sư kơtơ̆ng nơ̆r đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r Ih.

English: Yes, they shall sing of the ways of the LORD, For great is the glory of the LORD.
Bahnar: Lu sư gô hơri bơnê kơ trong Kră Yang. Yua kơ tơdrong ư-ang 'lơ̆ng rŏ Kră Yang tih-tin tơpă.

English: Though the LORD is on high, Yet He regards the lowly; But the proud He knows from afar.
Bahnar: Mă khan, Kră Yang tih-tin. Kŭm oei lăng ba lu bơngai răm-'băm. Gah lu bơngai pơang, Sư băt lê̆ đơ̆ng adrol boih.

English: Though I walk in the midst of trouble, You will revive me; You will stretch out Your hand Against the wrath of my enemies, And Your right hand will save me.
Bahnar: Mă inh oei lăm pơmat-tat, Ih wei tơdrong arih inh, Ih yơ̆r ti tơblah plơ̆ kơ tơdrong mă lu ayăt hil kơ inh, ti 'ma Ih dŏng pơklaih inh.

English: The LORD will perfect that which concerns me; Your mercy, O LORD, endures forever; Do not forsake the works of Your hands.
Bahnar: Kră Yang gô pơm keh dôm tơdrong Sư pơkă kơ inh. Ơ Kră Yang, tơdrong 'mêm Ih oei oei ling-lang; Apinh Ih 'nĕ kơ lê̆ dôm tơdrong jang đơ̆ng ti Ih.

English: O LORD, You have searched me and known me.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Ih đei lăng lăng inh boih păng băt kơ inh.

English: You know my sitting down and my rising up; You understand my thought afar off.
Bahnar: Ih băt 'bơ̆t inh hơ-oei, kơplah inh iung. Mă đơ̆ng ataih Ih băt đĭ tơdrong inh tơchĕng.

English: You comprehend my path and my lying down, And are acquainted with all my ways.
Bahnar: Ih 'bôh hơđăl trong inh yak păng 'bơ̆t inh 'bĭch. Dôm trong inh Ih băt nhen.

English: For there is not a word on my tongue, But behold, O LORD, You know it altogether.
Bahnar: Adrol kơ hơpiĕt inh wă pơma. Ih băt đĭ tôm tĕch boih, ơ Kră Yang.

English: You have hedged me behind and before, And laid Your hand upon me.
Bahnar: Ih wei inh gah rŏng gah anăp. Dan ti Ih kơpal inh.

English: Such knowledge is too wonderful for me; It is high, I cannot attain it.
Bahnar: Tơdrong hơgei Ih, inh lăng hlĭch mơsêh tơpă. Kơjung dêh inh mah 'mơn pă truh!

English: Where can I go from Your Spirit? Or where can I flee from Your presence?
Bahnar: Inh năm tơ yơ gơh weh ataih đơ̆ng Yang Bơhngol Ih Inh wă klĕnh tơ yơ gơh hlơp đơ̆ng muh măt Ih?

English: If I ascend into heaven, You are there; If I make my bed in hell, behold, You are there.
Bahnar: Dah inh tŏk tơ plĕnh, Ih oei tơ noh, Mă inh jur 'bĭch lăm dêh hơtâu to Ih kư̆m tơ noh.

English: If I take the wings of the morning, And dwell in the uttermost parts of the sea
Bahnar: Tơdah inh đei pơnăr păr đơ̆ng pơgê năm oei tơ tôch đak dơsĭ.

English: Even there Your hand shall lead me, And Your right hand shall hold me.
Bahnar: Tơ noh ti Ih kư̆m chông ba inh. Ti 'ma Ih gô rôp wei inh.

English: If I say, “Surely the darkness shall fall on me,” Even the night shall be light about me
Bahnar: Tơdah inh khan: “Măng mu gô gom inh hlơp. Tơdrong hơdah tăp dăr kơ inh gô jing măng mu.”

English: Indeed, the darkness shall not hide from You, But the night shines as the day; The darkness and the light are both alike to You.
Bahnar: Mă kơmăng kư̆m ưh kơ măng mu 'bơ̆t anăp Ih. Mă kơmăng kư̆m hơdah thoi kơ'năr, păng măng mu kư̆m thoi hơdah 'bơ̆t anăp Ih.

English: For You formed my inward parts; You covered me in my mother’s womb.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Ih pơjing boih tơ lăm akâu inh. Păng pơjing boih inh tơ lăm klak mĕ inh.

English: I will praise You, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made; Marvelous are Your works, And that my soul knows very well.
Bahnar: Inh bơnê kơ Ih, yua kơ Ih đei pơjing inh hlĭch chrơp tơpă. Tơdrong jang Ih hlĭch chrơp mă jơhngơ̆m inh băt nhen tơpă.a

English: My frame was not hidden from You, When I was made in secret, And skillfully wrought in the lowest parts of the earth.
Bahnar: Kơting inh ưh kơ gơh ôn hlơp kơ Ih. Kơplah đei pơjing inh lăm anih hlơp, tanh pơjing inh lăm anih jrŭ teh đak.

English: Your eyes saw my substance, being yet unformed. And in Your book they all were written, The days fashioned for me, When as yet there were none of them.
Bahnar: Măt Ih 'bôh boih inh kơplah oei tam mă jing bơngai. Dôm năr mă đei hơgăt boih kơ inh đei chih jô̆ boih lăm sơ̆p hla bơar Ih. Adrol kơ tim mă đei 'năr kơ inh lăm lu năr noh.

English: How precious also are Your thoughts to me, O God! How great is the sum of them!
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, dôm tơdrong tơchĕng Ih gĭt kăl dêh kơ inh. Jô̆ lu sư lơ dêh tơpă

English: If I should count them, they would be more in number than the sand; When I awake, I am still with You.
Bahnar: Tơdah inh jô̆ dôm tơdrong tơchĕng noh lơ hloh kơ găr chuơh. Wă inh hơđơ̆r inh oei oei hăm Ih.

English: Oh, that You would slay the wicked, O God! Depart from me, therefore, you bloodthirsty men.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, trŏ kơ Ih pơlôch lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆! Lu bơngai 'maih pơlôch đe weh bĕ đơ̆ng inh.

English: For they speak against You wickedly; Your enemies take Your name in vain.
Bahnar: Lu sư pơma kơnê̆ kơ Ih, yua anăn Ih pơma kư̆ kă.

English: Do I not hate them, O LORD, who hate You? And do I not loathe those who rise up against You?
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, Inh ưh kơ areh kơ lu bơngai mă areh kơ Ih hă? Ưh kơ areh krưp hă lu bơngai iung blah Ih?

English: I hate them with perfect hatred; I count them my enemies.
Bahnar: Inh areh kơ lu sư, areh dêh tơpă. Lăng lu sư jing ayăt kơ inh.

English: Search me, O God, and know my heart; Try me, and know my anxieties
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, apinh Ih lăng lăng inh păng băt kơ jơhngơ̆m inh. Pơlong lăng inh bĕ păng băt kơ tơdrong tơchĕng inh

English: And see if there is any wicked way in me, And lead me in the way everlasting.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih lăng lăng inh hăm đei yoch kơnê̆ kiơ ưh? Apinh Ih chông anhăk inh lăm trong arih ling-lang. Anih jrŭ wă khan lăm tơpu kon.

English: Deliver me, O LORD, from evil men; Preserve me from violent men
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih dŏng pơklaih inh đơ̆ng lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆. Dŏng inh đơ̆ng bơngai pơm kơnê̆ dêh.

English: Who plan evil things in their hearts; They continually gather together for war.
Bahnar: Lăm jơhngơ̆m lu sư chă đon wă pơm kơnê̆ Prăt năr lu sư wă tơblah.

English: They sharpen their tongues like a serpent; The poison of asps is under their lips. Selah
Bahnar: Lu sư pat hơpiĕt suĕng thoi hơpiĕt 'bih. Đei bih hơkăm 'bih dong lăm hơkŭng lu sư. Sêla

English: Keep me, O LORD, from the hands of the wicked; Preserve me from violent men, Who have purposed to make my steps stumble.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih wei inh klaih đơ̆ng ti lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆, Dŏng inh đơ̆ng lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ dêh. Lu bơngai chă đon wă tơpơ̆k inh.

English: The proud have hidden a snare for me, and cords; They have spread a net by the wayside; They have set traps for me. Selah
Bahnar: Lu bơngai pơang đăk boih hơđong kơ inh dăng tơlei hơnhuăl wă kơ 'leh inh. Lu sư đăk kap rok trong; wă pơrăm inh.

English: I said to the LORD: “You are my God; Hear the voice of my supplications, O LORD.
Bahnar: Inh pơma hăm Ih, ơ Kră Yang: “Ih boih Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh. Ơ Kră Yang! Apinh Ih mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh krao apinh.”

English: O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation, You have covered my head in the day of battle.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang inh, pran kơtang dŏng pơklaih inh, Kră Yang gom pĕng kơ̆l inh lăm năr tơblah.

English: Do not grant, O LORD, the desires of the wicked; Do not further his wicked scheme, Lest they be exalted. Selah
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih 'nĕ ăn kơ tơdrong lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ wă. 'Nĕ ăn tơdrong lu sư pơđâu gơh jing, kơnh lu sư pơang. Sêla

English: “As for the head of those who surround me, Let the evil of their lips cover them
Bahnar: Ăn tơdrong kơnê̆ đơ̆ng 'bơ̆r lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ mă wang inh, huŏng klơ̆p tơ kơ̆l lu sư kơdih.

English: Let burning coals fall upon them; Let them be cast into the fire, Into deep pits, that they rise not up again.
Bahnar: Ăn ngar ŭnh ngŭr tuh kơpal lu sư! Ăn đe klơ̆m tơhuŏng lu sư lăm ŭnh, lăm sơlŭng jrŭ, ưh pă gơh tŏk dơ̆ng!

English: Let not a slanderer be established in the earth; Let evil hunt the violent man to overthrow him.”
Bahnar: Ăn kơ lu bơngai đei hơpiĕt hơlĕnh pơdăr ưh kơ gơh pơjing kơjăp lăm teh đak. Ăn tơdrong răm druh lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆.

English: I know that the LORD will maintain The cause of the afflicted, And justice for the poor.
Bahnar: Inh băt Kră Yang gô bơwei lu bơngai pơmat-tat. Sek tơlang tơpăt kơ bơngai dơnuh hin.

English: Surely the righteous shall give thanks to Your name; The upright shall dwell in Your presence.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai tơpăt gô bơnê kơ anăn Ih. Bơngai tơpăt gô oei 'bơ̆t anăp Ih.

English: LORD, I cry out to You; Make haste to me! Give ear to my voice when I cry out to You.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh krao apinh Ih jah năm tơ inh. Apinh Ih pơgling đon mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh, mưh inh krao apinh Ih.

English: Let my prayer be set before You as incense, The lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ nơ̆r inh krao khan thoi tơmam 'bâu phu 'bơ̆t anăp Ih. Ăn kơ tơdrong inh yơ̆r ti thoi tơmam soi drơ̆m kơsơ̆!

English: Set a guard, O LORD, over my mouth; Keep watch over the door of my lips.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh wei 'bơ̆r inh. Păng lăng 'bơ̆r inh mưh inh ha.

English: Do not incline my heart to any evil thing, To practice wicked works With men who work iniquity; And do not let me eat of their delicacies.
Bahnar: Apinh 'nĕ ăn kơ jơhngơ̆m inh wă kơ tơdrong kơnê̆. Păng pơm tơdrong kơnê̆ hơdai hăm lu bơngai kơnê̆. 'Nĕ ăn kơ inh et sa tơmam 'lơ̆ng đơ̆ng lu sư.

English: Let the righteous strike me; It shall be a kindness. And let him rebuke me; It shall be as excellent oil; Let my head not refuse it. For still my prayer is against the deeds of the wicked.
