Bahnar: Ăn kơ bơngai tơpăt teh inh, chrih kơ inh hăm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng. Noh thoi tuh đak rơmă tơ kơ̆l inh; 'Nĕ ăn kơ inh sơngah kơ tơdrong noh. Yua kơ inh ngăl krao khan blah tơdrong kơnê̆ đe pơm.

English: Their judges are overthrown by the sides of the cliff, And they hear my words, for they are sweet.
Bahnar: Đe gô klơ̆m lu kră pơgơ̆r lu sư đơ̆ng dur tơmo; Lu sư băt kơ nơ̆r inh pơma trŏ.

English: Our bones are scattered at the mouth of the grave, As when one plows and breaks up the earth.
Bahnar: “Thoi đe rơuơ chŭn păng choh teh Kơting lu sư tơrak 'brak tơ 'măng jang dêh atâu.”

English: But my eyes are upon You, O GOD the Lord; In You I take refuge; Do not leave my soul destitute.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang inh! Măt inh lăng tơ Ih, inh kơ'nơp lăm Ih. Apinh Ih 'nĕ kơ achăng lê̆ bơhngol inh.

English: Keep me from the snares they have laid for me, And from the traps of the workers of iniquity.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih pơklaih inh đơ̆ng hơđong lu sư mă đăk boih kơ inh păng đơ̆ng kap lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆.

English: Let the wicked fall into their own nets, While I escape safely.
Bahnar: Lê̆ lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ hrơ̆p tơ hơnhuăl lu sư kơdih gah inh gơh klaih

English: I cry out to the LORD with my voice; With my voice to the LORD I make my supplication.
Bahnar: Inh ôr krao Kră Yang. Inh krao apinh Kră Yang mơnat.

English: I pour out my complaint before Him; I declare before Him my trouble.
Bahnar: 'Bơ̆t anăp Sư inh pơdah đĭ tơdrong pơmat inh. Inh roi dôm tơdrong truh kơ inh.

English: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, Then You knew my path. In the way in which I walk They have secretly set a snare for me.
Bahnar: Mưh jơhngơ̆m inh rơdu. Ih băt boih kơ trong inh. Tơ lăm trong inh yak năm, lu sư đăk lê̆ hơđong boih.

English: Look on my right hand and see, For there is no one who acknowledges me; Refuge has failed me; No one cares for my soul.
Bahnar: Ih lăng gah 'ma kơ inh 'bôh ưh kơ đei bu băt 'blŏk kơ inh; Inh kư̆m pă đei anih ayơ wă ôn kơ'nơp. Ưh kơ đei bu hiơ̆k tơdrong arih inh.

English: I cried out to You, O LORD: I said, “You are my refuge, My portion in the land of the living.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, inh krao apinh Ih, Inh khan: “Ih boih anih inh kơ'nơp. Sư boih mă mŭk tơmam inh lăm teh lu bơngai arih.”

English: Attend to my cry, For I am brought very low; Deliver me from my persecutors, For they are stronger than I.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh krao khan. Yua kơ inh pơmat-tat dêh; Apinh Ih dŏng pơklaih inh đơ̆ng lu bơngai pơmat inh. Yua kơ lu sư pran hloh kơ inh.

English: Bring my soul out of prison, That I may praise Your name; The righteous shall surround me, For You shall deal bountifully with me.”
Bahnar: Apinh Ih dui iŏk bơhngol inh đơ̆ng anih phak pơmat. Wă kơ inh bơnê kơ anăn Ih lu bơngai tơpăt gô oei tăp kơ inh. Yua kơ Ih pơm 'lơ̆ng kơ inh.

English: Hear my prayer, O LORD, Give ear to my supplications! In Your faithfulness answer me, And in Your righteousness.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih mơ̆ng nơ̆r inh krao khan, pơgling đon Ih mơ̆ng dôm nơ̆r inh krao apinh Ih mơnat. Lăm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, yua kơ Ih tơpăt sĭt, apinh Ih tơl tơwih nơ̆r inh hơpơi.

English: Do not enter into judgment with Your servant, For in Your sight no one living is righteous.
Bahnar: Apinh 'nĕ kơ sek tơlang kơ đĭch đam Ih; Yua kơ 'bơ̆t anăp Ih, ưh kơ đei bơngai bu arih tơpăt.

English: For the enemy has persecuted my soul; He has crushed my life to the ground; He has made me dwell in darkness, Like those who have long been dead.
Bahnar: Lu ayăt druh bơhngol inh, pơjuă bơhlơ̆r tơdrong arih inh tơ teh; Sư ăn kơ inh oei tơ lăm măng mu. Thoi bơngai lôch đĭ đunh boih.

English: Therefore my spirit is overwhelmed within me; My heart within me is distressed.
Bahnar: Thoi noh bơhngol inh rơdu tơpă, jơhngơ̆m inh rŭng răng dêh.

English: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all Your works; I muse on the work of Your hands.
Bahnar: Inh 'blŏk kơ năr adrol sơ̆, hơdơ̆r kơ dôm tơdrong jang Ih. Păng tơchĕng kơ tơdrong jang đơ̆ng ti Ih đei pơm.

English: I spread out my hands to You; My soul longs for You like a thirsty land. Selah
Bahnar: Inh yơ̆r ti inh gah Ih; Jơhngơ̆m inh rơhing kơ Ih thoi teh hrĕng kro. Sêla

English: Answer me speedily, O LORD; My spirit fails! Do not hide Your face from me, Lest I be like those who go down into the pit.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang! Apinh Ih jah tĕnh tĕnh tơl tơwih nơ̆r inh. Bơhngol inh rơdu rơmơ̆n dêh. Apinh Ih 'nĕ kơ ôn muh măt Ih kơ inh. Hli kơ inh thoi bơngai jur tơ sơlŭng jrŭ.

English: Cause me to hear Your lovingkindness in the morning, For in You do I trust; Cause me to know the way in which I should walk, For I lift up my soul to You.
Bahnar: Pơgê hrôih, apinh Ih ăn kơ inh kơtơ̆ng nơ̆r Ih 'mêm mơnat. Yua kơ inh gơnang kơ Ih. Apinh Ih bơtho ăn kơ inh trong wă yak kiơ̆. Yua kơ inh hơtŏk bơhngol inh tơ Ih.

English: Deliver me, O LORD, from my enemies; In You I take shelter.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih dŏng pơklaih inh đơ̆ng lu ayăt; Inh tơkan kơ'nơp tơ Ih.

English: Teach me to do Your will, For You are my God; Your Spirit is good. Lead me in the land of uprightness.
Bahnar: Apinh Ih bơtho inh pơm kiơ̆ Ih wă. Yua kơ Ih boih Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, ăn Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng Ih ba inh mơ̆t tơ teh đak dơhnă.

English: Revive me, O LORD, for Your name’s sake! For Your righteousness’ sake bring my soul out of trouble.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, yua kơ anăn Ih. Ăn kơ inh arih Lăm tơdrong tơpăt Ih, dui iŏk inh klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong pơmat-tat.

English: In Your mercy cut off my enemies, And destroy all those who afflict my soul; For I am Your servant.
Bahnar: Yua kơ tơdrong 'mêm mơnat Ih. Apinh Ih pơlôch pơrăm đĭ bĕ lu ayăt kơ inh, Păng pơrăm lê̆ lu bơngai pơjuă pơđep inh; Yua kơ inh jing đĭch đam Ih.

English: Blessed be the LORD my Rock, Who trains my hands for war, And my fingers for battle
Bahnar: Kơkuh bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang jơ̆ Tơmo Tih inh! Sư pơjuăt ti inh wă kơ tơblah, pơhrăm hơnglâu ti inh gơh tơblah.

English: My lovingkindness and my fortress, My high tower and my deliverer, My shield and the One in whom I take refuge, Who subdues my people under me.
Bahnar: Sư Tơ'ngla 'mêm kơ inh păng kơđông kơjăp inh. Kră Yang jơ̆ hơbong sơlŭng kơjăp păng dŏng pơklaih inh. Thoi khêl pĕng inh păng anih inh kơ'nơp. Sư pơm kơ kon pơlei chu yom tơ ala jơ̆ng inh.

English: LORD, what is man, that You take knowledge of him? Or the son of man, that You are mindful of him?
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, kon bơngai âu kiơ, mă Ih hiơ̆k kơ sư? Kon bơngai mah liơ na Ih mah tơchĕng 'blŏk kơ sư?

English: Man is like a breath; His days are like a passing shadow.
Bahnar: Kon bơngai thoi hơyuh dui jơhngơ̆m. Chăl kon bơngai thoi yơ̆p đông.

English: Bow down Your heavens, O LORD, and come down; Touch the mountains, and they shall smoke.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, apinh Ih tơjur lu plĕnh păng jur hloi bĕ! Hơtŭt kơ kông, na kông lĕch 'nhui.

English: Flash forth lightning and scatter them; Shoot out Your arrows and destroy them.
Bahnar: Apinh tơlĕch bĕ kơmlat pơm ăn kơ lu ayăt tơklah tơklang. Prah bĕ 'brơ̆m hră Ih na puh lu sư.

English: Stretch out Your hand from above; Rescue me and deliver me out of great waters, From the hand of foreigners
Bahnar: Apinh chro ti Ih, đơ̆ng kơpal. Dŏng pơklaih inh, hơtŏk inh đơ̆ng lăm đak jrŭ. Pơklaih đơ̆ng ti lu bơngai tơmoi

English: Whose mouth speaks lying words, And whose right hand is a right hand of falsehood.
Bahnar: Bơngai đei 'bơ̆r pơma hơlĕnh. Đei ti 'ma pơkă bơkuĕch.

English: I will sing a new song to You, O God; On a harp of ten strings I will sing praises to You
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei, inh gô hơri kơ Ih minh 'bai hơri 'nao. Reh brŏ dung mơjĭt dăng tơlei.

English: The One who gives salvation to kings, Who delivers David His servant From the deadly sword.
Bahnar: Ih ăn tơdrong jei kơ lu pơtao; Pơklaih Đawit đĭch đam Ih đơ̆ng tak đao gưm.

English: Rescue me and deliver me from the hand of foreigners, Whose mouth speaks lying words, And whose right hand is a right hand of falsehood
Bahnar: Apinh Ih pơklaih inh đơ̆ng ti lu bơngai tơmoi; Lu bơngai đei 'bơ̆r pơma hơlĕnh. Đei ti 'ma pơkă bơkuĕch.

English: That our sons may be as plants grown up in their youth; That our daughters may be as pillars, Sculptured in palace style
Bahnar: Ăn kơ lu kon drŏ-nglo lu nhôn thoi tơm 'long hơdrih kơjung, ăn kơ lu kon drŏ-kăn lu nhôn thoi jrăng mum hnam thoi đe chhơ̆ kơ hnam pơtao.

English: That our barns may be full, Supplying all kinds of produce; That our sheep may bring forth thousands And ten thousands in our fields
Bahnar: Ăn kơ pơk lu nhôn 'bĕnh kơ phe 'ba. Đei tôm tơmam mong 'măn. Ăn kơ triu lu nhôn chek lar lơ rơbâu hơngan tơ lăm bri săr nhôn.

English: That our oxen may be well laden; That there be no breaking in or going out; That there be no outcry in our streets.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ rơmo lu nhôn chek lar rai lơ. 'Nĕ kơ ăn 'lih păng huay kơ lôch hiong. Dah đei nơ̆r ôr pơmat tơ rok trong pơlei tih lu nhôn.

English: Happy are the people who are in such a state; Happy are the people whose God is the LORD!
Bahnar: Pŭn dêh kơ kon pơlei pơla ayơ đei thoi noh! Pŭn dêh kơ kon pơlei pơla ayơ mă đei Kră Yang jing Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei lu sư!

English: I will extol You, my God, O King; And I will bless Your name forever and ever.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei inh, pơtao inh. Inh gô pôk ư-ang kơ Ih. Păng hơri bơnê kơ anăn Ih ling-lang hlŏng hloi.

English: Every day I will bless You, And I will praise Your name forever and ever.
Bahnar: Rim năr inh gô hơri bơnê kơ Ih. Hơri ư-ang kơ anăn Ih ling-lang hlŏng hloi.

English: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; And His greatness is unsearchable.
Bahnar: Kră Yang tih mơng, trŏ kơ bơnê ư-ang tơpă; Tơdrong tih Sư kon bơngai ưh kơ đei gơh pơtŏ pơting.

English: One generation shall praise Your works to another, And shall declare Your mighty acts.
Bahnar: Adrĕch chăl âu gô roi ư-ang kơ tơdrong jang Ih kơ jơhnơr đơ̆ng rŏng păng roi tơbăt tơdrong mơsêh Ih.

English: I will meditate on the glorious splendor of Your majesty, And on Your wondrous works.
Bahnar: Lu sư gô roi gah tơdrong 'lơ̆ng rŏ ư-ang Ih Gah inh gô tơchĕng kơ tơdrong jang hlĭch chrơp Ih.

English: Men shall speak of the might of Your awesome acts, And I will declare Your greatness.
Bahnar: Đe gô ră roi tơdrong mơsêh pran kơ tơdrong jang krưp Ih; Gah inh gô roi tơbăt tơdrong tih krưp Ih pơm.

English: They shall utter the memory of Your great goodness, And shall sing of Your righteousness.
Bahnar: Đe gô pơm giĕng 'blŏk hơdơ̆r kơ tơdrong 'lơ̆ng Ih. Păng hơri ư-ang kơ tơdrong tơpăt Ih.

English: The LORD is gracious and full of compassion, Slow to anger and great in mercy.
Bahnar: Kră Yang băt mơnat păng đei jơhngơ̆m 'mêm. Hiơ̆ kơ blĕk păng 'bĕnh kơ tơdrong 'mêm mơnat.

English: The LORD is good to all, And His tender mercies are over all His works.
Bahnar: Kră Yang, pơm 'lơ̆ng kơ đĭ-đăng kon bơngai. Tơdrong Sư 'mêm mơnat rim kơ tơmam đêl Sư pơjing

English: All Your works shall praise You, O LORD, And Your saints shall bless You.
Bahnar: Ơ Kră Yang, lu tơmam đêl Ih pơjing gô bơnê ư-ang kơ Ih; Dôm lu bơngai rơgoh gô hơri bơnê kơ Ih.

English: They shall speak of the glory of Your kingdom, And talk of Your power
Bahnar: Lu sư gô roi tơdrong ư-ang dêh char Ih. Ră roi tơdrong mơsêh Ih.

English: To make known to the sons of men His mighty acts, And the glorious majesty of His kingdom.
Bahnar: Wă kơ kon bơngai băt. Tơdrong jang mơsêh Ih. Păng tơdrong 'lơ̆ng rŏ krưp mơsêh dêh char Ih.

English: Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, And Your dominion endures throughout all generations.
Bahnar: Dêh char Ih oei oei ling-lang tơdrong Ih pơgơ̆r dĭng truh tơ ning-mônh khŏm khŏm. Kră Yang pơsĭt dôm nơ̆r Sư pơkă. Ih 'mêm kơ đĭ dôm tơmam đêl Ih pơjing.

English: The LORD upholds all who fall, And raises up all who are bowed down.
Bahnar: Kră Yang, dŏng tơiung lu bơngai pơ̆k huŏng. Păng pơdơ̆ng tơpăt lu bơngai gu kơdŭ.

English: The eyes of all look expectantly to You, And You give them their food in due season.
Bahnar: Đĭ-đăng măt kon bơngai oei chang Ih. Ih ăn kơ lu sư tơmam sa kiơ̆ trŏ 'bơ̆t sư kăl yua.

English: You open Your hand And satisfy the desire of every living thing.
Bahnar: Kră Yang bơlang ti, ăn kơ lu kon sem arih klaih rơhing kiơ̆ thoi lu sư wă.

English: The LORD is righteous in all His ways, Gracious in all His works.
Bahnar: Kră Yang boih 'lơ̆ng tơpăt lăm rim trong Sư. Băt 'mêm kơ rim tơdrong jang Sư.

English: The LORD is near to all who call upon Him, To all who call upon Him in truth.
Bahnar: Kră Yang oei jê̆ lu bơngai krao chă Sư. Wă khan oei jê̆ lu đe bu mă krao chă Sư đĭ jơhngơ̆m tơpă.

English: He will fulfill the desire of those who fear Him; He also will hear their cry and save them.
Bahnar: Sư ăn tôm mah kơ lu đe bu hli yom kơ Sư. Kŭm mơ̆ng nơ̆r lu sư krao apinh păng dŏng pơklaih lu sư.

English: The LORD preserves all who love Him, But all the wicked He will destroy.
Bahnar: Kră Yang wei-lăng lu bơngai mă 'mêm kơ Sư, Mă-lei gô pơlôch pơrăm lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆.

English: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD, And all flesh shall bless His holy name Forever and ever.
Bahnar: 'Bơ̆r inh gô hơri bơnê ư-ang kơ Kră Yang; Ăn kơ đĭ lu adrĕch sĕch akar kơkuh kơ anăn 'lơ̆ng rơgoh Sư, dĭng truh tơ ning-mônh hlŏng hloi.

English: Praise the LORD! Praise the LORD, O my soul!
Bahnar: Halêluya! Ơ bơhngol inh hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ Kră Yang.

English: While I live I will praise the LORD; I will sing praises to my God while I have my being.
Bahnar: Lăm đĭ chăl arih inh gô bơnê ư-ang kơ Kră Yang; Inh oei arih dang yơ inh gô hơri ư-ang kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei dang noh.

English: Do not put your trust in princes, Nor in a son of man, in whom there is no help.
Bahnar: 'Nĕ kơ gơnang kơ lu yŏng, kư̆m 'nĕ kơ gơnang kơ kon bơngai yua kơ lu sư ưh kơ gơh dŏng pơklaih.

English: His spirit departs, he returns to his earth; In that very day his plans perish.
Bahnar: Bơhngola lĕch boih, akâu lu sư brŏk hơlơ̆k tơ teh, Lăm năr noh hloi dôm tơdrong lu sư wă pơm kư̆m hiong đĭ

English: Happy is he who has the God of Jacob for his help, Whose hope is in the LORD his God
Bahnar: Pŭn dêh kơ bơngai bu đei Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei Jakôp tơgŭm Sư. Bơngai bu hơmĕng kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei sư!

English: Who made heaven and earth, The sea, and all that is in them; Who keeps truth forever
Bahnar: Sư boih Tơ'ngla pơjing kơ plĕnh teh, đak dơsĭ păng đĭ-đăng tơmam arih lăm noh; Kră Yang wei jơhngơ̆m tơpăt ling-lang

English: Who executes justice for the oppressed, Who gives food to the hungry. The LORD gives freedom to the prisoners.
Bahnar: Sek tơlang tơpăt, kơ lu bơngai mă đe pơjăm pơjuă; Păng ăn tơmam sa kơ lu bơngai pơngot. Kră Yang pơklaih rơngei bơngai đe phak

English: The LORD opens the eyes of the blind; The LORD raises those who are bowed down; The LORD loves the righteous.
Bahnar: Kră Yang pơih ăn kơ lu bơngai măt tol gơh hơdah. Kră Yang 'bơ̆ tơpăt lu bơngai kơdŭ grŏn, Kră Yang 'mêm kơ lu bơngai tơpăt

English: The LORD watches over the strangers; He relieves the fatherless and widow; But the way of the wicked He turns upside down.
Bahnar: Kră Yang wei-lăng lu bơngai tơmoi. Dŏng tơiung lu mơti păng adro po; Mă-lei Sư pơrăm lê̆ trong lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆.

English: The LORD shall reign forever— Your God, O Zion, to all generations. Praise the LORD!
Bahnar: Kră Yang gô pơgơ̆r ling-lang; Ơ Siôn, Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei Ih pơgơ̆r hlŏng hloi đĭ jơhnơr. Halêluya!

English: Praise the LORD! For it is good to sing praises to our God; For it is pleasant, and praise is beautiful.
Bahnar: Bơnê ư-ang bĕ kơ Kră Yang! Trŏ 'lơ̆ng tơpă. Hiôk hơri bơnê kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei lu bơ̆n; Hiôk dêh tơpă trŏ hơri bơnê kơ Sư.

English: The LORD builds up Jerusalem; He gathers together the outcasts of Israel.
Bahnar: Kră Yang man pơdơ̆ng pơlei Jêrusalem; Sư krao akŭm lu bơngai Isơrael đơ̆ng tơklah tơklang.

English: He heals the brokenhearted And binds up their wounds.
Bahnar: Ming pơklaih lu bơngai đei jĭ jơhngơ̆m. Păng pơ̆n rơka lu sư.

English: He counts the number of the stars; He calls them all by name.
Bahnar: Sư jô̆ đĭ lu sơnglŏng. Anăn ăn đĭ rim lu sơnglŏng.

English: Great is our Lord, and mighty in power; His understanding is infinite.
Bahnar: Kră Yang lu bơ̆n tih tơpă, đei tơdrong mơsêh mơyang. Tơdrong gơh hơgei Sư pă băt dang yơ.

English: The LORD lifts up the humble; He casts the wicked down to the ground.
Bahnar: Kră Yang dŏng tơgŭm lu bơngai pơmat-tat. Teh tơhuŏng lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆ tơ teh.

English: Sing to the LORD with thanksgiving; Sing praises on the harp to our God
Bahnar: Hơri bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang. Reh brŏ Dung bơnê kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei lu bơ̆n.

English: Who covers the heavens with clouds, Who prepares rain for the earth, Who makes grass to grow on the mountains.
Bahnar: Sư gom plĕnh hăm hơmơ̆l. Ăn đak 'mi kơ teh. Ăn 'nhĕt 'nhot chăt kơpal groi.

English: He gives to the beast its food, And to the young ravens that cry.
Bahnar: Asong ăn tơmam sa kơ kon sem brem păng kơ kon ak mưh sư hmoi.

English: He does not delight in the strength of the horse; He takes no pleasure in the legs of a man.
Bahnar: Sư ưh kơ lăp đon kơ jơhngơ̆m pran aseh, kư̆m ưh kơ hiôk kơ jơ̆ng pran kon bơngai.

English: The LORD takes pleasure in those who fear Him, In those who hope in His mercy.
Bahnar: Mă-lei Kră Yang lăp đon kơ bu mă hli yom kơ Sư, păng lu bơngai mă chang hơmĕng kơ tơdrong Sư 'mêm.

English: Praise the LORD, O Jerusalem! Praise your God, O Zion!
Bahnar: Ơ Jêrusalem, hơri bơnê bĕ kơ Kră Yang! Ơ Siôn, hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei ih!

English: For He has strengthened the bars of your gates; He has blessed your children within you.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Sư đei pơm kơjăp boih kơ chơkăl 'măng jang ih. Ăn tơdrong pŭn hiôk kơ kon sâu mă oei hơdai ih.a

English: He makes peace in your borders, And fills you with the finest wheat.
Bahnar: Sư tơjruh tơdrong hiôk-hian kơ hơdral dêh char ih; Tuh ăn kơ ih đei 'bĕnh blai kơ 'ba mi mă 'lơ̆ng hloh.

English: He sends out His command to the earth; His word runs very swiftly.
Bahnar: Sư tơtă nơ̆r Sư tơ lăm teh. Nơ̆r Sư truh hloi kuăng tơpă.

English: He gives snow like wool; He scatters the frost like ashes
Bahnar: Sư ăn 'mi prĕl thoi sŏk triu rei 'mui tŭk kok thoi tơnuh.

English: He casts out His hail like morsels; Who can stand before His cold?
Bahnar: Sư tơjruh 'mi prĕl tơngiĕt thoi hơga. Bu kĕ oei tơ lăm prĕl tơngiĕt Sư ei.

English: He sends out His word and melts them; He causes His wind to blow, and the waters flow.
Bahnar: Sư athei prĕl hach na hach hloi. Ăn kơ kial tơthu na đak ro hloi.

English: He declares His word to Jacob, His statutes and His judgments to Israel.
Bahnar: Sư roi tơbăt nơ̆r Sư kơ adrĕch Jakôp, Khôi juăt păng nơ̆r tơtă Sư kơ adrĕch Isơrael.

English: He has not dealt thus with any nation; And as for His judgments, they have not known them. Praise the LORD!
Bahnar: Sư ưh kơ đei pơm thoi noh ôh kơ adrĕch adrung nai; Lu sư ưh kơ băt hlôh ôh nơ̆r tơtă đơ̆ng Kră Yang. Halêluya!

English: Praise the LORD! Praise the LORD from the heavens; Praise Him in the heights!
Bahnar: Halêluya! Đơ̆ng jơ̆p-jang kơpal plĕnh hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ Kră Yang! Hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ Sư lăm anih kơpal hloh!

English: Praise Him, all His angels; Praise Him, all His hosts!
Bahnar: Ơ đĭ-đăng linh jang 'lơ̆ng hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ Sư. Ơ lu linh jang hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ Sư.

English: Praise Him, sun and moon; Praise Him, all you stars of light!
Bahnar: Ơ măt năr, măt khei hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ Sư. Ơ lu tăl sơnglŏng rang hơdah, bơnê ư-ang bĕ kơ Sư

English: Praise Him, you heavens of heavens, And you waters above the heavens!
Bahnar: Ơ lu plĕnh kơpal hloh, ơ lu đak tơ kơpal plĕnh; hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ Sư!

English: Let them praise the name of the LORD, For He commanded and they were created.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ đĭ-đăng hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ anăn Kră Yang; yua kơ Sư athei, na đĭ-đăng jing đei.

English: He also established them forever and ever; He made a decree which shall not pass away.
Bahnar: Sư pơjing ăn kơjăp kơ lu tơmam noh kơjăp dĭng truh tơ ning-mônh ling-lang hloi; Sư ăn tơtă, ưh kơ đei tơhiong ôh.

English: Praise the LORD from the earth, You great sea creatures and all the depths
Bahnar: Hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ Kră Yang đơ̆ng kơpal teh. Ơ lu kon sem brem lăm dơsĭ păng pŭng-lŭng jrŭ.

English: Fire and hail, snow and clouds; Stormy wind, fulfilling His word
Bahnar: Ơ ŭnh păng 'mi prĕl, prĕl păng hơmơ̆l. Kial hơbŭt chu kiơ̆ Sư athei.

English: Mountains and all hills; Fruitful trees and all cedars
Bahnar: Ơ lu kông păng đĭ kơ groi, lu 'long plei păng lu 'long hơngo.

English: Beasts and all cattle; Creeping things and flying fowl
Bahnar: Kon sem bri păng lu kon sem dơrong. Kon hơdrông păng lu kon sem păr.

English: Kings of the earth and all peoples; Princes and all judges of the earth
Bahnar: Lu pơtao lăm teh đak păng đĭ-đăng adrĕch hơdrŭng kon bơngai. Lu kon pơtao păng đĭ-đăng lu Kră pơgơ̆r lăm teh đak.

English: Both young men and maidens; Old men and children.
Bahnar: Lu tơdăm păng lu hơdruh hle, lu kră păng lu hơ'lơ̆p.

English: Let them praise the name of the LORD, For His name alone is exalted; His glory is above the earth and heaven.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ lu sư hơri ư-ang kơ anăn Kră Yang. Yua kơ lăp minh anăn Sư đĕch mă trŏ kơ pơyom. Tơdrong ư-ang Sư kơjung hloh kơ đĭ-đăng teh đak păng plĕnh.

English: And He has exalted the horn of His people, The praise of all His saints— Of the children of Israel, A people near to Him. Praise the LORD!
Bahnar: Sư đei hơtŏk boih jơhngơ̆m pran lu kon pơlei Sư thoi hơke sem bri Noh jơ̆ tơdrong hơri ư-ang đơ̆ng lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh Sư, noh lu bơngai Isơrael. Kon pơlei pơla mă oei jê̆ Sư. Halêluya!

English: Praise the LORD! Sing to the LORD a new song, And His praise in the assembly of saints.
Bahnar: Halêluya! Hơri bĕ kơ Kră Yang minh 'bai hơri 'nao! Hơri bĕ kơ Sư lăm khŭl bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh Sư akŭm.

English: Let Israel rejoice in their Maker; Let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ lu bơngai Isơrael chơt hiôk lăm Tơ'ngla mă pơjing lu sư; Hơpơi ăn kơ lu kon sâu Siôn chơt hiôk lăm Pơtao sư.

English: Let them praise His name with the dance; Let them sing praises to Him with the timbrel and harp.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ lu sư suang kơkuh bơnê bĕ kơ Anăn Sư. Iŏk hơgơ̆r iĕ păng brŏ hơri bơnê bĕ kơ Sư.

English: For the LORD takes pleasure in His people; He will beautify the humble with salvation.
Bahnar: Yua kơ Kră Yang hiôk lăp đon kơ kon pơlei pơla Sư; Sư iŏk tơdrong dŏng pơklaih pơhrôp ăn kơ lu bơngai iŏk đon ala.

English: Let the saints be joyful in glory; Let them sing aloud on their beds.
Bahnar: Ăn kơ đĭ lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh chơt hiôk lăm tơdrong ư-ang Sư. Hơri chơt hiôk hloi tơ kơpal giơng lu sư!

English: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, And a two-edged sword in their hand
Bahnar: Ăn nơ̆r hơri ư-ang kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei oei lăm 'bơ̆r lu sư. Chĕp đao 'bar pah măt lăm ti lu sư.

English: To execute vengeance on the nations, And punishments on the peoples
Bahnar: Wă kơ blah tơwih lu teh đak, wă phak pơmat lu kon pơlei.

English: To bind their kings with chains, And their nobles with fetters of iron
Bahnar: Wă kơ chô̆ lu pơtao lu sư păng glang mam. Păng bơngai yŏng lu sư păng giĕn mam.

English: To execute on them the written judgment— This honor have all His saints. Praise the LORD!
Bahnar: Wă sek phak lu sư kiơ̆ thoi đei chih boih. 'Nâu tơdrong ư-ang kơ lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng rơgoh Sư. Halêluya.

English: Praise the LORD! Praise God in His sanctuary; Praise Him in His mighty firmament!
Bahnar: Halêluya! Bơnê ư-ang bĕ kơ Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei lăm anih 'lơ̆ng rơgoh Sư! Hơri ư-ang bĕ kơ mơsêh mơyang Sư tơ kơpal plĕnh.

English: Praise Him for His mighty acts; Praise Him according to His excellent greatness!
Bahnar: Bơnê ư-ang bĕ kơ Sư yua kơ tơdrong mơsêh mơyang Sư. Bơnê ư-ang bĕ kơ Sư kiơ̆ kơ tơdrong tih krưp Sư.

English: Praise Him with the sound of the trumpet; Praise Him with the lute and harp!
Bahnar: Hlôm bĕ keng bơnê ư-ang kơ Sư. Reh bĕ brŏ dung păng tĭng-nĭng na hơri bơnê kơ Sư.

English: Praise Him with the timbrel and dance; Praise Him with stringed instruments and flutes!
Bahnar: Teh bĕ hơgơ̆r chrang păng suang hơri bơnê kơ Sư! Reh brŏ tơlei păng hlôm 'lal, hơri ư-ang kơ Sư.

English: Praise Him with loud cymbals; Praise Him with clashing cymbals!
Bahnar: Yua bĕ chhar preh hơri ư-ang kơ Sư. Tôn bĕ chĭng chêng mă re hơri ư-ang kơ sư.

English: Let everything that has breath praise the LORD. Praise the LORD!
Bahnar: Ăn kơ đĭ lu kon sem brem mă dui jơhngơ̆m,a ư-ang bĕ kơ Kră Yang. Halêluya!
